S01divav33u:3: ekasin samaye bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma/
S01divav33u:6: .atha^āyuṣmān ānandaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātra^cīvaram ādāya śrāvastīṃ mahā^nagarīṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat/
S01divav33u:7: atha^āyuṣmān ānandaḥ śrāvastīṃ piṇḍāya caritvā kṛta^bhakta^kṛtyo yenānyatamam udapānaṃ tena^upasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divav33u:9: .tena khalu samayena tasminn udapāne prakṛtir nāma mātaṅga^dārikā udakam uddharate sma/
S01divav33u:10: atha^āyuṣmān ānandaḥ prakṛtiṃ mātaṅga^dārikām etad avocat/
S01divav33u:13: .evaṃ kite prakṛtir mātaṅga^dārikāyuṣmantam ānandam idam avocat/
S01divav33u:15: na^ahaṃ te bhagini kulaṃ vā jātiṃ vā pṛcchāmi/
S01divav33u:16: api tu sacette parityaktaṃ pānīyaṃ dehi pāsyāmi/
S01divav33u:21: .atha prakṛtir mātaṅga^dārikāyuṣmanta ānandsya śarīre mukhe svare sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca nimittam udgṛhītvā yoniśo manasikāreṇāviṣṭā saṃrāgacittam utpādayati (1) sma/
S01divav33u:22: āryo me ānandaḥ svāmī ayād iti/
S01divav33u:23: mātā ca me mahā^vidyādharī sā śakṣyaty āryam ānandam ānayitum/
S01divav33u:25: .atha prakṛtir mātaṅga^dārikā pānīyaghaṭam ādāya yena caṇḍāla^gṛhaṃ tena^upasaṃkramya pānīya^ghaṭam ekānte nikṣipya svāṃ jananīm idam avocat/
S01divav33u:27: .yat khalv evam amba jānīyā ānando nāma śramaṇo mahāśramaṇa^gautamasya śrāvaka upasthāyakas tam ahaṃ svāminam icchāmi/
S01divav33u:32: sthāpayitvā yo mṛtaḥ syād yo vā vīta^rāgaḥ/
S01divav33u:33: api ca rājā prasenajit kauśalaḥ śramaṇa^gautamam atīva sevate bhajate paryupāsate/
S01divav33u:38: .evam uktā prakṛtir mātaṅga^dārikā mātaram idam avocat/
S01divav33u:39: sa ced amba śramaṇo gautamā vīta^rāgastasya^antikāc chramaṇam ānandaṃ na pratilapsye jīvitaṃ parityajeyaṃ sa cet pratilipsye jīvāmi/
S01divav33u:40: p.2.5/.mā te putri jīvitaṃ parityajasi ānayāmi śramaṇam ānandam/
S01divav33u:42_0: .atha prakṛter mātaṅga^dārikāyā mātā madhye gṛhāṅganasya gomayenopalepanaṃ kṛtvā
S01divav33u:42_1: vedīm ālipya darbhān saṃstīrya^agniṃ prajvālya^aṣṭaśatam arka^puṣpāṇāṃ gṛhītvā mantrān
S01divav33u:42_2: āvartayamānā ekaikam arka^puṣpaṃ parijapya agnau pratikṣipati sma /
S01divav33u:47: icchayā devo varṣati vidyotati gajeti vismayaṃ mahā^rājasya samabhivardhāyituṃ devebhyo manuṣyebhyo gandharvebhyoḥ śikhi^grahā devā viśikhi^gra(@)
S01divav33u:48: hā devā ānandasya^āgamanāya saṃgamanāya kramaṇāya grahaṇāya juhomi svāhā/
S01divav33u:51: sa vihārān niṣkramya yena caṇḍāla^gṛhaṃ tena^upasaṃkrāmati sma/
S01divav33u:54: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ prakṛtiṃ duhitaram idam avocat/
S01divav33u:55: ayam asau putri śramaṇa ānanda āgacchati śayanaṃ prajñapaya/
S01divav33u:57: .atha prakṛtir mātaṅga^dārikā hṛṣṭa^tuṣṭā pramudita^manā āyuṣmata ānandasya śayyāṃ prajñapayati sma/
S01divav33u:61: ekānta^sthitaḥ sa punar āyuṣmān ānandaḥ prārodīd/
S01divav33u:63: vyasana^prāpto +aham asmi na ca me bhagavān samanvāharati/
S01divav33u:66: samanvāhṛtya saṃbuddha^mantraiś caṇḍāla^mantrān pratihanti sma/ tatra^iyaṃ vidyāḥ/
S01divav33u:69: p.4.1cd/.ītayo yatra śāmyanti bhayāni calitāni ca/
S01divav33u:70: p.4.2ab/.tad vai devā namsyanti sarva^siddhāś ca yoginaḥ/
S01divav33u:73: .atha^āyuṣmān ānandaḥ pratihata^caṇḍāla^mantraś caṇḍāla^gṛhān niṣkramya yena svako vihāras tena^upasaṃkramitum ārabdhaḥ/
S01divav33u:76: ānandam āyuṣmantaṃ pratigacchantaṃ dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ svāṃ jananīm idam avocat/
S01divav33u:77: ayam asau mātaḥ śramaṇa ānandaḥ pratigacchati/
S01divav33u:79: niyataṃ putri śramaṇena gautamena samanvāhṛto bhaviṣyati/
S01divav33u:82: kiṃ punar amba balavattarāḥ śramaṇasya gautamasya mantrā na^asmākaṃ/
S01divav33u:85: ye putri mantāḥ sarva^lokasya prabhavanti tān mantrān śramaṇo gautama ākāṅkṣamāṇaḥ pratihanti/
S01divav33u:86: na punar lokaḥ prabhavati śramaṇasya gautamasya mantrān pratihantuṃ/
S01divav33u:93: udgṛhṇa tvam ānanda imāṃ ṣaḍakṣarīvidyāṃ dhāraya vācaya paryavāpnuhi/
S01divav33u:94: ātmano hitāya sukhāya bhikṣūṇāṃ bhikṣuṇīnām upāsakānām upasikānāṃ hitāya sukhāya/
S01divav33u:95: iyam ānanda ṣaḍkṣarīvidyā ṣaḍbhiḥ samyak saṃbuddhair bhāṣitā caturbhiś ca mahā^rājaiḥ śakreṇa devānām indreṇa brahmaṇā ca sahāpatinā/ mayā ca^etarhi
S01divav33u:97: tvam apy etarhy ānanda tāṃ dhāraya vācaya paryavāpnuhi/ yad uta tad yathā:
S01divav33u:99: .aṇḍare pāṇḍare kāraṇḍe keyūre +arci^haste khara^grīve bandhu^mati cīra^mati dharavidha cilimile viloḍaya viṣāṇi loke/
S01divav33u:101: gola^mati gaṇḍavile cilimile sa^atinimne yathā saṃvibhakta^gola^mati gaṇḍa^vilāyai svāhā/
S01divav33u:103: .yaḥ kaś cid ānanda^ṣaḍakṣaryā vidyayā paritrāṇaṃ svastyayanaṃ kuryāt sa yadi vadha^arho bhavet daṇḍena mucyate/
S01divav33u:104: daṇḍa^arhaḥ prahāreṇa prahāra^arhaḥ paribhāṣaṇayā paribhāṣaṇa^arho romaharṣaṇena romaharṣaṇa^arhaḥ punar eva mucyate/
S01divav33u:106_0: .na^aham ānanda taṃ samanupaśyāmi sa^deva^loke samāra^loke sabrahma^loke saśramaṇa^brāhmaṇikāyāṃ
S01divav33u:106_1: prajāyāṃ sa^deva^mānuṣikāyāṃ sa^asurāyāṃ yas tv anayā ṣaḍakṣayaṃ vidyayā rakṣāyāṃ
S01divav33u:106_2: kṛtāyāṃ rakṣā^sūtre bāhau baddhe svastyayane kṛte +abhibhavituṃ śakroti varjayitvā
S01divav33u:108_0: .atha prakṛtir mātaṅga^dārikā tasyā eva rātryā atyayāt śiraḥ^snātā +anāhata dūṣya^prāvṛtā
S01divav33u:108_1: muktā^mālya^ābharaṇā yena śrāvasto nagarī tena^upasaṃkramya nagara^dvāre kapāṭa^mūle niśrityā +asthāt /
S01divav33u:112: .atha^āyuṣmān ānandaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātra^cīvaram ādāya śrāvastīṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat/
S01divav33u:114: dūrata eva dṛṣṭvā ca punar āyuṣmantam ānandaṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhā gacchantam anugacchati tiṣṭhantam anutiṣṭhati/
S01divav33u:115: yad yad eva kulaṃ piṇḍāya praviśati tasya tasyaiva dvāre tūṣṇībhūtā tiṣṭhati āyuṣmantam
S01divav33u:119: pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhāṃ dṛṣṭvā ca punar jehrīymāṇarūpo +apragalbhāyamānarūpo duḥkhī durmanāḥ śīghraṃ śīghraṃ śrāvastyā vinirgamya yena jetavanaṃ tanopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divav33u:121: ekānta^sthita āyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam idam avocat/ iyaṃ me bhagavan
S01divav33u:122: prakṛtir mātaṅga^dārikā pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhā gacchantam anugacchati,
S01divav33u:124: yad yad eva kulaṃ piṇḍāya praviśāmi tasya tasyaiva dvāre tūṣṇībhūtā tiṣṭhati/
S01divav33u:125: trāhi me bhagavan trāhi me sugata/
S01divav33u:127: .evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam idam avocat/
S01divav33u:129: atha bhagavān prakṛtiṃ mātaṅga^dārikām idam avocat/
S01divav33u:130: hiṃ te prakṛte mātaṅga^dārike ānandena bhikṣuṇā/
S01divav33u:139: .atha prakṛtir mātaṅga^dārikā bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavantaṃ triḥpradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavato +antikāt prakrāntā/
S01divav33u:142: ekānta^sthitā svakau mātā pitarāv idam avocat/
S01divav33u:145: .atha prakṛter mātaṅga^dārikāyā mātāpitarau prakṛtim ādāya yana bhagavāms tena^upasaṃkrāntau/
S01divav33u:146: uapsaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā^ekānte nyaṣīdatāṃ/
S01divav33u:147: atha prakṛtir mātaṅga^dārikā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā banditvā ekānte +asthād/
S01divav33u:151: .atha bhagavān prakṛter mātaṅga^dārikāyā mātāpitarāv idam avoct/
S01divav33u:155: tena hi yūyaṃ prakṛtim apahāya gacchata svagṛham/
S01divav33u:157: .atha prakṛter mātaṅga^dārikāyā mātāpitarau bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavantaṃ triḥpradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavato +antikāt prakrāntau/
S01divav33u:159: .atha prakṛter mātaṅga^dārikāyā mātāpitarāv aciraprakrāntau viditvā bhagavān prakṛtiṃ mātaṅga^dārikām idm avocat/
S01divav33u:163: tena hi prakṛte ya ānandasya veśaḥ sa tvayā dhārayitavyaḥ/
S01divav33u:168: p.8.1/.atha bhagavān prakṛtiṃ mātaṅga^dārikām idam avocat/ ehi tvaṃ bhikṣuṇi cara brahma^caryam/
S01divav33u:170: .evam ukte prakṛtir mātaṅga^dārikā bhagavatā muṇḍā kāṣāya^prāvṛtā/
S01divav33u:171: atha bhagavān prakṛtiṃ mātaṅga^dārikām ehi bhikṣuṇīvādena pravrājayitvā dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati sma,
S01divav33u:175: yeyaṃ kathā dīrgha^rātraṃ saṃsārasamāpannānāṃ pratikūlā śravaṇīyā/
S01divav33u:178: ādīnavaṃ niḥsaraṇaṃ bhayaṃ saṃkleśavyavadānaṃ bodhipakṣāṃs tān dharmān bhagvān prakṛtyai bhikṣuṇyai saṃprakāśayati sma/
S01divav33u:180_0: .atha prakṛtir bhikṣuṇī bhagavatā dharmyaya kathayā saṃdarśitā samādāpitā samuttejitā
S01divav33u:180_1: saṃpraharṣitā hṛṣṭa^cittā kalyāṇacittā muditacittā vinīvaraṇacittā ṛjucittā +akhilacittā
S01divav33u:182_0: .yadā ca bhagavān jñātaḥ prakṛtiṃ bhikṣuṇīṃ hṛṣṭa^cittāṃ kalyāṇacittāṃ muditacittāṃ
S01divav33u:182_1: vinivaraṇacittāṃ bhavyāṃ pratibalāṃ sāmutkarpikīṃ dharma^deśanām ājñātuṃ tadā yeyaṃ
S01divav33u:183: yad uta duḥkhaṃ samudayo nirodho mārgaḥ,
S01divav33u:184: tāṃ bhagavān prakṛter bhikṣuṇyā vistareṇa saṃprakāśayati sma/
S01divav33u:188_0: tad yathā vastām apagatakālakaṃ rajanopagataṃ raṅga^udake prakṣiptaṃ samyag eva raṅgaṃ
S01divav33u:188_1: pratigṛhṇīyād evam eva prakṛtir bhikṣuṇī tasminnevāsane niṣaṇṇā caturārya^satyāni abhisamayati sma,
S01divav33u:189: tad yathā duḥkhaṃ sumudayaṃ nirodhaṃ mārgam/
S01divav33u:191_0: .atha prakṛtir bhikṣuṇī kṛṣṭa^dharmā prāpta^dharmā vidita^dharmā akopya^dharmā paryavasita^dharma^adhigata^artha^lābha^saṃvṛttā
S01divav33u:191_2: śāstuḥ śāsane +anudharma^cāriṇī ājāneyamānā dharmeṣu bhagavataḥ pādayoḥ śirasā nipatya
S01divav33u:194: yathā bālā yathā mūḍhā yathā +avyaktā yathā +akuśalā duṣprajña^jātīyā yāham ānandaṃ bhikṣuṃ svāmi^vādena samudācarṣaṃ/
S01divav33u:199: atas tasyā mama bhagavann atyayam atyayato jānātu pratigṛhṇātu
S01divav33u:202: āyatyāṃ saṃvarāya sthitvā tvaṃ prakṛte +atyayam atyayato +adhyāgamaḥ/
S01divav33u:203: yathā bālā yathā mūḍhā yathā +avyaktā yathā +akuśalā duṣprajña^jātīya tvam ānandaṃ bhikṣuṃ svāmi^vādena (10) amudācarasi^iti/
S01divav33u:204: yataś ca tvaṃ prakṛte +atyayaṃ jānāsi atyayaṃ paśyasi āyatyāṃ ca saṃvaram āpadyase,
S01divav33u:205: aham api te +atyayam atyayato gṛhṇāmi/ vṛddhir
S01divav33u:206: eva te prakṛte pratikāṅkṣatavyā kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ na hāniḥ/
S01divav33u:208: .atha prakṛtir bhikṣuṇī bhagavatā^abhinanditā anuśiṣṭā ekāvyapakṛṣṭā +apramattā ātāpinī smṛtim atī saṃprajānā prahitāni viviktāni viharati sma/
S01divav33u:209_0: yad arthaṃ kula^duhitaraḥ keśān avatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇy ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayā^āgārād
S01divav33u:209_1: anāgārikāṃ pravrajanti tadanuttara^brahmacarya^paryavasānaṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayam
S01divav33u:211: kṣīṇā me jātir uṣitaṃ brahmacaryaṃ kṛtaṃ karaṇīyaṃ na^aparamasmād bhavaṃ prajānāmi^iti/
S01divav33u:213: .aśrauṣuḥ śrāvasteyakā brāhmaṇa^gṛhapatayo bhagavatā kila canḍāla^dārikā pravrājiteti/
S01divav33u:215: kathaṃ hi nāma caṇḍāla^dārikā bhikṣūṇāṃ samyakcaryāṃ cariṣyati/
S01divav33u:217: kathaṃ hi nāma caṇḍāla^dārikā brahma^kṣatriya^gṛhapati^mahā^śāla^kuleṣu pravekṣyati/
S01divav33u:219: .aśrauṣīd rājā prasenajit kauśalo bhagavatā caṇḍāla^dārikā pravrājiteti/
S01divav33u:221: kathaṃ hi nāma caṇḍāla^dārikā bhikṣūṇāṃ samyak^caryāṃ cariṣyati/
S01divav33u:225: .vimṛṣya ca bhadaraṃ yānaṃ yojayitvā bhadraṃ yānam abhiruhya saṃbahulaiś ca śrāvasteyair brāhmaṇa^gṛhapatibhiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ śrāvastyā niryāti sma/
S01divav33u:227: tasya khalu yāvatī yānasya bhūmis tāvad yānena gatvā sa yānād avatīrya pattikāya^parivṛtaḥ pattikāya^puraskṛtaḥ padbhyām eva^ārāmaṃ prāvikṣat/
S01divav33u:229: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divav33u:230: te +api saṃbahulāḥ śrāvasteyakā brāhmaṇa^kṣatirya^gṛhapatayo bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā^ekānte niṣaṇṇāḥ/
S01divav33u:231: apy aikatyā bhagavatā sārdhaṃ saṃmukhaṃ saṃrañjanīṃ saṃmodinīṃ vividhāṃ kathāṃ vyatisārya^ekānte niṣaṇṇāḥ/
S01divav33u:234: apy aikatya yena bhagavāṃs tena^añjaliṃ praṇamya^ekānte niṣaṇṇāḥ/
S01divav33u:235: apy aikatyās tūṣṇīṃ bhūtā ekānte niṣaṇṇāḥ/
S01divav33u:237_0: .atha bhagavān rājānaṃ prasenajitaṃ kauśalam ārabhya teṣāṃ ca saṃbahulānāṃ śrāvasteyakānāṃ
S01divav33u:237_1: brāhmaṇa^kṣatriya^gṛhapatīnāṃ cetasā cittam ājñāya prakṛter bhikṣuṇyāḥ pūrvanivāsam
S01divav33u:238: icchatha yūyaṃ bhikṣavas tathā^āgatasya sammukhaṃ prakṛter bhikṣuṇyāḥ pūrva^nivāsam ārabhya dharma^kathāṃ śrotum/
S01divav33u:241: etasya bhagavan kāla etasya sugata samayo yad bhagavān prakṛter bhikṣuṇyāḥ pūrva^nivāsam ārabhya dharma^kathāṃ kathāyet/
S01divav33u:244: tena hi bhikṣavaḥ śṛṇuta sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuruta bhāṣiṣye/
S01divav33u:245: evaṃ sādhu bhagavann iti te bhikṣavo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣuḥ/ bhagavāṃs
S01divav33u:248: .bhūta^pūrvaṃ bhikṣavo +atīte +adhvani gaṅgā^taṭe +atimukta^kadalī^pāṭalaka^āmalakī vana^gahana^pradeśe tatra triśaṅkur nāma mātaṅga^rājaḥ prativasati sma/
S01divav33u:250: sa punar bhikṣavas triśaṅkur mātaṅga^rajaḥ pūrva^janma^adhītān vedān samanusmarati sma sa^aṅga^upāṅgān sarahasyān sanighaṇṭa^kaiṭabhān sa^akṣara^prabhedān
S01divav33u:252: padako vaiyākaraṇo lokāyata^yajña^mantre mahā^puruṣa^lakṣaṇe niṣṇāto niṣkāṅkṣo bhāṣyaṃ ca yathārdharmaṃ veda^vrata^padāny anuśrutaṃ ca bhāṣate sma/
S01divav33u:254: .tasya triśaṅkur mātaṅga^rājasya śārdūakarṇo nāma kumāro +abhūd utpannaḥ/
S01divav33u:255: rūpataś ca kulataś ca śīlataś ca guṇataś ca sarva^guṇaiś ca^upeto +abhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ paramayā śubha^varṇa^puṣkalatayā samanvāgataḥ/
S01divav33u:258: śārdūlakarṇaṃ kumāraṃ pūrva^janmādhītān vedān adhyāpayati sma/
S01divav33u:259: yad uta sa^aṅga^upāṅgān sarahasyān sanighaṇṭa^kaiṭabhān sa^akṣara^prabhedān itihāsa^pañca^mānanyāni ca śāstrāṇi bhāṣyaṃ ca yathā^dharmaṃ veda^vrata^padāni/
S01divav33u:262: ayaṃ mama putraḥ śārdūlakarṇo nāma kumāraḥ/
S01divav33u:263: upeto rūpataś ca kulataś ca śīlataś ca guṇataś ca/
S01divav33u:264: sarva^guṇa^upeto +abhirūpo (13) darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ paramayā ca varṇa^puṣkalatayā samanvāgataḥ/
S01divav33u:266: samayo +ayaṃ yan ny aham asya niveśana^dharmaṃ kariṣye/ tat kuto ny
S01divav33u:267: avaṃ śārdūlakarṇasya putrasya śīlavatīṃ guṇavatīṃ rūpavatīṃ pratirūpāṃ prajāvatīṃ labheyam iti/checked
S01divav33u:269: .tasmin khalu samaye puṣkarasārī nāma brāhmaṇa utkūṭaṃ nāma droṇa^mukhaṃ paribhuṅkte sma/
S01divav33u:270: samapta^utsadaṃ sa^tṛṇa^kāṣṭha^udakaṃ dhānya^sahagataṃ rājñā +agnidattena brahma^deyaṃ dattam/
S01divav33u:272: .puṣkarasārī punar brāhmaṇa upetaḥ mātṛtaḥ pitṛtaḥ saṃśuddho gṛhiṇyāmanākṣipto jātivādena gotra^vādena yāvad āsaptamamātāmahapitāmahaṃ/
S01divav33u:273_0: yugapad upādhyāyo +adhyāpako mantra^dharas trayāṇāṃ vedānāṃ pāragaḥ sa^aṅga^upāṅgānāṃ
S01divav33u:274: lokāyata^yajña^mantra^mahā^puruṣa^lakṣaṇeṣu pāragaḥ/ sphītam utkūṭaṃ nāma droṇa^mukhaṃ paribhuṅkte/
S01divav33u:276: .puṣkarasāriṇo brāhmaṇasya prakṛtir nāma māṇavikā duhitā bhūtā/
S01divav33u:277: upetā rūpataś ca kulataś ca śīlataś ca guṇataś ca/
S01divav33u:278: sarva^guṇa^upetā +abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā paramayā varṇa^puṣkalatayā samanvāgatā śīlavatī guṇavatī/
S01divav33u:281: asty uttara^pūrveṇa^utkūṭo nāma droṇa^mukhaḥ, tatra puṣkarasāro nāma brāhmaṇaḥ prativasati/
S01divav33u:282: upeto mātṛtaḥ pitṛto (14) yāvat tatraivedike pravacane vistareṇa/
S01divav33u:284: sasapta^utsadaṃ satṛṇa^kāṣṭha^udakaṃ dhānya^bhogaiḥ sahagataṃ rājñā +agnidattena brahma^deyaṃ dattam/
S01divav33u:286_0: .tasya puṣkarasāriṇo brāhmaṇasya prakṛtir nāma māṇavikā duhitā upetā rūpataś ca kulataś
S01divav33u:286_1: ca śīlataś ca sarva^guṇa^upetā +abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā paramayā varṇa^puṣkalatayā samanvāgatā /
S01divav33u:287: śīlavatī guṇavatī putrasya me śārdūlakarṇasya pratirūpā patnī bhaviṣyatiti/
S01divav33u:289_0: .atra triśaṅkur mātaṅga^rāja etam evārthaṃ bahulaṃ rātrau cintayitvā vitarkya tasyā
S01divav33u:289_1: eva rātryā atyayāt pratyūṣa^kāla^samaye sarva^śvetaṃ vaḍavā ratham abhiruhya mahatā
S01divav33u:289_2: śvapākagaṇenāmātyagaṇena parivṛtaś caṇḍāla^kula^nagarān niṣkramya^uttarena prāgacchadyenotkūṭaṃ droṇa^mukham /
S01divav33u:291: .atha triśaṅkur mātaṅga^rāja utkūṭasya^uttarapūrveṇa sumanaskaṃ nāma^udyānaṃ nānā^vṛkṣa^saṃcchannaṃ nānā^vṛkṣa^kusumitaṃ nānā^dvijanikūjitaṃ nandanam iva devānāṃ tad upasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divav33u:293: brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārī māṇavakān mantrān vācayitum ihāgamiṣyati^iti/
S01divav33u:295: .atha brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārī tasyā eva rātryā atyayāt sarva^śvetaṃ vaḍavāratham abhiruhya śiṣyagaṇaprivṛtaḥ pañca^mātrair māṇavaka^śateḥ puraskṛta utkūṭān niryti sma,
S01divav33u:298_0: .adrākṣīt triśaṅkur mātaṅga^rājo brāhmaṇaṃ puṣkarasāriṇaṃ sūryam iva^udayantaṃ tejasā
S01divav33u:298_1: jvalantam iva hutavahaṃ yajñam iva brāhmaṇa^parivṛtaṃ śakram iva deva^gaṇaparivṛtaṃ
S01divav33u:298_2: haimavantam ivauṣadhibhiḥ samudram iva ratnaiś candram iva nakṣatrair vaiśravaṇam
S01divav33u:298_3: iva yakṣa^gaṇair brahmāṇam iva deva^rṣigaṇaiḥ parivṛtaṃ śobhamānaṃ /
S01divav33u:303: kāryaṃ ca te vakṣyāmi tac chrūyatāṃ/
S01divav33u:304: evam ukte brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārī triśaṅkumātaṅga^rājam idam avocat/
S01divav33u:305: p.15.3/.na hi bhos triśaṅko śakyaṃ brāhmaṇena saha bhoḥ kāraṃ kartuṃ/
S01divav33u:307: .ahaṃ bhoḥ puṣkarasārin śaknomi bhoḥ kāraṃ kartuṃ/
S01divav33u:308: yacchakyaṃ me kartuṃ bhavati naiva tacchakyaṃ te kartuṃ/
S01divav33u:309: api tu catvāro bhoḥ puṣkarasārin puruṣasya kāryasamārambhāḥ pūrva^samārabdhā bhavanti/
S01divav33u:310: yad uta ātmārthaṃ vā parārthaṃ vātmīyārthaṃ (16) vā sarva^bhūta^saṃgrahārthaṃ vā/
S01divav33u:311: idaṃ ca^atra mahattaraṃ kāryaṃ yat te vyākhyāsyāmi tac chrūyatāṃ/ putrāya
S01divav33u:312: me śārdūlakarṇāya prakṛtiṃ duhitaram utsṛja bhāryā^arthāya/
S01divav33u:315_0: .idaṃ ca khalu punarvacanaṃ śrutvā triśaṅkor mātaṅga^rājasya bhṛśaṃ brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārī
S01divav33u:315_1: abhiṣaktaḥ kupitaś caṇḍībhūto +anāttamanāḥ kopaṃ ca kveṣaṃ ca mrakṣyaṃ ca tatpratyayāt
S01divav33u:315_2: saṃjanayitvā lalāṭe triśikhāṃ bhṛkuṭiṃ kṛtvā kaṇṭhaṃ dhamayitvā +akṣiṇī parivartya
S01divav33u:315_3: nakula^piṅgalāṃ dṛṣṭim utpādya triśaṅkuṃ mātaṅga^rājam idam avocat /
S01divav33u:320: yastvaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ veda^pāragaṃ hīnaś caṇḍāla^yonijo bhūtvā icchasy avamardituṃ/ bho durmate/
S01divav33u:321: p.16.3ab/.prakṛtiṃ tvaṃ na jānāsi; ātmānaṃ ca^abhimanyase/
S01divav33u:322: p.16.3cd/.bāla^agre sarṣapaṃ mā bho sthāpaya(mā)kleśam āgamaḥ/
S01divav33u:324: p.17.1ab/. na hi cāmī^karaṃ mūḍha bhaved bhasma kadācana/
S01divav33u:326: p.17.2ab/.caṇḍāla^yonijas tvaṃ hi dvijātiḥ punar apy ahaṃ/
S01divav33u:327: p.17.2cd/.hīnaḥ śreṣṭhena sambandhaṃ mūḍha prāthayase kathaṃ//
S01divav33u:329: p.17.3cd/.na hi śreṣṭhaḥ prahīnena sambandhaṃ kartum icchati//
S01divav33u:330: p.17.4ab/.śreṣṭhāḥ śreṣṭhair hi sambandhaṃ kurvantīha dvijātayaḥ/
S01divav33u:331: p.17.4cd/.vidyayā ye tu sampannāḥ saṃśuddhaś caraṇena ca//
S01divav33u:332: p.17.5ab/.jātyā caivān abhikṣiptā mantraiḥ paramatāṃ gatāḥ/
S01divav33u:334: p.17.6ab/.nighaṇṭakaiṭabhān vedān brāhmaṇa ye hy adhīyate/
S01divav33u:335: p.17.6cd/.tais tādṛśair hi sambandhaṃ kurvantīha dvijātayaḥ//
S01divav33u:336: p.17.7ab/.na hi śreṣṭho hi hīnena sambandhaṃ kartum icchati/
S01divav33u:338: p.17.8ab/.yad asmābhiś ca sambandham iha tvaṃ kartum icchasi/
S01divav33u:340: p.17.8ef/.gaccha tvaṃ vṛṣala kṣipraṃ kim asmān avamanyase//
S01divav33u:341: p.18.1ab/.caṇḍālāḥ saha caṇḍālaiḥ pukkaśāḥ saha pukkaśaiḥ/
S01divav33u:342: p.18.1cd/.kurvantīhaiva sambandhaṃ jātibhir jātir eva ca//
S01divav33u:343: p.18.2ab/.brāhmaṇā brāhmaṇaiḥ sārdhaṃ kṣatriyāḥ kṣatriyaiḥ saha/
S01divav33u:344: p.18.2cd/.sārdhaṃ vaiśyās tathā vaiśyaiḥ śūdrāḥ śūdrais tathā saha//
S01divav33u:346: p.18.3cd/.na hi kurvanti caṇḍālāḥ sambandhaṃ brāhmaṇaiḥ saha//
S01divav33u:348: p.18.4cd/.kathaṃ hīnaś ca śreṣṭhena sambandhaṃ kartum icchasi//
S01divav33u:349: p.18.5/.idaṃ punarvacanaṃ śrutvā brāhmaṇasya puṣkarasāriṇas triśaṅkur mātaṅga^rāja idam avocat/
S01divav33u:351: p.18.6cd/.brāhmaṇe vānya^jātau vā na viśeṣo +asti vai tathā//
S01divav33u:353: p.18.7cd/.brāhmaṇe vānya^jātau vā na viśeṣo +asti vai tathā//
S01divav33u:354: p.18.8ab/.na hi brāhmaṇa; ākāśān maruto vā samutthitaḥ/
S01divav33u:355: p.18.8cd/.bhitvā vā pṛthivīṃ jāto jāta^vedā yathāraṇeḥ//
S01divav33u:356: p.18.9ab/.brāhmaṇā yonito jātāś caṇḍālā; api yonitaḥ/
S01divav33u:357: p.18.9cd/.śreṣṭhatve vṛṣalatve ca kiṃ vā paśyasi kāraṇaṃ//
S01divav33u:359: p.18.10cd/.varṇās tathā^eva vā^apy anye kā nu tatra viśeṣatā//
S01divav33u:360: p.19.1ab/.yat kiñ cit pāpakaṃ karma kilviṣaṃ kalir eva ca/
S01divav33u:365: p.19.3cd/.mantrair hi prokṣitāḥ santaḥ svargaṃ gacchanty ajaiḍakāḥ//
S01divav33u:366: p.19.4ab/.yady eṣa mārgaḥ svartāya kasmān na brāhmaṇā hy amī/
S01divav33u:367: p.19.4cd/.ātmānam athavā bandhūn mantraiḥ saṃprokṣayanti vai//
S01divav33u:368: p.19.5ab/.mātaraṃ pitaraṃ ca^eva bhrātaraṃ bhaginīṃ tathā/
S01divav33u:369: p.19.5cd/.putraṃ duhitaraṃ bhāryāṃ dvijā na prokṣayanty amī//
S01divav33u:370: p.19.6ab/.mitraṃ jñātiṃ sakhīṃ vā^api ye vā viṣayavāsinaḥ/
S01divav33u:371: p.19.6cd/.prokṣitās te +api vā mantraiḥ sarve yāsyanti sadgatiṃ//
S01divav33u:372: p.19.7ab/.sarve yajñaiḥ samāhutā gamiṣyanti satāṃ gatiṃ/
S01divav33u:373: p.19.7cd/.paśubhiḥ kiṃ nu bho yaṣṭair ātmānaṃ kiṃ na yakṣyase//
S01divav33u:374: p.19.8ab/.na prokṣaṇair na mantraiś ca svargaṃ gacchanty ajaiḍakāḥ/
S01divav33u:375: p.19.8cd/.na hy eṣa mārgaḥ svargāya mithyāprokṣaṇam ucyate//
S01divav33u:376: p.19.9ab/.brāhmaṇair audracittais tu paryāyo hy eṣa cintitaḥ/
S01divav33u:377: p.19.9cd/.māṃsaṃ khāditukāmais tu prokṣaṇaṃ kalpitaṃ paśoḥ//
S01divav33u:378: p.19.10ab/.anyac ca^ahaṃ pravakṣyāmi brāhmaṇair yat prakalpitaṃ/
S01divav33u:381: p.20.1cd/.brahmāghnatā ca catvāraḥ pātakā brāhmaṇeṣv amī//
S01divav33u:383: p.20.2cd/.suvarṇaṃ yo hared vipraḥ sa tena +abrāhmaṇo bhavet//
S01divav33u:385: p.20.3cd/.surāṃ tu yaḥ pived vipraḥ sa tena^abrāhmaṇo bhavet//
S01divav33u:387: p.20.4cd/.guru^dārāṃ tu yo gacchet sa tena^abrāhmaṇo bhavet//
S01divav33u:388: p.20.5ab/.na hanyād brāhmaṇaṃ hy ekaṃ hanyād anyān anekaśaḥ/
S01divav33u:389: p.20.5cd/.hayātta brāhmaṇaṃ yo vai sa tena^abrāhmaṇo bhavet//
S01divav33u:390: p.20.6ab/.ity ete pātakā hy uktā brāhmaṇeṣu catur^vidhāḥ/
S01divav33u:392: p.20.7ab/.kṛtvā caturṇam ekaikaṃ bhaved abrāhmaṇas tu saḥ/
S01divav33u:393: p.20.7cd/.labhate na ca sāmīcīṃ brāhmaṇāṇāṃ samāgame/
S01divav33u:394: p.20.7ef/.āsanaṃ ca^udakaṃ ca^eva vyutthānaṃ sa na ca^arhati//
S01divav33u:395: p.20.8ab/.tasya niḥsaranaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ brāhmaṇaiḥ patitasya tu/
S01divav33u:396: p.20.8cd/.vrataṃ vai sa samādāya punar brāhmaṇatāṃ vrajet//
S01divav33u:398: p.20.9cd/.khāṭvāṅgam ucchritaṃ kṛtvā mṛtaśīrṣe ca bhojanaṃ//
S01divav33u:400: p.21.1cd/.pūrṇe dvādaśame varṣe punar brāhmaṇatāṃ vrajet//
S01divav33u:401: p.21.2ab/.iti niḥsaraṇaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ brāhmaṇais tu tapasvibhiḥ/
S01divav33u:405: saṃjñāmātrakam idaṃ lokasya yad idam ucyate brāhmaṇa iti vā kṣatriya iti vā vaiśya iti vā śūdra ity vā/
S01divav33u:406: sarvam idam ekam eveti vijñaya putrāya me śārdūlakarṇāya prakṛtiṃ māṇavikāmanuprayaccha bhāryā^arthāya/
S01divav33u:408: idaṃ ca khalu punarvacanaṃ śrutvā triśaṅkor mātaṅga^rājasya
S01divav33u:409: brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārī abhiṣaktaḥ kupitaś caṇḍībhūto +anāttamanāḥ kopaṃ ca dveṣaṃ ca catpratyayaṃ janayitvā lalāṭe triśikhāṃ bhṛkuṭiṃ kṛtvā kaṇṭhaṃ (22)
S01divav33u:410: dhamayitvā +akṣiṇī parivartya nakula^piṅgalāṃ dūṣṭim utpādya triśaṅkuṃ mātaṅga^rājam idam avocat/
S01divav33u:412: p.22.1cd/.ekaiva jātir loke +asmin sāmānyā na pṛthag^vidhā//
S01divav33u:417: tad yathā deśa^dharme vā nagara^dharme vā grāma^dharme vā nigamadhama vā śulka^dharme vā āvāha^dharme vā vivāha^dharme vā pūrva^karmasu vā/
S01divav33u:419: yad uta brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyo vaiśyaḥ śūdra iti/
S01divav33u:420: teṣāṃ vivāha^dharmeṣu catasro bhāryā brāhmaṇasya bhavanti/
S01divav33u:427: śūdrasya av ekā bhāryā bhavati śūdrī eva/
S01divav33u:428: evaṃ brāhmaṇasya vṛṣala catvāraḥ putrā bhavanti/
S01divav33u:429: tad yathā brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyo vaiśyaḥ śūdraś ceti/
S01divav33u:430: kṣatriyasya trayaḥ putrāḥ, kṣatriyo vaiśyaḥ śūdra iti/
S01divav33u:432: śūdra iti/ śūdrasya tv eka eva putro bhavati yad uta śūdra eva/
S01divav33u:438: p.22.5/.brahmaṇā^ayaṃ khalu vṛṣala lokaḥ sarva^bhūtāni nirmitāni/
S01divav33u:439: p.23.1ab/.tasya jyeṣṭhā vayaṃ putrāḥ kṣatriyās tad anantaraṃ/
S01divav33u:442: .sa tvaṃ vṛṣala caturthe +api varṇe na saṃdṛśyase/
S01divav33u:443: ahaṃ ca^agre varṇe śreṣṭhe varṇe parame varṇe pravare varṇe/
S01divav33u:444: paramārthaṃ ca saṃyogamākāṅkṣasi praṇaśya tvaṃ vṛṣala kṣipraṃ /
S01divav33u:447: .idaṃ punarvacanaṃ śrutvā brāhmaṇasya puṣkarasāriṇas triśaṅkur mātaṅga^rāja idam avocat/
S01divav33u:448: idam atra brāhmaṇa śṛṇu yad bravīmi/
S01divav33u:450: p.23.4ab/.tasya jyeṣṭhā vayaṃ putrāḥ kṣatriyās tad anantaraṃ/
S01divav33u:452: p.23.5ab/.sapāda^jaṅghāḥ sanakhāḥ samāṃsāḥ sapārśvapṛṣṭhāś ca narā bhavanti/
S01divav33u:453: p.23.5cd/.ekāṃśato nāsti yato viśeṣo varṇāś ca catvāra ito na santi//
S01divav33u:454: p.23.6ab/.atho viśeṣaḥ pravatosti kaścit tad brūhi yac ca^anumataṃ yathā te/
S01divav33u:455: p.23.6cd/.atho viśeṣaḥ pravaro hi nāsti varṇāś ca catvāra ito na santi//
S01divav33u:456: p.24.1ab/. yathā hi dāurukā bālāḥ krīḍamānā mahā^pathe/
S01divav33u:458: p.24.2ab/.idaṃ kṣīram idaṃ dadhi; idaṃ māṃsam idaṃ ghṛtaṃ/
S01divav33u:459: p.24.2cd/.na ca bālasya vacanāt pāṃśavo +annaṃ bhavanti hi//
S01divav33u:460: p.24.3ab/.varṇās tathāiva catvāro yathā brāhmaṇa bhāṣase/
S01divav33u:461: p.24.3cd/.pāṃśupuñjābhidhānena yogo [yaḥ ko] py eṣa na vidyate//
S01divav33u:462: p.24.4ab/.na keśena na karṇābhyāṃ na śīrṣaṇa na cakṣuṣā/
S01divav33u:463: p.24.4cd/.na mukhena na nāsayā na grīvaya na bāhunā//
S01divav33u:466: p.24.6ab/.na svareṇa na varṇena na sarvāṃśair na maithunaiḥ/
S01divav33u:468: p.24.7ab/.yathā hi jātiṣv anyāsu liṅgaṃ yoniḥ pṛthak pṛthak/
S01divav33u:469: p.24.7cd/.sāmānyaṃ kāraṇaṃ tatra kiṃ vā jātiṣu manyase//
S01divav33u:470: p.24.8ab/.saśīrṣakāś ca^atha narāsthi^yuktāḥ sacarmakāḥ sendriyasodarāś ca/
S01divav33u:471: p.24.8cd/.ekāṃśato nāsti yato viśeṣo varṇā na yuktāś caturo +abhidhātuṃ//
S01divav33u:472: p.24.9ab/.athāsti kaścit pravaro viśeṣas tad brūhi yaccānumataṃ yathā te/
S01divav33u:473: p.24.9cd/.atho viśeṣaḥ pravaro +atra nāsti varṇā na yuktāś caturobhidhātuṃ//
S01divav33u:474: p.25.1ab/.doṣo hy ayaṃ ca^atra bhaved ayukto yad yat tvayā ca^abhihitaṃ nidāne/
S01divav33u:475: p.25.1cd/.śrutvā tu mattaḥ pratipadya saumya yac ca^atra manye śṛṇucodyamānaṃ//
S01divav33u:476: p.25.2ab/.yac ca^atra yuktaṃ viṣamaṃ samaṃ vā tāt te pravakṣyāmi niyujyamānaḥ/
S01divav33u:477: p.25.2cd/.doṣo hi yaś ca^api bhaved ayukto vakṣyāmi te hy uttarata^uttaraṃ ca/
S01divav33u:478: p.25.3ef/.śrutvā tu mattaḥ pratipadya saumya karma^adhipatyaprabhavā manuṣyāḥ//
S01divav33u:481: tatra yad bravīṣi brahmā eka iti tasmāt prajā api eka^jātyā eva/
S01divav33u:483: yac ca vravīṣi brahmaṇā^ayaṃ lokaḥ sarva^bhūtāni ca nirmitāni^iti/
S01divav33u:485: tad idaṃ te brāhmaṇa ayuktaṃ yad bravīṣi catvāro varṇā brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyā śūdrāś ceti/
S01divav33u:487: .api tu brāhmaṇa mithyā mama vaco bhavet yadi brāhmaṇa saṃvādena munuṣyajāter nānā^karaṇaṃ prajñāyate/
S01divav33u:488: yad uta śīrṣato vā mukhato vā karṇato vā nāsikāto vā (26)
S01divav33u:489: bhrūto vā rūpato vā saṃsthānato vā varṇato vā ''kārato vā yonito vā ''hārato vā sambhāvato vā nānā^karaṇaṃ prajñāyate/
S01divav33u:491: .tad yathā^api bhoḥ puṣkarasārin gavāś ca gardabho ṣṭramṛgapakṣyajaiḍakā^nāmaṇḍajajarāyujasaṃsvedajaupapādukānāṃnānā^karanaṃ prajñāyate/
S01divav33u:492: yad uta pādato +api mukhatopi varṇato +api saṃsthānato +api āhārato +api yonisambhavato +api nānā^karaṇaṃ prajñāyate naca^evaṃ teṣāṃ caturṇāṃ varṇānāṃ nānā^karaṇaṃ prajñāyate/
S01divav33u:493: tat tasmāt sarvam idam ekam iti/
S01divav33u:497: yad uta mūlataś ca skandhataś ca tvagbhāgataś ca sārataś ca patrataś ca puṣpataś ca phalataś ca nānā^karaṇaṃ prajñāyate/
S01divav33u:498: na ca^evaṃ caturṇāṃ varṇānāṃ nānā^karaṇaṃ prajñāyate/
S01divav33u:500: .tad yathā brāhmaṇāmīṣāṃ sthalajānāṃ vṛkṣāṇāṃ sāratamālanaktamālakarṇikārassaptaparṇaśirīṣakovidārasyandanacandanaśiṃśapairaṇḍakhadira^ādīnāṃ nānā^karaṇaṃ prajñāyate/
S01divav33u:502: .yad uta mūlataś ca skandhataś ca tvagbhāgataś ca gulmataś ca sārataś ca patrataś ca puṣpataś ca phalataś ca viśeṣa upalabhyate/
S01divav33u:503: na ca^evaṃ caturṇāṃ varṇānāṃ nānā^karaṇaṃ prajñāyate/
S01divav33u:505: .tad yathā bhoḥ puṣkarasārinn amīṣāṃ kṣīravṛkṣāṇām udumbaraplakṣāśvatthanyagrodhavalgukety evam ādīnāṃ nānā^karaṇaṃ prajñāyate/
S01divav33u:506: yad uta mūlataś ca skandhataś ca tvag bhāgataś ca sārataś ca patrataś ca puṣpataś ca phalataś ca nānā^karaṇaṃ prajñāyate/
S01divav33u:507: na tv eva caturṇāṃ varṇānāṃ nānā^karaṇaṃ prajñāyate/
S01divav33u:509_0: .tad yathā puṣkarasārinn amīṣām api phalabaiṣajyavṛkṣāṇām āmalakīharītakīvibhītakī
S01divav33u:509_1: pharasaka^ādīnām anyāsām api vividhānām oṣadhīnāṃ grāma^jānāṃ pārvatīyānāṃ tṛṇa^vanaspatīnāṃ
S01divav33u:510: yad uta mūlataś ca skandhataś ca (27)
S01divav33u:511: gulmataś ca sārataś ca patrataś ca puṣpataś ca phalataś ca nānā^karaṇaṃ prajñāyate/
S01divav33u:515: .tad yathā sthalajānāṃ puṣpa^vṛkṣāṇām atimuktaka^campaka^pāṭalānāṃ sumanā vārṣikādhanaṣkārika^ādīnāṃ nānā^karaṇaṃ prajñāyate/
S01divav33u:516: yad uto rūpato +api varṇato +api gandhato +api saṃsthānato +api nānā^karaṇaṃ prajñāyate/
S01divav33u:517: na tv eva caturṇāṃ varṇānāṃ nānā^karaṇaṃ prajñāyate/
S01divav33u:519: .tad yathā brāhmaṇām īṣām api jalajānāṃ puṣpāṇāṃ padma^utpala^saugandhika^mṛdu^gandhika^ādīnāṃ nānā^karaṇaṃ prajñāyate/
S01divav33u:520: yad uta rūpataś ca gandhataś ca saṃsthānataś ca vaṇataś ca nānā^karaṇaṃ prajñāyate/
S01divav33u:522: tad yathā puṣkarasārin amī brāhmaṇā iti kṣatriyā iti vaiśyā iti śūdrā iti/
S01divav33u:525: p.27.3ab/.apy anyat te pravakṣyāmi brāhmaṇaiḥ kalpitaṃ yath/ā/
S01divav33u:526: p.27.3cd/.śiraḥ satāraṃ gaganam ākāśam udaraṃ tathā//
S01divav33u:527: p.27.4ab/.parvatāś ca^apy ubhāv ūrū pādau ca dharaṇī^talaṃ/
S01divav33u:529: p.27.5ab/.aśrūṇy avocad varṣā +asya nadyaḥ prasrāvam eva ca/
S01divav33u:530: p.27.5cd/.sāgarāś ca^apy amedhyaṃ vai; evaṃ brahmā prajāpatiḥ//
S01divav33u:533: yasmād brahmaṇo brāhmaṇā utpannās tasmāt kṣatriyā api vaiśyā api śūdrā apy utpannāḥ/
S01divav33u:534: p.28.2ab/.evaṃ prasūtir yadi tatvataḥ syāt tato hi syād varṇa^kṛto viśeṣaḥ/
S01divav33u:535: p.28.2cd/.yadi brāhmaṇā brahma^lokaṃ vrajeyus trayaś ca varṇā na vrajeyuḥ svargaṃ/
S01divav33u:536: p.28.2ef/.evaṃ bhaved varṇa^kṛto viśeṣo na cenna catvāro bhavanti varṇāḥ//
S01divav33u:537: p.28.3ab/.yasmād dhi varṇaś caturtha evaṃ prayāti svargaṃ svakṛtena karmaṇā/
S01divav33u:538: p.28.3cd/.yatas tapaś ca^ārṣam iha praśastaṃ tasmād dvijāter na viśeṣaṇaṃ syād//
S01divav33u:539: p.28.4ab/.yadi brāhmaṇaḥ syād ihaika eva dvijihvaś catuḥ^śravaṇas tathā^eva/
S01divav33u:540: p.28.4cd/.catur^viṣāṇo bahupād dviśīrṣa evaṃ kṛte varṇa^kṛto viśeṣaḥ//
S01divav33u:541: p.29.1ab/.rāgaiś ca nāma paraghātanaṃ ca evaṃ prakāraṃ ca viheṭhanaṃ ca/
S01divav33u:542: p.29.1cd/.sattvasya vai karmaṇo dhvaṃsanaṃ ca etāny akalyāṇakṛtāni vipraiḥ//
S01divav33u:543: p.29.2ab/.yuddhaṃ vivādṃ kalahāny abhīkṣṇaṃ goprokṣaṇaṃ cintitaṃ brāhmaṇair hi/
S01divav33u:544: p.29.2cd/.atharvaṇaḥ karmaṇā trāsanaṃ ca etāni mantrāṇi kṛtāni vipraiḥ//
S01divav33u:545: p.29.3ab/.pāpecchatā bahu^jana^vañcanaṃ ca śāṭhyaṃ ca dhaurtyaṃ ca tathā^eva kalpaṃ/
S01divav33u:546: p.29.3cd/.evaṃ pareṣām ahitaṃ vicintya kadā ca te svargam ito vrajeyuḥ//
S01divav33u:547: p.29.4ab/.ye brāhmaṇā ugratapā vinītā vratena śīlena sadā hy upetāḥ/
S01divav33u:548: p.29.4cd/.ahiṃsakā ye dama saṃyame ratās te brāhmaṇā brahma^puraṃ vrajanti//
S01divav33u:549: p.29.5ab/.saha^asthi^māṃsaḥ sanakhaḥ sacarmā duḥkhaṃ sukhaṃ mūtra^purīṣam ekaṃ/
S01divav33u:550: p.29.5cd/.pañca^indriyair nāsti yato viśeṣas tasmān na vai varṇa^catuṣka eṣaḥ//
S01divav33u:552: .tad yathā nāma brāhmaṇa kasya^cit puruṣasya catvāraḥ putrā bhaveyuḥ/
S01divav33u:553: sa teṣāṃ nāmāni kuryān nandaka iti vā jīvaka iti vā aśoka iti vā śatāyur iti vā /
S01divav33u:554: iṣṭāś ca (30) punar bho etasya puruṣasya putrā bhaveyuḥ/
S01divav33u:560: .nāmataḥ punar brāhmaṇa teṣāṃ nānā^karaṇaṃ prajñāyate na jātitaḥ/
S01divav33u:562: iha khalu punar brāhmaṇa pitṛtaḥ putro jāyte/
S01divav33u:564: p.30.2ab/.mātā bhastrā pituḥ putro yena jātaḥ sa eva saḥ/
S01divav33u:565: p.30.2cd/.yady evaṃ bho vijānāsi na te (putrā) parabhūtāḥ kvacit//
S01divav33u:566: p.30.3/.parīkṣasva brāhmaṇa saṃyageva ko +atra brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyo vaiśyaḥ śūtra iti/
S01divav33u:567: p.30.4ab/.sarve kāṇāś ca kubjāś ca sarve +apasmāriṇopi vā/
S01divav33u:568: p.30.4cd/.kilāsinaḥ kuṣṭhinaś ca gaurāḥ kṛṣṇāḥ pṛthak pṛthak//
S01divav33u:571: evaṃ gate brāhmaṇa naiva bhavati viśeṣaḥ/
S01divav33u:573: p.30.6/.yasmān na jāter viśeṣaṇo +asti tasmān na vai varṇa^catuṣka eva/
S01divav33u:575: .tasmāt te brāhmaṇa bravīmi saṃjñāmātram idaṃ lokasya yad idaṃ brāhmaṇa iti vā kṣatriya iti vā vaiśya iti vā śūdra iti vā caṇḍāla iti vā/
S01divav33u:577: putrāya me śārdūlakarṇāya prakṛtiṃ duhitaram utsṛja bhāryā^arthāya yāvantaṃ kula^śulkaṃ manyase tāvantam anupradāsyāmi/
S01divav33u:579: .idaṃ punarvacanaṃ śrutvā triśaṅkor mātaṅga^rājasya brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārīdam avocat/
S01divav33u:585: adhyātmam api mṛgacakraṃ vā nakṣatra^gaṇo vā tithi^kramagaṇo vā tvayādhītaḥ/
S01divav33u:589: athavā rāhucairtaṃ vā śukra^caritaṃ vā grahacaritaṃ vā tvayādhītaṃ/
S01divav33u:590: athavā lokāyateṃ bhavatā bhāṣyapravacanaṃ vā pakṣādhyāyo vā nyāyo vā tvayādhītaḥ/
S01divav33u:592: .evam ukte triśaṅkur mātaṅga^rāhaḥ puṣkarasāriṇaṃ brāhmaṇam etad avocat/
S01divav33u:593: etac ca mayā brāhmaṇādhītaṃ bhūyaś ca^uttaraṃ /
S01divav33u:594: yad api te brāhmaṇa evaṃ syād aham asmi mantreṣu pāraṃ prāpta iti/
S01divav33u:595: tatra te brāhmaṇa saha dharmeṇānumānaṃ pravakṣyāmi/
S01divav33u:596: na khalv evaṃ brāhmaṇa prāthamakalpikānāṃ sattvānām etad abhavat/
S01divav33u:597: yad uta brāhmaṇa iti vā kṣatriya iti vā vaiśya
S01divav33u:598: iti vā śūdra iti vā/ ekam idaṃ sarvam idam ekaṃ/
S01divav33u:600: .atha brāhmaṇa sattvānāmasadṛśānāṃ ca^ubhayathā sadṛśānāṃ tato +anye sattvāḥ śālikṣetrāṇi kelāyanti gopāyanti vāpayanti vā/
S01divav33u:602: athātra brāhmaṇa tad anyatamānāṃ sattānām etad abhavat/
S01divav33u:603: parigraho rogaḥ parigraho gaṇḍaḥ parigrahaḥ śalyaḥ/
S01divav33u:605: tṛṇa^kāṣṭhaśākhāparṇapalāśakānupasaṃhṛtya tṛṇa^kuṭikāṃ vā parṇakuṭikāṃ vā kṛtvā praviśya dhyāyena iti/
S01divav33u:607: .atha te sattvās taṃ svakaṃ parigraham apahāyāraṇyāyatanaṃ gatvā tṛṇa^kāṣṭhaśākhāpatraparṇapalāśakais tṛṇa^kuṭiṃ vā parṇakuṭikāṃ vā kṛtvā tatra^eva praviśya dhyāyanti sma/
S01divav33u:608: te tatra sāyam āsanahetoḥ prāntavāṭikāṃ prātaraśanahetoś ca grāmaṃ piṇḍāya praviśanti sma/
S01divav33u:611: duṣkarakārakā vata bhoḥ sattvā ye svakaṃ parigraham utṛjya grāma^nigamajana^padebhyo bahir nirgatās teṣāṃ bahirmanaskā brāhyaṇā iti saṃjñā udapādi/
S01divav33u:612: te ca punar grāma^vāsinaḥ sattvās tān atīva satkurvanti sma/
S01divav33u:615: .atha teṣām eva sattvānām anyatame sattvās tāni dhyānāny asaṃbhāvayanto grāmeṣv avatīrya mantra^padān svādhyāyanti sma/
S01divav33u:616: tāṃs te grāma^nivāsina āhuḥ --- na levalam ime sattvā ime +adhyāpakāḥ,
S01divav33u:617: teṣām adhyāpakā iti loke saṃjñā udapādi/
S01divav33u:619: .ayaṃ hetur ayaṃ pratyayo brāhmaṇānāṃ loke prādurbhāvāya/
S01divav33u:620: athānyatame sattvā viveka^kāla^pratisaṃyuktān karma^antān vividhān artha^pratisaṃyuktān kurvanti sma/
S01divav33u:623: .athānyatame sattvāḥ kṣudreṇa karmaṇā jīvikāṃ kalpayanti sma/
S01divav33u:626: .bhūta^pūrvaṃ brāhamṇa anyatamaḥ sattvo vadhūm ādāya ratham āruhyānyatam asminn araṇyapradeśe gataḥ/
S01divav33u:628: tasmān mātaṅgama [mā tvaṃ gamaḥ] iti saṃjñā udapādi/
S01divav33u:630: .kṣetraṃ karṣanti ye teṣāṃ karṣakā iti saṃjñā prvṛttā/
S01divav33u:631: bhāṣyeṇa ca parṣadaṃ rañjayati dharmeṇa śīlabratasamācāreṇa samyak, tasya rājā iti saṃjñā +abhūt/
S01divav33u:633: .tato +anye sattvā vāṇijyayā jīvikāṃ kalpayanti teṣāṃ vaṇija iti saṃjñā (34) udapādi/
S01divav33u:635: pravrajitvā parān jayanti kleśān jayanti^iti teṣāṃ pravrajitā iti loke saṃjñā udapādi/
S01divav33u:636: p.34.1/.api tu brāhmaṇa ekaiva saṃjñā loka udapādi/ tāṃ te pravakṣyāmi/
S01divav33u:644: śukaḥ paṇḍitaś ca vedān vibhajati sma/
S01divav33u:645: tad yathā puṣyo bahv^ṛcānāṃ paṃktiś chantogānām eka^viṃśatir adhvaryavaḥ/
S01divav33u:650: tad yathā śuklā valkalā māṇḍavyā iti/
S01divav33u:659: paṃktir ety ekā bhūtvā sa^aśīti^sahasradhā bhinnā/
S01divav33u:660: tad yathā śīlavalkā araṇemikā laukākṣāḥ kauthumā brahma^samā mahā^samā mahā^yāgikāḥ sa^atyam ugrāḥ samanta^vedāḥ/
S01divav33u:672: paṃktir ity ekā bhūtvā sa^aśīti sahasradhā bhinnā/
S01divav33u:675: ete brāhmaṇā eka^viṃśaty adhvaryavo bhūtvā eka^uttaraśatadhā bhinnāḥ/
S01divav33u:676: tad yathā kaṭhāḥ kaṃinā vājasaneyino jātukarṇāḥ proṣṭhapadā ṛṣayaḥ/
S01divav33u:677: tatra daśa kaṭhā daśa kaṇimā ekādaśa vājasaneyinaḥ/
S01divav33u:694: .anumānam api brāhmaṇa pramāṇaṃ pratītya etāni dvādaśa^bhedaśatāni ṣoḍaśabhedāś ca ye brāhmaṇaiḥ paurāṇaiḥ samyag dṛṣṭāḥ/
S01divav33u:695: chandasi vā vyākaraṇe vā lokāyate vā (37) padamīmāṃsāyāṃ vā na caiṣāmūhāpohaḥ prajñāyate/
S01divav33u:696: yad uta eka^jātyo nāmeti viditvā bandhur bhavitum arhati/
S01divav33u:697: tat te vrāhmaṇa bravīmi saṃjñāmātrakam etal lokasya yad uta brāhmaṇa iti vā kṣatriya
S01divav33u:698: iti vā vaiśya iti vā śūdra iti vā/
S01divav33u:700: putrāya me śārdūlakarṇāya prakṛtiṃ duhitaram utsṛja bhāryā^arthāya yāvantaṃ kula^śulkaṃ manyase tāvantam anupradāsyāmi/
S01divav33u:702: .idaṃ punarvacanaṃ śrutvā triśaṅkor mātaṅga^rājasya brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārī tuṣṇīṃbhūto madgubhūtaḥ srastaskandho +adhomukho niṣpratibhaḥ pradhyānaparo +asthāt/
S01divav33u:704: .dadarśa triśaṅkur mātaṅga^rājo brāhmaṇaṃ puṣkarasāriṇaṃ tṛṣṇīṃbhūtaṃ madgubhūtaṃ srasta^skandham adhomukhaṃ niṣpratibhaṃ pradhyānaparaṃ sthitaṃ/
S01divav33u:706: yad api te brāhmaṇa evaṃ syād asadṛśena saha sambandho bhaviṣyati^iti/
S01divav33u:710: lokasya te mama putrasya śārdūlakarṇasya saṃvidyante/
S01divav33u:711: yad api te brāhmaṇa evaṃ syāt --- ye vājapiyaṃ yajñaṃ yajanti/
S01divav33u:712: aśvamedhaṃ puruṣa^medhaṃ śāmyaprāśaṃ nirargaḍaṃ yajñaṃ yajanti,
S01divav33u:713: sarve te kāyasya bhedātsugatau svarga^loke deveṣūpapadyanta iti/
S01divav33u:716: vājapeyaṃ brāhmaṇa yajñaṃ yajamānā aśvamedhaṃ puruṣa^medhaṃ
S01divav33u:717: śāmyaprāśaṃ nirargaḍaṃ yajñaṃ ca yajamānā bahudhā mantrān pravartayantaḥ prāṇihiṃsāṃ ca pravartayanti/
S01divav33u:718: tasmāt te brāhmaṇa bravīmi na hy eṣa mārgaḥ svargāya/
S01divav33u:719: ahaṃ te brāhmaṇa mārgaṃ svargāya vyākhāmi/ tac chṛṇu/
S01divav33u:721: p.38.1cd/.praśaṃsāṃ vitta^lābhaṃ ca pretya svarge ca modanaṃ//
S01divav33u:723: .yair brāhmaṇa itaḥ pūrvaṃ vājapeyo yajña iṣṭaḥ/
S01divav33u:724: yair aśvamedho yaiḥ puruṣa^medho yaiḥ śāmyaprāśo yair nirargaḍo yajña iṣṭaḥ,
S01divav33u:725: parigṛhītas tair nirargalaṃ ca kāmaiḥ kāmaḥ/
S01divav33u:727: ye brāhmaṇa itaḥ paścād vājapeyaṃ yajñaṃ yakṣyanti ye +aśvamedhaṃ puruṣa^medhaṃ ye śāmyaprāśaṃ nirargaḍaṃ yajñaṃ yakṣyanti te nirarthakaṃ mahā^vighātaṃ saṃyokṣyanti/
S01divav33u:729: .tasmāt te brāhmana bravīmi --- ehi tvaṃ mayā sārdhaṃ sambandhaṃ yojayasvā/
S01divav33u:731: dharmeṇa hi caṇḍālā ajugupsanīyā bhavanti/ api ca/
S01divav33u:732: p.39.1ab/.śraddhā śīlaṃ tapastyāgaḥ śrutir jñānaṃ dayaiva ca/
S01divav33u:736: tad ebhir aṣṭābhiḥ prakāraiḥ svargagamanam iṣyate/
S01divav33u:737: ye prāyeṇa jānanti viśeṣeṇa khalv apy anekair vividhari yajñaiḥ/
S01divav33u:738: aṣṭau cemā brāhmaṇa nirdiṣṭā mātṛtulyā bhaginyo loke pravartante/
S01divav33u:745: mātā sarva^bījānāṃ/ marutāṃ mahāmahaḥ/ mahā^kāśyapaṃ manasā vidanti ṛṣayaḥ/
S01divav33u:747: .atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin brāhmaṇānāṃ saptagotrāṇi vyākhyāsyāmi tāni śrūyantāṃ/
S01divav33u:748: tad yathā gautamā vātsyāḥ kautsāḥ kauśikāḥ kāśyapā vāśiṣṭhā māṇḍavyā ity etāni brāhmaṇa saptagotrāṇi/
S01divav33u:750: atra ye gautamās te kauthumāste gargās te bharadvājāsta ārṣṭiṣeṇās te vaikhānasās te (40) vajrapādāḥ/
S01divav33u:752: te maitreyās te bhārgavās te sāvarṇyā ste salolās te bahujātāḥ/
S01divav33u:753: tatra ye kautsās te maudgalyāyanās te gauṇāyanās te lāṅgalāste lagnāste daṇḍalagnāste soma^bhuvāḥ[vah}/
S01divav33u:754: tatra ye kauśikās te kātyāyanās te darbhakātyāyanās te valkalinas te pakṣiṇas te laukākṣās te lohita^āyanāḥ (lohityāyanāḥ) /
S01divav33u:755: tatra ye kāśyapās te maṇḍanās te iṣṭās te śauṇḍāyanās te rocaneyās
S01divav33u:757: tatra ye vaḥśiṣṭhās te jātukarṇyās te dhānyāyanās te pārāśarās te vyāghranakhās ta āṇḍāyanasta aupamanyavāḥ/
S01divav33u:758: tatra ye māṇḍavyās te bhāṇḍāyanās te dhaumrāyaṇās te kātyāyanās te khalv avāhanās te sugandhārāyaṇās te kāpiṣṭhalāyanāḥ/
S01divav33u:760: .ity etāni brāhmaṇa evam ekonapañcāśad gotrāṇi brāhmaṇaiḥ paurāṇaiḥ samyag dṛṣṭāni chandasi vyākaraṇe padamīmāṃsāyāṃ/
S01divav33u:761: anyāni ca gotrāṇi vistarato mayā vācitāni/
S01divav33u:764: .yad utaikatvam iti viditvā bhavān bandhur bhavitum arhati/
S01divav33u:765: tasmāt te brāhmaṇa bravīmi sāmānyaṃ saṃjñāmātrakam idaṃ lokasya yad uta brāhmaṇa iti vā kṣatriya iti vā vaiśya iti vā śūdra iti vā/
S01divav33u:767: pppppputrāya me śārdūlakarṇāya prakṛtiṃduhitaram utsṛja bhāryā^arthāya/
S01divav33u:770: .idaṃ punarvacanaṃ śrutvā triśaṅkor mātaṅga^rājasya brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārī tṛṣṇīṃ bhūto madgubhūtaḥ srastaskandho +adhomukho niṣpratibhaḥ pradhyānaparaḥ sthito +abhūt/
S01divav33u:771: adrākṣīt triśaṅkur mātaṅga^rājaḥ puṣkarasāriṇaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ tūṣṇīṃ bhūtaṃ madgubhūtaṃ srastaskandham abhomukhaṃ niṣpratibhaṃ pradhyānaparaṃ sthitaṃ/
S01divav33u:773: p.41.2ab/.yādṛśaṃ vāpyate bījaṃ tādṛśaṃ labhyate phalaṃ/
S01divav33u:774: p.41.2cd/.prajāpater hi caikatve nirviśeṣo bhavaty ataḥ//
S01divav33u:775: p.41.3ab/.na ca^indriyāṇāṃ nānātvaṃ kriyābhedaś ca dṛśyate/
S01divav33u:776: p.41.3cd/.brāhmaṇe vānya^jātau vā naiṣāṃ kiñcid viśiṣyate//
S01divav33u:777: p.41.4ab/.na hy ātmanaḥ samutkarṣaḥ śreṣṭha tvam iha yujyate/
S01divav33u:780: p.41.5cd/.bhavet te bhaginī bhāryā naitad brāhmaṇa yujyate//
S01divav33u:781: p.41.6ab/.yadi tāvad ayaṃ loko brahmaṇā janitaḥ svayaṃ/
S01divav33u:783: p.41.7ab/.atha vaiśyasya vaiśyā vai śūdrā śūdrasya vā punaḥ/
S01divav33u:784: p.41.7cd/.na bhāryā bhaginī yuktā brahmaṇā janitā yadi//
S01divav33u:785: p.41.8ab/.na sattvā brahmaṇo jātāḥ kleśajāḥ karmajāstvamī/
S01divav33u:786: p.41.8cd/.nīcaiś ca^uccaiś ca dūśyante sattvā nānā^āśrayāḥ pṛthak//
S01divav33u:787: p.41.9ab/.teṣāṃ ca jātisāmānyād brāhmaṇe kṣatriye tathā/
S01divav33u:788: p.41.9cd/.atha vaiśye ca śūdre ca samaṃ jñānaṃ pravartate//
S01divav33u:790: p.42.1cd/.itihāso nighaṇṭaś ca kutaś chando nirarthakaṃ//
S01divav33u:791: p.42.2ab/.asmākam apy adhyayane maitrī vidyā tathā śikhī/
S01divav33u:793: p.42.3ab/.manojavā ca gāndhārī ghorī vidyā vaśaṅkarī/
S01divav33u:794: p.42.3cd/.kāka^vāṇī ca mantraṃ ca; indrajālaṃ ca bhañjanī//
S01divav33u:796: p.42.4cd/.maṇi^puṣpāś ca; ṛṣayo bhāsvarāś ca maharṣayaḥ//
S01divav33u:800: p.42.6cd/.na hy asau brāhmaṇīputraḥ kiṃ vā brāhmaṇa manyase//
S01divav33u:803: p.43.2ab/.na hy asau brāhmaṇīputraḥ kiṃ vā brāhmaṇa vakṣyasi//
S01divav33u:804: p.43.2cd/.kṣatriyā reṇukā nāma jajñe rāmaṃ mahā^muniṃ/
S01divav33u:806: p.43.3ab/.na hy asau brāhmaṇīputraḥ kiṃ vā brāhmaṇa vakṣyasi//
S01divav33u:807: p.43.3cd/.ye ca te manujā; āsan tejasā tapasā yutāḥ/
S01divav33u:808: p.43.4ab/.paṇḍitāś ca vinītāś ca loke ca; ṛṣisammatāḥ/
S01divav33u:809: p.43.4cd/.na hi te brāhmaṇīputrāḥ kiṃ vā brāhmaṇa vakṣyasi//
S01divav33u:810: p.43.5ab/.saṃjñā kṛteyaṃ lokasya brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyās tathā/
S01divav33u:811: p.43.5cd/.vaiśyāx ca^eva tathā śūdrāḥ saṃjñeyaṃ saṃprakīrtitā//
S01divav33u:813: .tasmāt te brāhmaṇa bravīmi saṃjñāmātrakam idaṃlokasya yad uta brāhmaṇa iti vā kṣatriya iti vā vaiśya iti vā śūdara iti vā/
S01divav33u:815: putrāya me (44) śārdūlakarṇāya prakṛtiṃ duhitaram anuprayaccha bharyarthāya/
S01divav33u:818: .idaṃ ca punarvacanaṃ śrutvā triśaṅkor mātaṅga^rājasya bbrāhmaṇaḥ puskarasārī triśaṅkuṃ mātaṅga^rājam idam avocat/
S01divav33u:827: tad yathā vātsyāḥ kautsyā bharadvājāś ca/
S01divav33u:853: atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin sotpattikāṃ sāvitrīṃ pravakṣyāmi/ tac chrūyatāṃ/
S01divav33u:858: tena tatra takṣakaduhitā kapilā nāma āsāditā bhāryā^arthaṃ/
S01divav33u:859: sa tatra saṃrakta^cittas tayā kanyayā sārdhaṃ maithunam agacchat/
S01divav33u:860: sa ṛṣi (45) ṛddhyā bhraṣṭo dhyānebhyo vañcitaḥ/
S01divav33u:861: ṛddhiparihīnaḥ sa vipratisārī ātmano duścaritaṃ vigarhamāṇas tasyāṃ
S01divav33u:862: velāyāṃ sāvitrīṃ bhāṣate sma/ tad yathā/
S01divav33u:863: p.45.1/.oṃ bhūr bhuvaḥ svaḥ/ tat savitur vareṇyaṃ bhargo devasya dhīmahi/ dhiyo yo naḥ pracodayāt/
S01divav33u:865: .iti hi brāhmaṇa ajñāna^śodhanārtham imam eva mantraṃ sa brāhmaṇo divā^rātraṃ japati sma/
S01divav33u:869: p.45.3cd/.gambhīrāv abhāse tatra hy ātmārāmas taporataḥ/
S01divav33u:870: p.45.4/.devasya śreṣṭhakaṃ bhījanam apanābhyo paviṣṭa imaṃmantram ajapat/ iyaṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ sāvitrī/
S01divav33u:871: p.45.5/.oṃ citraṃ hi vaiśyakanyakā/ atha sā kanyā arthataḥ pravīṇā/
S01divav33u:879: p.46.2ab/.kāmā hi loke paramāḥ prajānāṃ kleśaprahāṇe bhūtā antarāyāḥ/
S01divav33u:880: p.46.2cd/.tasmād bhavantaḥ prajahantu kāmān tato +atulaṃ prāpsy atha brahma^lokaṃ/
S01divav33u:882: .itīyaṃ brāhmaṇa brahmaṇā sahāpatinā sāvitrī bhāṣitā, pūrvakaiś ca samyak saṃbuddhair abhyanumoditā/
S01divav33u:888: śrūyatāṃ bhoḥ puṣkarasārin nakṣatra^vaṃśaṃ kathayiṣyāmi/ tad yathā/
S01divav33u:890_0: .kṛttikā rohiṇī mṛgaśirā ārdrā punarvashḥ puṣyaḥ aśleṣā maghā pūrvaphalgunī uttaraphalgunī
S01divav33u:890_1: hastā citrā svātī viśākhā anurādhā jyeṣṭhā mūlā pūrvāṣāḍhā uttarāṣāḍhā abhijit śravaṇā
S01divav33u:890_2: dhaniṣṭhā śatabhiṣā pūrvabhādrapadā uttarabhādrapadā revatī aśvinī bharaṇī /
S01divav33u:892: p.46.6/.kati^tārakāṇi kati^saṃsthānāni kati^muhūrta^yogāni kim^āhārāṇi kiṃ^daivatāni kiṃ^gotrāṇi/
S01divav33u:894: .kṛttikā bhoḥ puṣkarasārin nakṣatraṃ ṣaṭtāraṃ kṣura^saṃsthānaṃ triṃśan^muhūrta^yogaṃ (47)
S01divav33u:896: rohiṇī^nakṣatraṃ pañca^tārakaṃ śakaṭākṛti^saṃsthānaṃ pañca^catvāriṃśan^muhūrta^yogaṃ mṛgamāṃsāhāraṃ prajāpati^daivataṃ bhāradvājaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divav33u:899: ārdra^nakṣatram eka^tāraṃ tilaka^saṃsthānaṃ pañca^daśa^muhūrta^yogaṃ sarpirmaṇḍāhāraṃ sūrya^daivataṃ hārītītāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divav33u:904: aśleṣā^nakṣatram eka^tāraṃ tilaka^saṃsthānaṃ pañca^daśa^muhūrta^yogaṃ pāyasa^bhojanaṃ sarpa^daivataṃ maitrāyaṇīyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divav33u:908: pañca^tāraṃ nadī^kubja^saṃsthānaṃ triśan^muhūrta^yogaṃ tila^kṛsarāhāraṃ pitṛdaivataṃ piṅgalāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divav33u:909: pūrvaphalgunī^nakṣatraṃ dvitāraṃ padaka^saṃsthānaṃ triśan muhūrta^yogaṃ vilvabhojanaṃ bhavadevataṃ gautamīyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divav33u:911: padaka^saṃsthānaṃ pañca^catvāriṃśan^muhūrta^yogaṃ godhūmamatsyāhāram aryamādaivataṃ kauśikaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divav33u:912: hasta^nakṣatraṃ pañca^tāraṃ hasta^saṃsthānaṃ triṃśan^muhūrta^yogaṃ śyāmākabhojanaṃ sūrya^daivataṃ kāśyapaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divav33u:913: citrā^nakṣatram eka^tāraṃ tilaka^saṃsthānaṃ triṃśan^muhūrta^yogaṃ mudgakṛsaraghṛta^pūpāhāraṃ tvaṣṭṛdaivataṃ kātyāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divav33u:915: .svātī^nakṣatram eka^tāraṃ tilaka^saṃsthānaṃ pañca^daśa^muhūrta^yogaṃ mudgakṛsaraphalāhāraṃ vāyudaivataṃ kātyāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divav33u:916: viśākhā^nakṣatraṃ dvitāraṃ viṣāṇa^saṃsthānaṃ pañca^catvāriṃśan^muhūrta^yogaṃ tila^puṣpāhāram indrāgnidaivataṃ śāṃkhāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divav33u:917: p.49.1.ity etāni bhoḥ puṣkarasārin sapta^nakṣatrāṇi dakṣiṇādvārakāṇi/
S01divav33u:919: .anurādhā^nakṣatraṃ catustāraṃ ratnābalī^saṃsthānaṃ triśan^muhūrta^yogaṃ surāmāṃsāhāraṃ mitradaivatam ālaṃbāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divav33u:920: jyeṣṭhā^nakṣatraṃ tritāraṃ yavamadhya^saṃsthānaṃ pañca^daśa^muhūrta^yogaṃ śāliyavāgubhojanam indradaivataṃ dīrghakātyāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divav33u:921: mūla^nakṣatraṃ saptatāraṃ vṛścika^saṃsthānaṃ triśan^muhūrta^yogaṃ mūlaphalāhāraṃ nairṛtidaivataṃ
S01divav33u:923: pūrvāṣāḍhā^nakṣatraṃ catustāraṃ govikrama^saṃsthānaṃ triśan^muhūrta^yogaṃ nyagrodhakaṣāyāhāraṃ toyadaivataṃ darbhakātyāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divav33u:924: uttarāṣāḍhā^nakṣatraṃ catustāraṃ gajavikrama^saṃsthānaṃ pañca^catvāriṃśan^muhūrta^yogaṃ madhu^lājāhāraṃ viśva^daivataṃ maudgalāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divav33u:927: śravaṇā^nakṣatraṃ tritāraṃ yavamadhya^saṃsthānaṃ triṃśan^muhūrta^yogaṃ pakṣimāṃsāhāraṃ viṣṇudaivataṃ kātyāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divav33u:928: p.50.1/.ity etāni bhoḥ puṣkarasārin sapta^nakṣatrāṇi paścimadvārakāṇi/
S01divav33u:930: .dhaniṣṭhā^nakṣatraṃ catustāraṃ śakuna^saṃsthānaṃ triṃśan^muhūrta^yogaṃ kulatthapūpāhāraṃ vasudaivataṃ kauṇḍinyāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divav33u:931: śatabhiṣā^nakṣatram eka^tāraṃ tilaka^saṃsthānaṃ pañca^daśa^muhūrta^yogaṃ yavāgubhojanaṃ varuṇadaivataṃ tāṇḍyāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divav33u:936: revatī^nakṣatram eka^tāraṃ tilaka^saṃsthānaṃ triśan^muhūrta^yogaṃ dadhyāhāraṃ pūṣadaivatam aṣṭabhaginīyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divav33u:939: bharaṇī^nakṣatraṃ tritāraṃ bhaga^saṃsthānaṃ triṃśan^muhūrta^yogaṃ tila^taṇḍūlāhāraṃ yamadaivataṃ bhārgavīyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divav33u:940: p.51.1/.ity etāni bhoḥ puṣkarasārin sapta^nakṣatrāṇi uttara^dvārakāṇi/
S01divav33u:942: .amīṣāṃ bhoḥ pppuṣkarasārinn aṣṭāviṃśatīnāṃ nakṣatrāṇāṃ ṣaṇ^nakṣatrāṇi pañca^catvāriṃśan^muhūrta^yogāni/
S01divav33u:944: rohiṇī punarvasu uttaraphalgunī viśākhā uttarāṣāḍhā uttarabhādrapadā ceti/
S01divav33u:948: ārdrā aśleṣā svātī jyeṣṭhā śatabhiṣā ceti/
S01divav33u:952: .amīṣāṃ bhoḥ puṣkarasārin saptānāṃ nakṣatrāṇāṃ pūrva^dvārikāṇāṃ kṛttikā prathamā nāmāśleṣā paścimā nāma/
S01divav33u:953: amīṣāṃ saptānāṃ nakṣatrāṇāṃ dakṣiṇa^dvārikāṇāṃ maghā prathamā nāma viśākhā paścimā nāma/
S01divav33u:954: amīṣāṃ paścimadvārikāṇāṃ saptānāṃ nakṣatrāṇām anurādhā prathamā nāma śravaṇā paścimā nāma/
S01divav33u:955: amīṣāṃ saptānāṃ nakṣatrāṇām uttara^dvārikāṇāṃ dhaniṣṭhā prathamā
S01divav33u:958: .amīṣāṃ bhoḥ puṣkarasārinn aṣṭāviṃśatīnāṃ nakṣatrāṇāṃ sapta balāni/
S01divav33u:960: yad uta trīṇi pūrvāṇi viśākhānurādhā punarvashḥ svātiś ca/
S01divav33u:964: yad uta trīṇi uttarāṇi rohiṇī ceti/
S01divav33u:966: śravaṇā dhaniṣṭhā śatabhiṣā jyeṣṭhā mūlā iti/
S01divav33u:969: abhijic ceti/ catvāri kṣipra^karaṇīyāni/ yad uta kṛttikā mṛgaśirā puṣyā aśvinī ceti/
S01divav33u:972: .amīṣāṃ bhoḥ puṣkarasārinn aṣṭaviṃśatīnāṃ nakṣatrāṇāṃ trayo yogā bhavanti/
S01divav33u:976: tatra nakṣatraṃ yadi purastād gacchati candraś ca pṛṣṭhataḥ, ayam ucyate ṛṣabhānusārī yoga iti/
S01divav33u:977: yad uta candraḥ purastād gacchati nakṣatraṃ ca pṛṣṭhataḥ, tadā bhavati vatsānusārī yogaḥ/
S01divav33u:979: samau yugapad gacchataḥ, tadāyam ucyate yuganaddho yoga iti/
S01divav33u:982: .atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin grahān pravakṣyāmi tac chrūyatāṃ/
S01divav33u:983: tad yathā śukro bṛhaspatiḥ śanaiścaro budho +aṅgārakaḥ sūryas tārādhipatiś ceti/
S01divav33u:986: .evaṃ viparivartamāne loke nakṣatreṣu pravibhakteṣu kathaṃ rātridivasānāṃ hrāso vṛddhiś ca bhavati/ tad ucyate/
S01divav33u:988: .hemantānāṃ dvitīye māsi rohiṇyām aṣṭamyāṃ dvādaśa^muhūrto divaso bhavati/
S01divav33u:990: grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse rohiṇyām aṣṭamyām aṣṭādaśa^muhūrto divaso bhavati/
S01divav33u:992: varṣāṇāṃ paścime māse rohiṇyām aṣṭamyāṃ catur^daśa^muhūrto divaso bhavati/
S01divav33u:1003: p.54.1/.kiṃ bhos triśaṅko kṣaṇasya parimāṇaṃ / kiṃ lavasya/ kiṃ muhūrtasya/
S01divav33u:1005: .tad yathā bhoḥ puṣkarasārin striyā nātidīrghahrasvaḥ kartinyāḥ sūtrodyāmaḥ/
S01divav33u:1010: etena kramasambandhena triṃśan^muhūrtam ekaṃ rātridivasam anumīyate/
S01divav33u:1013: .āditya udayati ṣaṇṇavati^pauruṣāyāṃ chāyāyāṃ caturojā nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divav33u:1014: ṣaṣṭipauruṣāyāṃ chāyāyāṃ śveto nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divav33u:1015: dvādaśa^pauruṣāyāṃ chāyāyāṃ samṛddho nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divav33u:1016: ṣaṭpauruṣāyāṃ chāyāyāṃ śarapatho nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divav33u:1019: catuḥ^pauruṣāyāṃ chāyāyām udgato nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divav33u:1020: tripauruṣāyāṃ chāyāyāṃ sumukho nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divav33u:1021: sthite madhyāhne vajrako nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divav33u:1022: parivṛtte madhyāhne tripuruṣāyāṃ chāyāyāṃ rohito nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divav33u:1029: avataramāṇa āditye ṣaṇṇavati^pauruṣāyāṃ chāyāyāṃ parabhayo nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divav33u:1032: .atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin rātryā muhūrtāni vyākhyāsyāmi/
S01divav33u:1035: saṃyamo nāma muhūrtaḥ (56) sāṃpraiyako nāma muhūrtaḥ/
S01divav33u:1040: atikrānte +ardharātre brahmā nāma muhūrtaḥ/ ditir nāma
S01divav33u:1045: iti bhoḥ puṣkarasārin imāni triśan muhūrtāni yair aho^rātraṃ prajñāyate/
S01divav33u:1051: tad yathā striyā nātidīrghahrasvaḥ kartinyāḥ sūtrodyāmaḥ/
S01divav33u:1060: sumukho vajrako rohito balo vijayaḥ sarva^raso vasuḥ sundaraḥ para^bhayaḥ/
S01divav33u:1061: raudras tārāvacaraḥ saṃyamaḥ sāṃpraiyako +annanto gardabho rākṣaso +avayavo brahmā ditir arko vidhamano āgneya ātapāgnir abhijit/
S01divav33u:1064: p.57.2ab/.kālotpattim api te brāhmaṇa vakṣyāmi śṛṇu/
S01divav33u:1065: p.57.2cd/.kālasya kiṃ pramāṇam iti tad ucyate/
S01divav33u:1072: p.57.4/.nāḍikāyāḥ punaḥ kiṃ pramāṇaṃ/ tad ucyate/
S01divav33u:1080: yadā ca^evaṃ śīryeta tat toyaṃ ghaṭasya tadaikā nāḍikā/
S01divav33u:1081: etena nālikāpramāṇena vibhakte dve nāḍika eko muhūrtaḥ/
S01divav33u:1082: etena bho brāhmaṇa triṃśan muhūrtāḥ/ yai
S01divav33u:1092: .etena punarakṣinimeṣeṇa ṣoḍaśakoṭayo +aṣṭapañcāśac ca śata^sahasrāṇi aṣṭāśīti^sahasrāṇi sa evaṃ māpitaḥ/
S01divav33u:1114: .paramāṇūnāṃ koṭiśata^sahasrāṇi catur^viṃśatiś caikonatriṃśatkoṭi^sahasrāṇi dvādaśa ca śata^sahasrāṇi/
S01divav33u:1116: p.59.2/.śṛṇu brāhmaṇa suvarṇasya parimāṇotpattiṃ/ tatkathayatu bhavān/
S01divav33u:1121: dve koṭī pañca^viṃśatiś ca sahasrāṇi pañca^śatāny aṣṭau ca paramāṇavaḥ/
S01divav33u:1127: paramāṇūnām aṣṭakoṭayaḥ saptacatvāriṃśac ca śata^sahasrāṇi sapta ca sahasrāṇi dve śate +aśītiś ca paramāṇavaḥ/
S01divav33u:1128: evaṃ māpitaṃ brāhmaṇa palasya parimāṇam iti/
S01divav33u:1135: dve koṭiśate tisraś ca koṭaya ekonatiṃśac ca śata^sahasrāṇi catuḥsaptati (60)
S01divav33u:1136: sahasrāṇi sapta ca śatāni viṃśatiś ca paramāṇavaḥ/
S01divav33u:1143: koṭiśatam aṣṭapañcāśac ca koṭayo dvir aśītiś ca śata sahasrāṇi eka^ṣaṣṭiś ca sahasrāṇi pañca^śatāni triṃśac ca paramāṇavaḥ/
S01divav33u:1144: evaṃ māpitaṃ brāhmaṇa dhānyasya parimāṇam iti/
S01divav33u:1148: atha khalu bho brāhmaṇa nakṣatra^vyākaranaṃ nāma^adhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi/
S01divav33u:1152: rohiṇyāṃ jātaḥ subhago bhavati bhogavāṃś ca/
S01divav33u:1155: punarvasau jātaḥ kṛṣimān bhavati gorakṣaś ca/
S01divav33u:1158: maghāyāṃ jāto matimān bhavati, mahā^ātmā ca/
S01divav33u:1161: uttaraphalgunyāṃ jāta upavāsaśīlo bhavati, svargaparāyaṇaś ca/
S01divav33u:1163: citrāyāṃ jāto nṛtyagītakuśalo bhavati, ābharaṇa^vidhijñaś ca/
S01divav33u:1164: svātyāṃ jāto gaṇako bhavati, gaṇaka^mahāmātro vā/
S01divav33u:1167: jyeṣṭhāyāṃ jāto +alpa^ayuṣko bhavati, alpa^bhogaś ca/ mūle jātaḥ
S01divav33u:1170: uttarāṣāḍhāyāṃ jāto bhakteśvaraḥ kulīnaś ca bhavati/
S01divav33u:1185: atha bhoḥ puṣkarasārin nakṣatra^nirdeśaṃ nāma^adhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi tac chrūyatāṃ / kathayatu bhavān/
S01divav33u:1186: p.62.2ab/.kṛttikāsu niviṣṭaṃ vai nagaraṃ jvalati śriyā/
S01divav33u:1188: p.62.3ab/.rohiṇyāṃ tu niviṣṭaṃ vai nagaraṃ tad vinirdiśet/
S01divav33u:1191: p.62.4ab/.mṛgaśīrṣe niviṣṭaṃ tu strībhir gobhir dhanais tathā/
S01divav33u:1192: p.62.4cd/.mālyabhogaiś ca saṅkīrṇam adbhutaiś ca puraskṛtaṃ//
S01divav33u:1195: p.63.2ab/.punarvasau niviṣṭe tu nagaraṃ dīpyate śriyā/
S01divav33u:1197: p.63.3ab/.srīmatpuṣye niviṣṭe tu prajā duṣṭā prasīdati/
S01divav33u:1198: p.63.3cd/.yuktāḥ śriyā ca dharmiṣṭhās tathiva cirajīvinaḥ//
S01divav33u:1200: p.63.4cd/.vanaspatis tathā kṣipraṃ puṣyet tatra punaḥ punaḥ//
S01divav33u:1203: p.63.6ab/.maghāyāṃ ca niviṣṭe tu vidyāvanto mahā^dhanāḥ/
S01divav33u:1205: p.64.1ab/.phalgunyāṃ tu striyo mālyaṃ bhojanācchādanaṃ śubhaṃ/
S01divav33u:1207: p.64.2ab/.uttarāyāṃ tu phālgunyāṃ dhānyāni ca dhanāni ca/
S01divav33u:1208: p.64.2cd/.mūrkhā janā jitāḥ strībhir niviṣṭe nagare bhavet//
S01divav33u:1209: p.64.3ab/.haste ca viniviṣṭe tu vidyāvanto mahā^dhanāḥ/
S01divav33u:1210: p.64.3cd/.parasparaṃ ca rucitaṃ śayanaṃ nagare bhavet//
S01divav33u:1211: p.64.4ab/.citrāyāṃ ca niviṣṭe tu strī^jitāḥ sarva^mānavāḥ/
S01divav33u:1212: p.64.4cd/.śrīmat^kāntaṃ ca nagaraṃ jvalantaṃ tad vinirdiśet//
S01divav33u:1214: p.64.5cd/.lubdhāḥ krūrāś ca mūrkhāś ca prabhūtā nagare bhavet//
S01divav33u:1215: p.64.6ab/.viśākhāyāṃ niviṣṭaṃ tu nagaraṃ jvalati śriyā/
S01divav33u:1224: p.65.3cd/.lubdhāḥ krūrāś ca mūrkhāś ca nivasanti narādhamāḥ//
S01divav33u:1227: p.65.5ab/.abhijiti niviṣṭe tu nagare tatra moditāḥ/
S01divav33u:1231: p.65.7ab/.dhaniṣṭhāyāṃ niviṣṭaṃ tu strī^jitaṃ puram ādiśet/
S01divav33u:1238: p.66.2cd/.pūrṇaṃ ca dhana^dhānyābhyāṃ ratnāḍhyaṃ ca vinirdiśet//
S01divav33u:1239: p.66.3ab/.pure niviṣṭe raivatyāṃ sundarī janatā bhavet/
S01divav33u:1241: p.66.4ab/.aśvinyāṃ viniviṣṭaṃ tu nagaraṃ śivam ādiśet/
S01divav33u:1245: p.66.6ab/.purāṇi rāṣṭraṇi tathā gṛhāṇi nakṣatra^yogaṃ prasamīkṣya vidvān/
S01divav33u:1246: p.66.6cd/.iṣṭe praśaste ca niveśayet tu pūrve ca janme +adhigataṃ mayedaṃ//
S01divav33u:1251: nakṣatrāṇāṃ sthāna^nirdeśaṃ nāma^adhyāyaṃ pravakṣyāmi/ etac chrūyatāṃ/
S01divav33u:1283: p.68.1/.ayaṃ bhoḥ puṣkarasārin nakṣatrāṇāṃ sthāna^nirdeśa^vyākaraṇo nāma^adhyāyaḥ/
S01divav33u:1285: p.68.2/.paṭha bhos triśaṅko ṛtuvarṣaṃ nāma^adhyāyaṃ/ tad ahaṃ vakṣye śrūyatāṃ/ kathayatu bhagavān/
S01divav33u:1287: .kṛttikāsu grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati catuḥṣaṣṭy^āḍhakāni pravarṣati/
S01divav33u:1291: hemante grīṣme grīṇi ca^atra (69) bhaya^pragrahāṇi bhavanti/
S01divav33u:1292: agni^bhayaṃ śastra^bhayaṃ ca^udaka^bhayaṃ ca bhavati/ uktaṃ kṛttikāsu/
S01divav33u:1294: .rohiṇyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati eka^viṃśatyāḍhakāni pravarṣati/
S01divav33u:1297: eṣa ca varṣārātraḥ sāroparodhaḥ sasyaṃ ca saṃpādayati/
S01divav33u:1300: caura^bahulāś ca^atra diśo bhavanti/ uktaṃ ca rohiṇyāṃ/
S01divav33u:1302: .mṛgaśirasi grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati catuḥṣaṣṭy^āḍhakāni pravarṣati/
S01divav33u:1307: muditāś ca^atra janapadā bhavanti/ uktaṃ mṛgaśirasi/
S01divav33u:1309: .ārdrāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati aṣṭādaśāḍhakāni pravarṣati/
S01divav33u:1320: .punarvasau grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati/
S01divav33u:1325: nikṣiptaśastrāś ca rājāno bhavanti/ uktaṃ punarvasau/
S01divav33u:1327: .puṣye grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati dvātriṃśadāḍhakāni pravarṣati/
S01divav33u:1335: gaṇḍāḥ piṭakāḥ pāmāni ca / ity uktaṃ
S01divav33u:1338: .aśleṣāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati eka^viṃśatyāḍhakāni pravarṣati/
S01divav33u:1342: saṃvignāś ca^atra jñānino rājānaś ca bhavanti/
S01divav33u:1344: jāyāpatikānāṃ rājāmātyānāṃ ca virodho bhavati/ uktam aśleṣāyāṃ/
S01divav33u:1346: .maghāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati catuḥṣaṣṭy^āḍhakāni (72) pravarṣati/
S01divav33u:1351: .pūrvaphalgunyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati catuḥṣaṣṭy^āḍhakāni pravarṣati/
S01divav33u:1353: tac ca sasyaṃ janayitvā para^cakra^pīḍitā manuṣyā na sukhenopabhuñjate/
S01divav33u:1354: paśūnāṃ maṇuṣyāṇāṃ ca^atra garbhāḥ sukhino bhavanti/
S01divav33u:1357: .uttaraphalgunyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati aśītyāḍhakāni pravarṣati/
S01divav33u:1364: .haste grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati ekonapañcāśadāḍhakāni (73) pravarṣati/
S01divav33u:1366: patitāni ca sasyāni janasyārasāgrāṇi anudagrāṇi alpa^sārāṇy alpodakāni/
S01divav33u:1369: .citrāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati catuḥṣaṣṭy^āḍhakāni pravarṣati/
S01divav33u:1372: muditāś ca^atra janapadā bhavanti/ uktaṃ citrāyāṃ/
S01divav33u:1374: .svātyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati eka^viṃśatyāḍhakāni pravarṣati/
S01divav33u:1376: caurāś ca^atra balavattarā bhavanti/ uktaṃ svātyāṃ/
S01divav33u:1378: .viśākhāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati aśītyāḍhakāni (74) pravarṣati/
S01divav33u:1382: daṃṣṭriṇaś ca^atra balavanto +api kṣayaṃ gacchanti/ uktaṃ viśākhāyāṃ/
S01divav33u:1384: .anurādhāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati ṣaṣṭyāḍhakāni pravarṣati/
S01divav33u:1386: mitrāṇi ca^atra dṛḍhāni bhavanti/ uktam anurādhāyāṃ/
S01divav33u:1388: .jyeṣṭhāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati ṣoḍaśāḍhakāni pravarṣati/
S01divav33u:1397: .mūle grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati catuṣaṣṭyāḍhakāni (75) pravarṣati/
S01divav33u:1403: nikṣiptaśastrāś ca^atra rājāno bhavanti/ uktaṃ mūle/
S01divav33u:1405: .pūrvasyām āṣāḍhāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati ṣaṣṭyāḍhakāni pravarṣati/
S01divav33u:1413: .uttarasyām āṣāḍhāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati pūrṇam āḍhakaśataṃ pravarṣati/
S01divav33u:1423: .abhijiti grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra pravarṣati catuḥṣaṣṭy^āḍhākāni (76) pravarṣati/
S01divav33u:1426: audakānāṃ bhūtānām utsargo bhavati/ uktam abhijiti/
S01divav33u:1428: .śravaṇe tu grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati catuṣṣaṣṭyāḍhakāni pravarṣati/
S01divav33u:1433: rājānaś ca tīvra^daṇḍā bhavanti/ uktaṃ śravaṇe/
S01divav33u:1435: .dhaniṣṭhāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati eka^pañcāśadāḍhakāni pravarṣati/
S01divav33u:1446: .śatabhiṣāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati ṣoḍaśāḍhakāni (77) pravarṣati/
S01divav33u:1451: manuṣyā dārakadārikāś ca skandhe kṛtvā deśa^antaraṃ gacchanti/
S01divav33u:1454: .pūrvasyāṃ bhādrapadāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati catuḥṣaṣṭy^āḍhakāni pravarṣati/
S01divav33u:1460: paścād balavān mahā^graho bhavati/ martyānāṃ nārīṇāṃ
S01divav33u:1463: .uttarasyāṃ bhādrapadāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati pūrṇam āḍhakaśataṃ pravarṣati/
S01divav33u:1467: tad yathā kukṣirogo +akṣirogaḥ (78) kāśo jvaraś ceti/
S01divav33u:1470: parivarjayitavyāni/ etāś ca varṣāḥ puṣpāṇi phalāni ca sampādayanti/ uktam uttarabhādrapadāyāṃ/
S01divav33u:1472: .revatyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati eka^ṣaṣṭyāḍhakāni pravarṣati/
S01divav33u:1483: .aśvinyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati aṣṭacatvāriṃśadāḍhakāni pravarṣati/
S01divav33u:1489: caurāś ca prabalā bhavanti/ uktam aśvinyāṃ/
S01divav33u:1491: .bharaṇyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati pūrṇam āḍhakaśataṃ pravarṣati/
S01divav33u:1497: putrapautrāṇāṃ ca kalaho bhavati/ uktaṃ bharaṇyāṃ/
S01divav33u:1500: p.79.3/.amīṣāṃ bhoḥ puṣkarasārinn aśṭāviṃśatīnāṃ nakṣatrāṇāṃ rāhugrahe phalavipākaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi/
S01divav33u:1502: kṛttikāsu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin yadi candra^graho bhavati kaliṅgamagadhānām upapīḍā bhavati/
S01divav33u:1503: yadi rohiṇyāṃ candra^graho bhavati prajānām upapīḍā bhavati/
S01divav33u:1504: yadi mṛgaśirasi candra^graho bhavati videhānāṃ janapadānām upapīḍā bhavati/
S01divav33u:1506: evam ārdrāyāṃ punarvasau puṣye ca vaktavyaṃ/
S01divav33u:1507: aśleṣāyāṃ yadi candra^graho bhavati nāgānāṃ haimavatānāṃ
S01divav33u:1509: yadi maghāsu candra^graho bhavati gauḍikānām upapīḍā bhavati/
S01divav33u:1510: yadi pūrvaphalgunyāṃ somo gṛhyate caurāṇām upapīḍā (80) bhavati/
S01divav33u:1511: yady uttaraphalgunyāṃ somo gṛhyate +avantīnām upapīḍā bhavati/
S01divav33u:1512: yadi hasteṣu somo gṛhyate saurāṣṭrikāṇām upapīḍā bhavati/
S01divav33u:1513: yadi citrāyāṃ somo gṛhyate pakṣiṇāṃ dvipadānāṃ ca pīḍā bhavati/
S01divav33u:1516: yady anurādhāsu somo gṛhyate vaṇijānām upapīḍā bhavati śākaṭikānāṃ ca/
S01divav33u:1517: yadi jyeṣṭhāyāṃ somo gṛhyate dauvālikānāṃ pīḍā bhavati/
S01divav33u:1518: yadi mūle somo gṛhyate +adhvagānāṃ pīḍā bhavati/
S01divav33u:1519: yadi pūrvāṣāḍhāyāṃ somo gṛhyate +avantīnāṃ pīḍā bhavati/
S01divav33u:1520: yady uttarāṣāḍhāyāṃ somo gṛhyate kāmbojakānāṃ pīḍā bhavati/ bāhlīkānāṃ ca/
S01divav33u:1521: yady abhijiti somo gṛhyate dakṣiṇāpathikānāṃ pīḍā bhavati/
S01divav33u:1523: yadi śravaṇeṣu somo gṛhyate caurāṇāṃ ghātakānāṃ ca^upapīḍā bhavati/
S01divav33u:1524: yadi dhaniṣṭhāyāṃ somo gṛhyate kurupāñcālanāṃ pīḍā bhavati/
S01divav33u:1525: yadi śatabhiṣāyāṃ somo gṛhyate maulikānām ātharvaṇikānāṃ ca pīḍā bhavati/
S01divav33u:1526: yadi pūrvabhādrapadāyāṃ somo gṛhyate gāndhikānāṃ yavana^kāmbojakānāṃ ca pīḍā
S01divav33u:1528: yady uttarabhādrapadāyāṃ somo gṛhyate (81) gandharvāṇāṃ pīḍā bhavati/
S01divav33u:1529: yadi revatyāṃ somo gṛhyate nāvikānāṃ pīḍā bhavati/
S01divav33u:1531: yadi bharaṇyāṃ somo gṛhyate bharukacchānāṃ pīḍā bhavati/
S01divav33u:1533: .evaṃ bhoḥ puṣkarasārin nakṣatre candra^graho bhavati tasya tasya deśasya pīḍā bhavati/
S01divav33u:1538: p.81.3cd/.ṣaṭtārāṃ kṛttikāṃ vidyād āśrayaṃ tāsu kārayet/
S01divav33u:1540: p.81.4ab/.sarpirviloḍayet tatra gavāṃ veśma ca kārayet/
S01divav33u:1541: p.81.4cd/.ajaiḍakāś ca kretavyā gavāṃ ca vṛṣam utsṛjet//
S01divav33u:1542: p.81.5ab/.aśmasāramayaṃ bhāṇḍaṃ sarvam atra tu kārayet/
S01divav33u:1546: p.82.1ab/.gṛhaṃ ca māpayet atra tathā +avāsaṃ prakalpayet/
S01divav33u:1547: p.82.1cd/.navaṃ ca chādayed vastraṃ krayaṇaṃ na^atra kārayet//
S01divav33u:1550: p.82.3ab/.śastrāṇi kṣurakarmāṇi sarvāṇy atra tu kārayet/
S01divav33u:1551: p.82.3cd/.tejasāni ca bhāṇḍāni kārayec ca krīṇīta ca//

S01divav33u:1949: saṃvatsaram eteṣu yad yan nakṣatra^maṇḍalaṃ pīḍayati tasya tasya janapadasya sattvasya vā pīḍā nirdeṣṭavyā/
S01divav33u:1954: nairṛto varuṇo vāyavo bhargo devo raudro vicārī ca/
S01divav33u:1958: .athātra śrāvaṇe māse pūrṇe +aṣṭādaśa^muhūrte divase sūrya^udaye ca caturojā nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divav33u:1959: rohitasya ca muhūrtasya balasya ca^antare madhyāhno bhavati/
S01divav33u:1960: sūryāvatāre tu vicārī nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divav33u:1961: dvādaśa^muhūrtāyāṃ rātrāv avatīrṇe sūrye ṣaṣṭhe muhūrte nayamano nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divav33u:1962: ātāpāgnir evaṃ nāma muhūrto rātryavasāne bhavati/ bhādrapade
S01divav33u:1963: māse pūrṇe saptadaśa^muhūrte divase sūrya^udaye ca caturojā evaṃ nāma muhūrtā bhavati/
S01divav33u:1966: trayodaśa^muhūrtāyāṃ rātrāv avatīrṇe sūrye vicārī nāma muhūrto bhavati/

S01divav33u:1970: aśvayuje māse pūrṇe ṣoḍaśa^muhūrto divaso bhavati/
S01divav33u:1972: samudgatasya ca muhūrtasya abhijitasya ca^antare madhyāhno bhavati/
S01divav33u:1973: sūryāvatāre bhargo devo nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divav33u:1975: .catur^daśa^muhūrtāyāṃ rātrāv avatīrṇe sūrye raudro nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divav33u:1976: abhijitasya ca muhūrtasya bhīṣamāṇasya ca muhūrtasya antareṇa^ardha^rātraṃ bhavati/
S01divav33u:1977: rātryavasāne ātapāgnir evaṃ nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divav33u:1981: samāne +ahorātre sūrya^udaye caturojā evaṃ nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divav33u:1984: rātrāv avatīrṇamātra sūrye bhrgo devo nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divav33u:1986: rātryavasāne ātapāgnir evaṃ nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divav33u:1988: .mārgaśīrṣe māse ca pūrṇe catur^daśa^muhūrte divase sūrya^udaye caturojā evaṃ nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divav33u:1989: viratasya saṃmukhasya ca muhūrtasya^antare madhyāhno bhavati/
S01divav33u:1991: ṣoḍaśa^muhūrtāyāṃ rātrāv avatīrṇamātre sūrye saṃtāpanaḥ saṃyamo nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divav33u:1993: bhavati/ rātryavasāne ātapāgnir evaṃ nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divav33u:1995: .pauṣamāse pūrṇe trayodaśa^muhūrte divase sūrya^udaye caturojā evaṃ nama muhūrto bhavati/
S01divav33u:1998: saptadaśa^muhūrtāyāṃ rātrāv avatīrṇamātre sūrye varuṇo nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divav33u:2000: rātryavasāne ātapāgnir evaṃ nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divav33u:2002: .māgha^māse pūrṇe dvādaśa^muhūrte divase sūrya^udaye caturojā nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divav33u:2003: sāvitrasya ca viratasya ca muhūrtasya^antareṇa madhyāhno bhavati/
S01divav33u:2005: aṣṭādaśa^muhūrtāyāṃ rātrāv avatīrṇamātre sūrye nairṛto nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divav33u:2006: gardabhasya muhūrtasya ca rākṣasasya ca^antaram ardha^rātraṃ bhavati/ rātryavasāna
S01divav33u:2015: evam eteṣāṃ nakṣatrāṇāṃ muhūrtānāṃ caritaṃ vicaritaṃ ca jñātavyaṃ/
S01divav33u:2019: hīyamāne vardhamāne vā divase vā māse vā pūrṇe +ardha^māse vā/
S01divav33u:2020: dvitīyā ṣaṣṭhī navamī dvādaśī caturdaśī atra^antare divase kalā vardhate rātrau kalā hīyate/

S01divav33u:2278: p.126.1ab/.(126) indrāgnī^devate tatra gandha^mālyair baliṃ haret/
S01divav33u:2280: p.126.2ab/.anurādhā^utthito vyādiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divav33u:2281: p.126.2cd/.ardha^māsaṃ bhaved vyādhis tataś ca^ūrdhvaṃ vimucyate//
S01divav33u:2282: p.126.3ab/.mitro hi devatā tatra ghṛta^pātraṃ baliṃ haret/
S01divav33u:2284: p.126.4ab/.jyeṣṭhāyām utthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divav33u:2286: p.126.5ab/.indro hi devatā tatra gandha^mālyair baliṃ haret/
S01divav33u:2288: p.126.6ab/.mūle samutthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divav33u:2289: p.126.6cd/.māsiko hi bhaved vyādhis tataś ca^ūrdhvaṃ vimucyate//
S01divav33u:2290: p.126.7ab/.nairṛtir devatā tatra madya^māṃsair baliṃ haret/
S01divav33u:2292: p.126.8ab/.pūrvāṣāḍhe bhaved vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divav33u:2293: p.126.8cd/.sāṃkleśiko bhaved vyādhir aṣṭau māsān na saṃśayaḥ//
S01divav33u:2294: p.126.9ab/.āpo hi devatās tatra kṛsareṇa baliṃ haret/
S01divav33u:2296: p.126.10ab/.uttarāyāṃ bhaved vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divav33u:2297: p.126.10cd/.sapta^rātraṃ bhaved vyādhis tataś ca^ūrdhvaṃ vimucyate//
S01divav33u:2298: p.126.11ab/.viśvo hi devatā tatra pāyasena baliṃ haret/
S01divav33u:2300: p.127.1ab/.(127) abhijid utthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divav33u:2301: p.127.1cd/.ṣaṇ^māsān saṃbhaved vyādhis tataś ca^ūrdhvaṃ vimucyate//
S01divav33u:2302: p.127.2ab/.viṣṇuś ca devatā tatra dadhi^maṇḍaṃ baliṃ haret/
S01divav33u:2304: p.127.3ab/.śravaṇena^utthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divav33u:2305: p.127.3cd/.guruko hi bhaved vyādhiḥ pūrṇaṃ dvādaśa^māsikaṃ//
S01divav33u:2306: p.127.4ab/.viṣṇur hi devatā tatra gandha^mālyair baliṃ haret/
S01divav33u:2308: p.127.5ab/.dhaniṣṭhāyāṃ bhaved vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divav33u:2309: p.127.5cd/.guruko he bhaved vyādhiḥ pūrṇamāsān trayodaśa//
S01divav33u:2310: p.127.6ab/.vasavo devatās tatra ghṛta^mālyair baliṃ haret/
S01divav33u:2312: p.127.7ab/.śatabhiṣā^utthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divav33u:2314: p.127.8ab/.varuṇo devatā tatra pāyasena baliṃ haret/
S01divav33u:2316: p.127.9ab/.pūrvabhadra^utthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divav33u:2317: p.127.9cd/.na taṃ vaidyāś cikitsantu ahirbudhnyo +atra daivataḥ//
S01divav33u:2318: p.127.10ab/.uttarabhādrajo vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divav33u:2319: p.127.10cd/.sapta^rātraṃ bhaved vyādhis tataś ca^ūrdhvaṃ vimucyate//
S01divav33u:2320: p.128.1ab/.(128) aryamā devatā tatra gandha^mālyair baliṃ haret/
S01divav33u:2322: p.128.2ab/.revatyām utthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divav33u:2324: p.128.3ab/.pūṣā hi devatā tatra gandha^mālyair baliṃ haret/
S01divav33u:2326: p.128.4ab/.aśvinyām utthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divav33u:2328: p.128.5ab/.gandharvo devatā tatra yāvakena baliṃ haret/ %gandharva!
S01divav33u:2330: p.128.6ab/.bharaṇyām utthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divav33u:2331: p.128.6cd/.na taṃ vaidyāś cikitsantu yamas tatra tu daivataḥ/
S01divav33u:2332: p.128.7ab/.śīlaṃ rakṣatu medhāvī tataḥ svargaṃ gamiṣyati//
S01divav33u:2336: .atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin bandhana^nirmokṣaṃ nāma^adhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi/
S01divav33u:2340: .kṛttikāsu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin baddho vā ruddho vā tri^rātreṇa mokṣyati^iti vaktavyaḥ/
S01divav33u:2341: rohiṇyāṃ baddho vā ruddho vā tri^rātreṇa mokṣyati^iti/
S01divav33u:2342: mṛgaśirasi baddho vā ruddho vā eka^viṃśati rātreṇa mokṣyati^iti/
S01divav33u:2343: ārdrāyāṃ baddho vā ruddho vā +ardha^māsena mokṣyati^iti/
S01divav33u:2344: punarvasau ruddho vā baddho vā sapta^rātrena/
S01divav33u:2357: śravaṇe dhaniṣṭhāyāṃ śatabhiṣāyāṃ pūrvabhadrapade uttarabhādrapade revatyāṃ
S01divav33u:2360: bharaṇyāṃ baddho vā ruddho vā parikleśam avāpsyati^iti vaktavyaḥ/
S01divav33u:2363: p.129.3/.atha boḥ puskarasārin tilaka^adhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi/ tac chrūyatāṃ/ kathayatu bhagavān//
S01divav33u:2364: p.129.4/.mūrdhni tu yasyās tilako +asti sūkṣmaḥ snigdho bhavet padma^samāna^varṇaḥ/
S01divav33u:2365: p.129.5/.rājā tu tasyā bhavati^iha bhartā stana^upariṣṭāt pratibimbam āhuḥ//
S01divav33u:2366: p.130.1ab/.śīrṣe tu yasyās tilaka^alakaḥ syāt sūkṣmo bhaved añjana^cūrṇa^varṇaḥ/
S01divav33u:2367: p.130.1cd/.senāpatis tasyā bhaved dhi bhartā stana^antare +asyāḥ pratibimbakaṃ syāt//
S01divav33u:2368: p.130.2ab/.bhrūvontare +asyās tilaka^alakaḥ syād duṣcāriṇīṃ tāṃ pramadāṃ vadanti/
S01divav33u:2369: p.130.2cd/.pañca^eva tasyāḥ patayo bhavanti bahv^anna^pānaṃ labhate ca nārī//
S01divav33u:2370: p.131.1ab/.gaṇḍasya nāsādikam adhyadeśe bhavec ca bimbaṃ tilakasya yasyāḥ/
S01divav33u:2371: p.131.1cd/.tāṃ śoka^bhājaṃ pramadāṃ vadanti romapradeśe pratibimbam āhuḥ//
S01divav33u:2372: p.131.2ab/.karṇe tu yasyās tilaka^alakaḥ syād bahu^śrutāṃ tāṃ pramadāṃ vadanti/
S01divav33u:2373: p.131.2cd/.bahu^śrūtāṃ tāṃ śrutidhāriṇīṃ ca trike tu yasyāḥ pratibimbakaṃ syāt//
S01divav33u:2374: p.131.3ab/.yasya^uttaroṣṭhe tilaka^alakaḥ syāt tāṃ bhinna^satyāṃ pramadāṃ vadanti/
S01divav33u:2375: p.131.3cd/.kṛcchreṇa sā vai labhate hi vṛttim ūrau tu tasyās tila^bimbam āhuḥ//
S01divav33u:2376: p.132.1ab/.yasyā +adharoṣṭhe tilaka^alakaḥ syād duścāriṇīṃ tāṃ pramadāṃ vadanti/
S01divav33u:2377: p.132.1cd/.miṣṭa^anna^pānaṃ bahu ṛcchate sā tathā hi guhye pratibimbakaṃ syāt//
S01divav33u:2378: p.132.2ab/.cibuke tu yasyās tilaka^alakaḥ syād duścāriṇīṃ tāṃ pramadāṃ vadanti/
S01divav33u:2379: p.132.2cd/.miṣṭa^anna^pānaṃ bahu sā labheta guhye dvitīyaṃ pratibimbakaṃ syāt//
S01divav33u:2382: .atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin nakṣatra^janma^guṇaṃ nāma^adhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi/
S01divav33u:2386: p.132.5b/.bhavec chūras tathā caṇḍaḥ priya^vādī ca mānavaḥ//
S01divav33u:2387: p.132.6a/.rohiṇyāṃ puruṣo jāto dhanavān dharmikas tathā/
S01divav33u:2388: p.132.6b/.vyavasāyī sthiraḥ śūro dhruvaṃ ca^asya sadā mukhaṃ//
S01divav33u:2389: p.133.1ab/.jāto mṛgaśire yas tu mṛduḥ saumyas tu mānavaḥ/
S01divav33u:2390: p.133.1cd/.darśanīyo bhavec ca^asau strī^kāntas tu viśeṣataḥ//
S01divav33u:2392: p.133.2cd/.rodrakarmā bhavec ca^asāv īścaraś ca śatair mahān//
S01divav33u:2393: p.133.3ab/.jātaḥ punarvasau yas tu hy alolo buddhimān naraḥ/
S01divav33u:2394: p.133.3cd/.dharma^śīlo bhavec ca^asau jāta^krodhaś ca mānavaḥ//
S01divav33u:2395: p.133.4ab/.puṣyeṇa puruṣo jātas tejasvī brāhmaṇo bhavet/
S01divav33u:2396: p.133.4cd/.kṣatriyaś ca bhaved rājā vaiśya^sūdrau ca pūjitau//
S01divav33u:2397: p.133.5ab/.śvasanaḥ krodhanaḥ krūro hy aśleṣā^sambhavo naraḥ/
S01divav33u:2398: p.133.5cd/.durmanuṣyaś ca caṇḍaś ca; iti sarvam ihādiśet//
S01divav33u:2400: p.133.6cd/.dhanavān dhānyavān bhogī maghāsu puruṣo bhavet//
S01divav33u:2401: p.133.7ab/.pūrvaphālgunī^jātas tu yaḥ kaścit puruṣo bhavet/
S01divav33u:2403: p.133.8ab/.uttarāyāṃ tu phālgunyāṃ jāto bhavati bhogavān/
S01divav33u:2404: p.133.8cd/.divyajñānaś ca vijñāne puruṣaḥ subhago bhavet//
S01divav33u:2405: p.133.9ab/.haste jātaś ca śuddha^ātmā vikrānto mṛdu^bhojanaḥ/
S01divav33u:2409: p.134.1ab/.svātyāṃ ca puruṣo jāto bandhuś lāghī cicakṣaṇaḥ/
S01divav33u:2411: p.134.2ab/.viśākhāsu naro jātas tejasvī dravyavān mahān/
S01divav33u:2412: p.134.2cd/.śūro vikramavān dakṣaḥ subhagaś ca bhaved asau//
S01divav33u:2414: p.134.3cd/.śuciś ca^eva kṛta^jñaś ca dharma^ātmā ca bhavec ca saḥ//
S01divav33u:2418: p.134.5cd/.dṛḍho vīro bhavec ca^asau kilviṣī ca sa mānavaḥ//
S01divav33u:2420: p.134.6cd/.matsya^māṃsa^priyaś ca^api ghātakaḥ syāt sa mānavaḥ//
S01divav33u:2421: p.134.7ab/.sa^anukrośaś ca dātā ca vidyāniṣṭhaḥ suhṛjjanaḥ/
S01divav33u:2422: p.134.7cd/.viśvadaive naro jāto bhaved api ca niścitaḥ//
S01divav33u:2423: p.134.8ab/.ācāryaḥ śāstra^kartā ca viśvāsī ca kriyāparaḥ/
S01divav33u:2424: p.134.8cd/.śravaṇe jata; āyuṣmān śrīmāṃś ca puruṣo bhavet//
S01divav33u:2427: p.135.1ab/.vāruṇe yadi nakṣatre jāto bhavati mānavaḥ/
S01divav33u:2428: p.135.1cd/.paruṣo kveṣaśīlaś ca parivādī ca sarvaśaḥ//
S01divav33u:2429: p.135.2ab/.jāto bhādrapadāyāṃ tu pūrvasyām iha mānavaḥ/
S01divav33u:2432: p.135.3cd/.medhāvī bahv apatyaś ca dharma^śīlo mahā^dhanaḥ//
S01divav33u:2436: p.135.5cd/.mahā^jana^priyaś ca^api śūraś ca subhagaś ca saḥ//
S01divav33u:2440: p.135.8/.paṭha bhos triśaṅko utpāta^cakraṃ nāma^adhyāyaṃ/ kathayati ca/
S01divav33u:2444: u1.2ab/.māghasya prathame pakṣe śailo vā pārthivā yadi/
S01divav33u:2446: u1.2ef/.vidyuto vā^atha dṛśyante tadā vidyāj jana^kṣayaṃ//
S01divav33u:2447: u1.3ab/.aśvinyām arkato dhūmo nirgacchann api chādayet/
S01divav33u:2450: u1.4cd/.samantād vadhyate rāṣṭraṃ madhye durbhikṣam ādiśet//
S01divav33u:2451: u1.5ab/.phālgune kṛttikāyāṃ tu; āditye parikho yadi/
S01divav33u:2452: u1.5cd/.naśyanti karvaṭās tatra yadi devo na varṣati//
S01divav33u:2453: u1.6ab/.caitra^māse yadā puṣye sūrye kṛṣṇāṃ pradṛśyate/
S01divav33u:2456: u1.7cd/.saṃgrāmaṃ tatra jānīyād ubhau ghātyete pārthivau//
S01divav33u:2458: u1.8cd/.sa^amātyo vadhyate rājā rāṣṭre durbhikṣam ādiśet//
S01divav33u:2465: u1.12ab/.māse +atha śrāvaṇe mūle candra^sūryau na bhāsataḥ/
S01divav33u:2466: u1.12cd/.sphuliṅgāś ca^atra dṛśyante vidyād roga^bhayaṃ mahat//
S01divav33u:2471: u1.15ab/.ravivad bhāti tad^rāṣṭraṃ vinaśyeta punaḥ punaḥ/
S01divav33u:2472: u1.15cd/.rājñāṃ vidyād dhatānāṃ vai bhūmiḥ pāstyati śoṇitaṃ//
S01divav33u:2473: u1.16ab/.bharaṇyāṃ māgha^māse tu kṛṣṇo vāyuḥ samutthitaḥ/
S01divav33u:2474: u1.16cd/.chādayec candra^sūryau tu śīghraṃ rāṣṭraṃ vinaśyati//
S01divav33u:2475: u1.17ab/.māse tu phālgune vāyuḥ pāṃśuvarṣaṃ savidyutaṃ/
S01divav33u:2477: u1.18ab/.saha^ādityena candre +atha yadā kaścid grahaś caret/
S01divav33u:2478: u1.18cd/.vāyur vā viṣamo vātii vidyād rāja^vadhaṃ tadā//
S01divav33u:2483: u1.21ab/.jyeṣṭhe ca pāṃśur varṣeta; ādityaḥ pariviṣyate/
S01divav33u:2487: u1.23ab/.śrāvaṇe vāyavaḥ pītāḥ sadā kṛṣṇaṃ nabhas^talaṃ/
S01divav33u:2489: u1.24ab/.śrāvaṇe varṣate hy agniḥ pūrvabhādrapade divā/
S01divav33u:2491: u1.25ab/.yadā bhādrapade māse nabhaḥ syāc channa^garjitaṃ/(p.138)
S01divav33u:2494: u1.26cd/.pātayec ca^evam āghātaṃ kṛtsnaṃ rāṣṭraṃ vinaśyati//
S01divav33u:2495: u1.27ab/.kārttike śukla^trayodaśyāṃ yadā candre dhanur bhavet/
S01divav33u:2496: u1.27cd/.samantān naśyate rāṣṭraṃ madhye durbhikṣam ādiśet//
S01divav33u:2497: u1.28ab/.ulkā^pātā hy aśanayo māgha^māse bhavanti vā/
S01divav33u:2499: u1.29ab/.māse tu phālgune yatra; āgnivarṣaṃ nabhas^talāt/
S01divav33u:2500: u1.29cd/.bhavec chabdas tadākāśe tad^rāṣṭraṃ naśyate laghu//
S01divav33u:2501: u1.30ab/.svātyāṃ caitre yadā varṣaṃ niruddhaṃ vāta^varṣitaṃ/
S01divav33u:2503: u1.31ab/.bharaṇyāṃ jyeṣṭha^māse tu śabda; uttarato bhavet/
S01divav33u:2505: u1.32ab/.āṣāḍhe māsi puṣye +atha dṛśyante vyogni vidyutaḥ/
S01divav33u:2507: u1.33ab/.śrāvaṇe tu yadā mūle bahu devaḥ pravarṣati/
S01divav33u:2509: u1.34ab/.māse bhādrapade yatra nirghātaḥ patati kṣitau/
S01divav33u:2511: u1.35ab/.māse bhādrapade puṣye vidigbhyo niścared dhvaniḥ/
S01divav33u:2512: u1.35cd/.kṣatriyaḥ kupyate kṣipraṃ vipakṣā tu datā prajā//
S01divav33u:2513: u1.36ab/.bharaṇyām aśvayuje śabda upariṣṭād bhaved yadi/
S01divav33u:2515: u1.37ab/.kārttike tu yadā^ārdrāyāṃ śabdaḥ śrayeta bhairavaḥ/
S01divav33u:2518: u1.38cd/.vātāturas tadā rāṣṭre vyādhir bhavati dāruṇaḥ//
S01divav33u:2519: u1.39ab/.pauṣa^māse yadā svātyāṃ śabdo bhavati bhairavaḥ/
S01divav33u:2521: u1.40ab/.māghe śukle tu nirghāto nityaṃ śāmyed vasundharāṃ/
S01divav33u:2525: u1.42ab/.pūrvabhādrapadāyāṃ tu caitre kampet kṣitir divā/
S01divav33u:2526: u1.42cd/.tasmin varṣe ca tadrāṣṭre parasainyān mahad^bhayaṃ//
S01divav33u:2527: u1.43ab/.pūrvāyāṃ ced āṣāḍhāyāṃ rātrau caitre ca niścalet/
S01divav33u:2528: u1.43cd/.asibhir hanyate rājā hanyate ca mahā^janaḥ//
S01divav33u:2529: u1.44ab/.vaiśākhe kampitā bhūmiḥ kṛṣṇa^pakṣe hy abhīkṣṇaśaḥ/
S01divav33u:2530: u1.44cd/.anāvṛṣṭyā tu durbhikṣaṃ māsān ṣaṭ tatra nirdiśet//
S01divav33u:2531: u1.45ab/.jyeṣṭhe māse bharaṇyāṃ tu divā kamped vasundharā/
S01divav33u:2533: u1.46ab/.jyeṣṭhe māse yadā mūle rātrau bhūmiḥ prakampate/
S01divav33u:2534: u1.46cd/.pratyanto vadhyate rājā rāṣṭre baliṃ samādiśet//
S01divav33u:2536: u1.47cd/.śasyaṃ vinaśyate tatra kalikarma ca jāyate//
S01divav33u:2537: u1.48ab/.prakampante yadā caityā; ādrāyāṃ vā maghāsu vā/
S01divav33u:2538: u1.48cd/.jvaleyuḥ prapateyur vā naśyed rāṣṭraṃ tadā laghu//
S01divav33u:2539: u1.49ab/.caityā yatra prakampante hasanti ca namanti ca/
S01divav33u:2540: u1.49cd/.sarāṣṭraḥ kṣitipas tatra na cirān nāśam arcchati//
S01divav33u:2542: u1.50cd/.sadā parājito rājā caura^rāṣṭre ca vadhyate//
S01divav33u:2544: u1.51cd/.dvāraṃ vā nagarasya^atha bhūyiṣṭhaṃ naśyate prajā//
S01divav33u:2545: u1.52ab/.vāme vā kaṣīṇe candroḥ śṛṅge tiṣṭhed bṛhaspatiḥ/
S01divav33u:2550: u1.54cd/.jñeyaṃ roga^bhayaṃ ghoraṃ durbhikṣaṃ ca^atra nirdiśet//
S01divav33u:2551: u1.55ab/.rāhuṇā nigṛhītas tu ca^ullkayā hanyate śaśī/
S01divav33u:2553: u1.56ab/.yasya caiva^atha nakṣatre śaśī sūryo vigṛhyate/
S01divav33u:2554: u1.56cd/.rāhuṇā kṣitiyo rājyaiḥ saha pīḍām avāpnuyāt//
S01divav33u:2555: u1.57ab/.rājño vai ca^atha nakṣatre candraṃ ketur yadā viśet/
S01divav33u:2559: u1.59ab/.bṛhaspatiś ca śukraś ca lohita^aṅgaḥ śanaiścaraḥ/
S01divav33u:2563: u1.61ab/.maghāyāṃ lohita^aṅgo vā śravaṇe vā bṛhaspatiḥ/
S01divav33u:2565: u1.62ab/.tiṣṭhec chukro +atha rohiṇyāṃ jyeṣṭhe māse kathaṃcana/
S01divav33u:2568: u1.63cd/.somo vā raviṇā sārdhaṃ para^cakra^bhayaṃ tadā//
