S01divav33u:2569: u1.64ab/.kākāḥ śyenāś ca bṛdhrāś ca vaseyuḥ sahitā mudā/
S01divav33u:2570: u1.64cd/.maithunaṃ vāritaṃ veyuḥ paraiḥ saha raṇas tadā//
S01divav33u:2571: u1.65ab/.śyeno hastinivāse vā; abhirohet punaḥ punaḥ/
S01divav33u:2572: u1.65cd/.para^cakreṇa yuddhaṃ tu bhavec ca^api punaḥ punaḥ/.
S01divav33u:2574: u1.66cd/.strīṇām eva bhavet tatra maraṇaṃ hy atidāruṇaṃ//
S01divav33u:2575: u1.67ab/.garbha^sthā dārakā yatra hasanti ca vadanti ca/
S01divav33u:2577: u1.68ab/.eka^pādāṃ stripādāṃś ca catur^aṅgāṃs tathā^eva ca/
S01divav33u:2578: u1.68cd/.nāryo yatra prasūyante rājño vyasanam ādiśet//
S01divav33u:2580: u1.69cd/.pramadā yatra deśe tu rājā tatra vinaśyati//
S01divav33u:2582: u1.70cd/.pramadā yatra sūyante rāṣṭraṃ tatra vinaśyati//
S01divav33u:2583: u1.71ab/.kharāś ca mahiṣāś ca^api paśavo +atha tathāvidhāḥ/
S01divav33u:2584: u1.71cd/.dvi^tri^śīrṣāḥ prasūyante deśe yatra sa naśyati//
S01divav33u:2586: u1.72cd/.jāyante yatra deśe tu sa deśo laghu naśyati//
S01divav33u:2587: u1.73ab/.pādāv ubhau yadā vaiśyā gurviṇī saṃprasūyate/
S01divav33u:2590: u1.74cd/.rājā vā rājāmātyo vā saha deśena naśyati//
S01divav33u:2592: u1.75cd/.trinetras trimukho vā^api vidyāt tatra mahad^bhayaṃ//
S01divav33u:2593: u1.76ab/.saukareṇa tu vakreṇa śarīraṃ mānuṣaṃ yadi/
S01divav33u:2594: u1.76cd/.sūtaṃ catur^diśaṃ rāṣṭraṃ hanyāt tatra na saṃśayaḥ//
S01divav33u:2595: u1.77ab/.ādityasya tu rūpeṇa mānuṣo yatra jāyate/
S01divav33u:2597: u1.78ab/.uttānaśāyī bālas tu deśaṃ yatra dvijottamaḥ/
S01divav33u:2598: u1.78cd/.dṛṣṭaḥ pravyāharan vedān kṣipraṃ deśo vinaśyatei//
S01divav33u:2599: u1.79ab/.kukṣiṃ bhitvā yadā bālo garbhān niṣkramate svayaṃ/
S01divav33u:2600: u1.79cd/.atrāṇāṃ mātaraṃ kṛtvā sa deśo naśyate laghu//
S01divav33u:2601: u1.80ab/.garbha^sthāḥ sūkarā; uṣṭrāḥ sarpāś ca śakunis tathā/
S01divav33u:2602: u1.80cd/.strīṇāṃ garbhāt prasūyante deśe tu bhayam ādiśet//
S01divav33u:2604: u1.81cd/.gāvo yatra prasūyante nirdiśed bhayam āgataṃ//
S01divav33u:2608: u1.83cd/.sajano jāyate yatra rāṣṭraṃ sādhipatiṃ dahet//
S01divav33u:2610: u1.84cd/.śuṣyeta sakalaṃ śasyaṃ janaś ca vilayaṃ vrajet/
S01divav33u:2612: u1.85cd/.svayaṃ kṣubhyeta tad^rāṣṭraṃ vinaśyeta na saṃśayaḥ//
S01divav33u:2613: u1.86ab/.phale phalaṃ yadā paśyet puṣpe vā puṣpam āśritaṃ/
S01divav33u:2614: u1.86cd/.garbhāḥ sraveyur nārīṇāṃ yuvarājaś ca vadhyate//
S01divav33u:2615: u1.87ab/.akāle pādapā yatra puṣpyanti ca phalanti ca/(p.143)
S01divav33u:2616: u1.87cd/.latā gulmo +atha vallī vā deśe tatra bhayaṃ bhavet//
S01divav33u:2618: u1.88cd/.kūjamānaṃ pataṅgaṃ vā tadā vidyān mahad^bhayaṃ//
S01divav33u:2619: u1.89ab/.vṛkṣāṇāṃ maṇḍapānāṃ vā chāyā na parivartate/
S01divav33u:2623: u1.91ab/.anāvartaṃ yadā puṣpaṃ phalaṃ ca^api pradṛśyate/
S01divav33u:2624: u1.91cd/.vināśaṃ tasya deśasya durbhikṣaṃ kalahaṃ vadet//
S01divav33u:2625: u1.92ab/.sthānāsthānaṃ gatā vṛkṣā dṛśyeyur yatra kutracit/
S01divav33u:2628: u1.93cd/.śastraṃ mūrcchayate tatra taskaraiś ca^api pūrvavat//
S01divav33u:2629: u1.94ab/.kampate rudate śāstā gacchan vā yatra dṛśyate/
S01divav33u:2631: u1.95ab/.devatā yatra deśe tu nṛtyanti ca hasanti ca/
S01divav33u:2632: u1.95cd/.aśrūṇi pātayeyur vā tadā vidyān mahad^bhayaṃ//
S01divav33u:2633: u1.96ab/.devatā yatra krīḍanti jvalanti nimiṣanti vā/
S01divav33u:2634: u1.96cd/.caleyur athavā yatra kṣiti^po +anyo bhavet tadā//
S01divav33u:2635: u1.97ab/.śivaliṅaṃ yadā kamped gagane vā^atha dṛśyate/
S01divav33u:2636: u1.97cd/.nimajjate dharaṇyāṃ vā dhruvaṃ rāja^vadho bhavet//
S01divav33u:2639: u1.99ab/.acalo vā calet sthānāc calaṃ vā^apy acalaṃ bhavet/
S01divav33u:2640: u1.99cd/.amātyo hanti rājānaṃ kalahaṃ ca^atra nirdiśet//
S01divav33u:2641: u1.100ab/.vamanti rudhiraṃ kanyā namante vā diśo daśa/(p.144)
S01divav33u:2643: u1.101ab/.varṣate kusumaṃ yatra rakta^vindum atha^api vā/
S01divav33u:2644: u1.101cd/.prāṇino vividhān vā^api vidyāc caura^bhayaṃ tadā//
S01divav33u:2646: u1.102cd/.nagarāṇy atha dhūmyante kṣipraṃ rājā vinaśyati//
S01divav33u:2647: u1.103ab/.indur vā dīpa^vṛkso vā dīpo yatra na dīpyate/
S01divav33u:2648: u1.103cd/.rājyakāmaḥ kumāro vā kṣubhyed viṭapako +api vā//
S01divav33u:2650: u1.104cd/.astraṃ vā^api gṛhaṃ dahyād rājño vyasanam ādiśet//
S01divav33u:2651: u1.105ab/.pated antaḥpure vidyud vṛkṣe vā^apy āśrame tathā/
S01divav33u:2652: u1.105cd/.puri caityacchāyāyāṃ vā rājārthe patitā hi sā//
S01divav33u:2654: u1.106cd/.vāyasaḥ kurute nīḍaṃ sa^amātyo dhvaṃsate nṛpaḥ//
S01divav33u:2662: u1.110cd/.śoṇitaṃ sakarakaṃ syāt tadā vidyāt parād bhayaṃ//
S01divav33u:2663: u1.111ab/.vidyuc ca patate ghorā karakāṇāṃ ca varṣaṇaṃ/
S01divav33u:2668: u1.113cd/.gaganaṃ dahyate tatra loka^pīḍā jvareṇa ca//
S01divav33u:2673: u1.116ab/.nāpsu majjati na^apy agnau pūrvavac ca na dṛśyate/
S01divav33u:2674: u1.116cd/.agnir utpatsyate tatra koṣṭha^āgāraṃ daheta saḥ//
S01divav33u:2677: u1.118ab/.jalaṃ jājvalyamānaṃ tu matsyo nirdahati svayaṃ/
S01divav33u:2678: u1.118cd/.anāvṛṣṭiṃ tadā brūyād durbhikṣaṃ ca mahad^bhayaṃ//
S01divav33u:2680: u1.119cd/.cakra^dvaye +api durbhikṣaṃ rāṣṭre rogaṃ ca nirdiśet//
S01divav33u:2681: u1.120ab/.triśīrṣaḥ pañca^śīrṣo vā yadā sarpo +atha dṛśyate/
S01divav33u:2683: u1.121ab/.kuśūlo yatra dṛśyeta kampayan tu vasundharāṃ/
S01divav33u:2685: u1.122ab/.sarpa; udyata^śīrṣas tu yudhyate puruṣaiḥ saha/
S01divav33u:2686: u1.122cd/.cakra^dvayād rogataś ca vidyāt tatra mahad^bhayaṃ//
S01divav33u:2690: u1.124cd/.tatas taṃ na cirāt paśyet saṃgrāmaṃ pratyupasthitaṃ//
S01divav33u:2691: u1.125ab/.kākaḥ śyenaś ca gṛdhro vā yasya nīyeta mūrdhani/(146)
S01divav33u:2693: u1.126ab/.prāsādāś ca prakampante śaraṇāni gṛhāṇi ca/
S01divav33u:2699: u1.129ab/.vṛkṣāḥ sarpāḥ prakampeyur mucyeyus tvaco vā tathā/
S01divav33u:2700: u1.129cd/.sarvasmin eva rāṣṭre tu vidyāc chatru^bhayaṃ mahat//
S01divav33u:2701: u1.130ab/.dine hy ulkā^prayuktir vā jvalantī yadi dṛśyate/
S01divav33u:2703: u1.131ab/.asiṃ prajvalitaṃ paśyet tomaraṃ cakram eva ca/
S01divav33u:2705: u1.132ab/.dīrgham ucchvasate vā +aśvaḥ aśrūṇi ca nipātayet/
S01divav33u:2706: u1.132cd/.pādena karṣate śīghraṃ yuddhe rāja^vadho dhruvaṃ//
S01divav33u:2707: u1.133ab/.kākaś ced gṛham āruhya hā putra; iti vāśati/
S01divav33u:2709: u1.134ab/.anagnau jāyate dhūmaḥ sthale padmāni vā yadā/
S01divav33u:2710: u1.134cd/.vināśaṃ tasya deśasya niyamāc chīghram ādiśet//
S01divav33u:2711: u1.135ab/.āravanti yadā ghoraṃ meghā vṛkamṛgās tathā/
S01divav33u:2712: u1.135cd/.vināśaṃ tasya deśasya vidyāc chīghram upasthitaṃ//
S01divav33u:2714: u1.136cd/.gṛhāḥ śūnyodakena^api śuṣkās tatra bhayaṃ bhavet//
S01divav33u:2718: u1.138cd/.anyad vā^api praharaṇaṃ parebhyo jāyate bhayaṃ//
S01divav33u:2721: u1.140ab/.narāṇāṃ pramadānāṃ ca rati^harṣo na jāyate/
S01divav33u:2722: u1.140cd/.sarvatra śoka^cintā vā mahat tatra bhayaṃ bhavet//
S01divav33u:2723: u1.141ab/.nirgranthā; ṛṣayaḥ santo deśān prakrameyur yataḥ/
S01divav33u:2724: u1.141cd/.nadīṃ bhitvā nikuñjānvā sa deśo naśyate +acirāt//
S01divav33u:2725: u1.142ab/.yatrauṣadhyaś ca virasā jalaṃ ca parihīyate/
S01divav33u:2727: u1.143ab/.matsyāḥ kūrmāś ca sarpāś ca mriyante yatra jāṅgalāḥ/
S01divav33u:2729: u1.144ab/.apūrvāḥ pakṣiṇo yatra sthale vāriṇi; eva vā/
S01divav33u:2731: u1.145ab/.mahā^patho yadā kakṣaiḥ prasṛtair apatho bhavet/
S01divav33u:2734: u1.147/.paṭha bhos triśaṅko puruṣa^pinyādhyāyaṃ/ atha kiṃ/ kathayatu bhagavān/
S01divav33u:2736: .atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin puruṣa^pinyādhyāyaṃ vyākhāmi tac chrūyatāṃ/
S01divav33u:2741: tatra sukugṛṣṭyā aṣṭāṅgula^pramāṇayā dvādaśākṣagṛṣṭayaḥ svaśarīraṃ (p.148) dairghyeṇa jñātavyaṃ/
S01divav33u:2743: catur^daśa gṛṣṭayo nakṣatrāṇāṃ padaṃ yatra saṃdṛśyate/
S01divav33u:2748: u2.1ab/.kṛttikāyāṃ hi jātasya mukhe vai catur^aṅgulaḥ/
S01divav33u:2750: u2.2ab/.bhogavān yaśasā yuktaḥ paṇḍito jvalati śriyā/
S01divav33u:2751: u2.2cd/.kṛttikāsv atha jātasya bhavaty etad dhi lakṣaṇaṃ//
S01divav33u:2752: u2.3ab/.dṛśyate vraṇa; evāyaṃ yasya vai catur^aṅgulaḥ/
S01divav33u:2753: u2.3cd/.rohiṇyāṃ jātakaḥ so +api vidvān dharma^rataḥ sadā//
S01divav33u:2756: u2.5ab/.grīvāyām ardha^gṛṣṭyā tu dāho yasya pradṛśyate/
S01divav33u:2757: u2.5cd/.mṛgaśīrṣe hy asau jātaḥ śūro bhoga^samarpitaḥ//
S01divav33u:2758: u2.6ab/.ardha^dvitīya^gṛṣṭyā tu pinyo vāme hi yasya tu/
S01divav33u:2759: u2.6cd/.ārdrāyāṃ krodhano jāto mūrkho gopatikaś ca saḥ//
S01divav33u:2760: u2.7ab/.vāme kakṣe vraṇo yasya kṛṣṇaś ca^eva punarvasau/
S01divav33u:2763: u2.8cd/.cakra^madhye ca haste ca sūryaś candro virājate//
S01divav33u:2766: u2.10ab/.hṛdaye yasya dāhaḥ syād śleṣāyāṃ kali^priyaḥ/
S01divav33u:2767: u2.10cd/.duḥśīlo duḥkhasaṃvāso maithunābhir ataś ca saḥ//
S01divav33u:2768: u2.11ab/.adha; urasi pṛṣṭhe vā yasya vraṇaḥ pradṛśyate/
S01divav33u:2769: u2.11cd/.maghāyāṃ dhanavān jāto mahā^ātma dhārmiko naraḥ//
S01divav33u:2776: u2.15ab/.vyaṃjane yasya pinyas tu dṛśyate niyamenahi/
S01divav33u:2777: u2.15cd/.citrā^jātaḥ sa ced rogī nṛtyagītaratas tathā//
S01divav33u:2778: u2.16ab/.vyañjane +api ca; ūrdhve vā pītaḥ pinyaḥpradṛśyate/
S01divav33u:2779: u2.16cd/.jātaḥ svātyām asau lubdho guṇadviṣṭo hy apaṇḍitaḥ//
S01divav33u:2780: u2.17ab/.kugṛṣṭyā yasya; ūrūbhyāṃ pinyo lohita; eva hi/
S01divav33u:2786: u2.20ab/.adho yasya^iha ca^ūrubhyāṃ pinyo jyeṣṭhe sa jāyate/
S01divav33u:2787: u2.20cd/.alpa^ayur apriyo duḥkhī duḥśīlaḥ kṛpaṇas tathā//
S01divav33u:2788: u2.21ab/.jānubhyām ūrdhvataḥ sūkṣmo vraṇo yasya^iha dṛśyate/(p.150)
S01divav33u:2789: u2.21cd/.mūlena bhāgyavān jātaḥ svagṛhaṃ nāśayel laghu//
S01divav33u:2793: u2.23cd/.yadi dṛśyet sa medhāvī bhogavān syāj jana^priyaḥ//
S01divav33u:2794: u2.24ab/.dvitīyaḥ pinyo dṛśyeta dhanavān bhogavān sadā/
S01divav33u:2796: u2.25ab/.dhaniṣṭhāyāṃ ca jaṅghāyāṃ kṛṣṇaḥ pinyaḥ pradṛśyate/
S01divav33u:2798: u2.26ab/.dvikugṛṣṭyā ca jaṅghāyāṃ kṛṣṇaḥ pinyaḥ pradṛśyate/
S01divav33u:2799: u2.26cd/.mūrkhaḥ śatabhiṣāyāṃ tu mriyate hy adakena saḥ//
S01divav33u:2800: u2.27ab/.adho jaṅghāṃ kugṛṣṭyā tu pūrvabhādrapade vraṇaḥ/
S01divav33u:2801: u2.27cd/.paropatāpako mūrkho daridraś caura; ity api//
S01divav33u:2802: u2.28ab/.kuguṣṭyā yasya pinyaḥ syāj jāto bhādrapada^uttare/
S01divav33u:2804: u2.29ab/.ubhayoḥ pādayoḥ sūkṣmaḥ pinyo yasya pradṛśyate/
S01divav33u:2805: u2.29cd/.revatyāṃ jāyate nīco nāpitaḥ sa havaty api//
S01divav33u:2807: u2.30cd/.arogo balavān nityam aśvinyāṃ jāta; eva saḥ//
S01divav33u:2808: u2.31ab/.atha pāṇitale pinyo bharaṇyām akṣayaḥ smṛtaḥ/
S01divav33u:2810: u2.32ab/.nakṣatrāṇāṃ padaṃ hy etad yena caryā prajāyate/
S01divav33u:2811: u2.32cd/.etad dhi loka^prajñānaṃ loko yatra samāśritaḥ//iti pinyādhyāyāḥ//
S01divav33u:2813: .atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin piṭakādhyāyaṃ nāma^adhyāyaṃ vyākhāsyāmi/
S01divav33u:2818: u3.1cd/.strīṇāṃ ca puruṣāṇāṃ ca piṭakaṃ sarva^karmakaṃ//
S01divav33u:2819: u3.2ab/.lābha^alābhaṃ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ jīvitaṃ maraṇaṃ tathā/
S01divav33u:2820: u3.2cd/.prājñā yenābhijānanti taṃ ca sarvaṃ nibodhatāṃ//
S01divav33u:2821: u3.3ab/.tatrābhighātadagdhā vā tilās tad rūpakā; api/
S01divav33u:2826: u3.5cd/.yadā savarṇa^piṭako mūrdhni rājā mahān smṛtaḥ/
S01divav33u:2827: u3.6ab/.śīrṣe tu dhana^dhānyābhyāṃ kāntaye subhagāya ca/
S01divav33u:2831: u3.8ab/.aśrūpātaḥ dhruvaṃ śokaḥ śravaṇe goṣu nāśakaḥ/
S01divav33u:2836: u3.10cd/.cibuke hanudeśe ca dhanaṃ gāvaḥ satāṃ śriyaḥ//
S01divav33u:2837: u3.11ab/.gale tu dānam āpnoti pānam ābharaṇāni ca/
S01divav33u:2839: u3.12ab/.jāto +ayaṃ śiraso mūle hanuni ca dhana^kṣayaḥ/
S01divav33u:2842: u3.13cd/.pārśve tu sukha^śayyāyai stane tu sutajanyatā//
S01divav33u:2844: u3.14cd/.bāhvoḥ śatru^vināśāya yuktaṃ strī^lābha; eva ca//
S01divav33u:2845: u3.15ab/.dadāty ābharaṇaṃ jātaḥ prabāhvoḥ kurpare kṣudhā/
S01divav33u:2847: u3.16ab/.saubhagaṃ dhana^lābhaṃca jātaḥ pāṇau dadāti ca/
S01divav33u:2848: u3.16cd/.puṣpito hy ekadeśe tu daśaneṣu nakheṣu ca//
S01divav33u:2851: u3.18ab/.jaghane vyasanaṃ vidyān nārya dauḥśīlyam eva ca/
S01divav33u:2852: u3.18cd/.putrotpattis tu vṛṣaṇe liṅge bhāryā tu śobhanā//
S01divav33u:2855: u3.20ab/.jānau śatru^bhayaṃ vidyāt tathā^eva ca dhana^kṣayaṃ/
S01divav33u:2856: u3.20cd/.jānu^saṃdhau vijānīyān meḍhrake hy atha jātakaiḥ/
S01divav33u:2858: u3.21ab/.strī^lābhaṃ vakṣasi ca^eva bhaved anyo nirarthakaḥ/
S01divav33u:2859: u3.21cd/.jaṅghāyāṃ parasevā tu paradeśāt tu bhujyate//
S01divav33u:2860: u3.22ab/.maṇibandhe tu piṭako bandhanaṃ nirdiśed dhruvaṃ/(p.153)
S01divav33u:2861: u3.22cd/.parivādhaṃ sa labhate bandhanaṃ ca na saṃśayaḥ/
S01divav33u:2862: u3.22ef/.pārśve gulphe ca jānīyāc chastreṇa maraṇaṃ dhruvaṃ//
S01divav33u:2865: u3.24ab/.yasya pāda^tale jātas tathā hasta^tale +api ca/
S01divav33u:2866: u3.24cd/.dhanaṃ dhānyaṃ sutā gāvaḥ striyo yānāni ca^apnuyāt//
S01divav33u:2867: u3.25ab/.snigdhaṃ snigdheṣu vijñeyaṃ caleṣu ca calaṃ phalaṃ/
S01divav33u:2868: u3.25cd/.sthāna^sthe vipulaṃ dadyāt phalaṃ nṛṇāṃ śubhodayaṃ//
S01divav33u:2869: u3.26ab/.vivarṇo viparītaś ca phalaṃ sarvaṃ prayacchati/
S01divav33u:2870: u3.26cd/.puṃsāṃ madhye ye snigdhāś ca deśe dakṣiṇataś ca ye/
S01divav33u:2871: u3.26ef/.tathā ca^abhyantare ca^eva sthāne tu pratipūjitāḥ//
S01divav33u:2872: u3.27ab/.strīṇāṃ mṛduṣu deśeṣu vaktrān teṣu ca parvataḥ/
S01divav33u:2873: u3.27cd/.tattvaṃ vijñāya pinyānaṃ sthānaṃ varṇaṃ ca janma ca//
S01divav33u:2874: u3.28ab/.sthāna^asthānaṃ ca matimān vikāraṃ gatim eva ca/
S01divav33u:2875: u3.28cd/.ādiśet tu naraḥ paścād yatha^evaṃ samudāhṛtaṃ//
S01divav33u:2876: u3.29ab/.vāmabhāge tu nārīṇāṃ vijñeeyāḥ piṭakāḥ śubhāḥ/
S01divav33u:2877: u3.29cd/.dakṣiṇe tu manuṣyāṇāṃ bhavanti hy artha^sādhakāḥ//
S01divav33u:2878: u3.30ab/.viparītās tu piṭakā moghās tu bahavaḥ smṛtāḥ/
S01divav33u:2879: u3.30cd/.yathoktānaṃ ca sandhisthāḥ sarve viphaladāḥ smṛtāḥ//
S01divav33u:2880: u3.31ab/.siddhāḥ dhruvā vraṇā bhidyās tathā sadyaḥ^kṛtāś ca ye/
S01divav33u:2881: u3.31cd/.dharma^kīlasamāś ca^eva sarve te piṭakāḥ smṛtāḥ//
S01divav33u:2883: u3.32cd/.ity āha bhagavāṃs triśaṅkuḥ śiṣyebhyo nitya^darśanaṃ//
S01divav33u:2884: u3.33ab/.na nakhena na śastreṇa na^āyasena kathaṃcana/(p.154)
S01divav33u:2885: u3.33cd/.kāñcanena suvarṇena dahed viprāṃś ca bhojayed//
S01divav33u:2893: u4.1ab/.śubha^aśubhaṃ ca svapnānāṃ yat phalaṃ samudāhṛtaṃ/
S01divav33u:2895: u4.1ef/.yas tu paśyati svapna^ante kuṭumbaṃ tasya vardhate//
S01divav33u:2896: u4.2ab/.yas tu paśyati svapna^ante rājānnaṃ kuñjaraṃ hayaṃ/
S01divav33u:2897: u4.2cd/.suvarṇaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ ca^eva kuṭumbaṃ tasya vardhate/
S01divav33u:2898: u4.3ab/.sārasāṃś ca śukān haṃsān krauñcān śvetāṃś ca pakṣiṇaḥ/
S01divav33u:2899: u4.3cd/.yas tu paśyati svapne vai kuṭumbaṃ tasya vardhate/
S01divav33u:2900: u4.4ab/.samṛddhāni ca śasyāni navāni surabhīṇi ca/
S01divav33u:2901: u4.4cd/.padminīṃ puṣpitāṃ ca^api purṇa^kumbhāṃs tathā^eva ca//
S01divav33u:2902: u4.5ab/.prasannam udakaṃ ca^eva puṣpāṇi vividhāni ca/
S01divav33u:2903: u4.5cd/.yas tu paśyati svapna^ante kuṭumbaṃ tasya vardhate//
S01divav33u:2904: u4.6ab/.pāṇau pāde +atha vā jānau śasterṇa dhanuṣā^api vā/
S01divav33u:2907: u4.7cd/.yas tu paśyati svapna^ante kuṭumbaṃ tasya vardhate//
S01divav33u:2910: u4.9ab/.patitaś ca^aruhed bhūyas tatrasthaś ca vibudhyate/(p.155)
S01divav33u:2912: u4.10ab/.goyutaṃ ca rathaṃ svapne hayaṃ vā yo +abhirohati/
S01divav33u:2916: u4.12ab/.āsane śayane yane śarīre +atha gṛhe kṣayaḥ/
S01divav33u:2917: u4.12cd/.yeṣām ārohaṇaṃ śastaṃ teṣām ārohaṇāt kṣayaḥ/
S01divav33u:2918: u4.12ef/.yeṣām ārohaṇād doṣās teṣām ārohaṇād guṇāḥ//
S01divav33u:2919: u4.13ab/.tri^sāhasraṃ bhavet kaṇṭhe daśa śīrṣasya chedane/
S01divav33u:2922: u4.14cd/.śuṣka^udapāna^ṃ tu labhate svapne dṛṣṭvā dhruvaṃ bhayaṃ//
S01divav33u:2924: u4.15cd/.ajāṃ vā paśyataḥ svapne vyādhi^kleśaṃ vinirdiśet//
S01divav33u:2925: u4.16ab/.kākaṃ śyenam ulūkaṃ vā gṛdhraṃ vā^apy atha vartakaṃ/
S01divav33u:2926: u4.16cd/.mayūraṃ paśyataḥ svapne tasya vyasanam ādiśet//
S01divav33u:2927: u4.17ab/.nagnaṃ paśyati hy ātmānaṃ pāṃśunā dhvastam eva vā/
S01divav33u:2929: u4.18ab/.kuṇḍthāḥ striyo +atha saṃlokya caurān dyūta^karāṃs tathā/
S01divav33u:2930: u4.18cd/.kuśīlāṃś cāraṇān dhūrtān svapne dṛṣṭvā dhruvaṃ bhayaṃ//
S01divav33u:2932: u4.19cd/.udvartanaṃ vā kurvāṇaḥ svapna^ante rogam arcchati//
S01divav33u:2933: u4.20ab/.dhvajaṃ chatraṃ vitānaṃ vā svapna^ante yasya dhāryate/
S01divav33u:2935: u4.21acd/.antrais tu yasya nagaraṃ samantāt parivāryate/(p.156)
S01divav33u:2937: u4.22ab/.manuṣyaṃ bhūmi^bhāgaṃ vā svapna^ante grasate yadi/
S01divav33u:2938: u4.22cd/.hradaś ca vā samudro +ayaṃ mahad^aiśvaryam āpnuyāt//
S01divav33u:2939: u4.23ab/.dhanuḥ praharaṇaṃ śastraṃ raktam ābharaṇaṃ dhvajaṃ/
S01divav33u:2940: u4.23cd/.kavacaṃ vā labhet svapne dhana^lābhaṃ vinirdiśet//
S01divav33u:2941: u4.24ab/.prapātaṃ parvataṃ tālaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ kuñjaraṃ hayaṃ/
S01divav33u:2943: u4.24ef/.svapne prapatitau dṛṣṭvā rājñāṃ vyasanam ādiśet//
S01divav33u:2945: u4.25cd/.tayor astaṃ gataṃ dṛṣṭvā rājño vyasanam ādiśet//
S01divav33u:2947: u4.26cd/.valmīkaṃ bhasma^rāśiṃ vā svapne vyasanam ādiśet//
S01divav33u:2948: u4.27ab/.kṛṣṇa^vastrā tu yā nārī kālī kāmayate naraṃ/
S01divav33u:2950: u4.28ab/.tamasi praviśet svapne śambhor vā ca^amaraṃ tathā/
S01divav33u:2951: u4.28cd/.vṛkṣād vā prapatet svapne maraṇaṃ tasya nirdiśet//
S01divav33u:2952: u4.29ab/.vṛkṣāṃ kāṣṭhaṃ tṛṇaṃ vā^api virucaṃ yas tu paśyati/
S01divav33u:2953: u4.29cd/.svapne śīrṣaṃ śarīraṃ vā maraṇaṃ tasya nirdiśet//
S01divav33u:2954: u4.30ab/.devo vā varṣate yatra yatra ca^eva^aśaniḥ patet/
S01divav33u:2955: u4.30cd/.bhūmir vā kampate yatra svapne vyasanam ādiśet//
S01divav33u:2956: u4.31ab/.candra^ādityau yadi svapne khaṇḍau bhinnau ca paśyati/
S01divav33u:2957: u4.31cd/.patitau patamānau vā cakṣus tasya vinaśyati//
S01divav33u:2961: u4.33cd/.labdhvā tu puruṣaḥ svapne dhana^nāśaṃ samarcchati//
S01divav33u:2962: u4.34ab/.gāyantī vā hasantī vā nṛtyantī vā vibudhyate/
S01divav33u:2967: u4.36cd/.krīḍed akuśalāṅkair vā svapne dṛṣṭvā dhruvaṃ kaliḥ//
S01divav33u:2968: u4.37ab/.āsane śayane yane vāstre sābharaṇe gṛhe/
S01divav33u:2969: u4.37cd/.naṣṭe bhraṣṭe viśīrṇe vā; āyāsam adhigacchati//
S01divav33u:2973: u4.39cd/.utpadyate dhruvaṃ tasya skandha^nyāso na saṃśayaḥ//
S01divav33u:2974: u4.40ab/.abhīkṣṇaṃ varṣate devo jalaṃ pāṃśum atha^api vā/
S01divav33u:2975: u4.40cd/.aṅgāraṃ vā^api varṣeta maraṇaṃ tatra nirdiśet//
S01divav33u:2977: u4.41cd/.rajju jālena vā svapne para^cakrād vinirdiśet//
S01divav33u:2981: u4.43cd/.gāyate hasate ca^eva prahāraṃ tasya nirdiśet//
S01divav33u:2982: u4.44ab/.yaṃ kṛṣṇa^vasanā nārī; ārdrā vā malinātha vā/
S01divav33u:2983: u4.44cd/.pariṣvajet naraṃ svapne bandhanaṃ tasya nirdiśet//
S01divav33u:2984: u4.45ab/.kṛṣṇa^sarpo yadi svapne hy abhirohati yaṃ naraṃ/
S01divav33u:2985: u4.45cd/.gātrāṇi veṣṭayed vā^api bandhanaṃ tasya nirdiśet//
S01divav33u:2986: u4.46ab/.latābhiḥ sthāṇu^vṛndair vā yantrai vā parivāryate/(p.158)
S01divav33u:2987: u4.46cd/.svapna^ante puruṣo yas tu bandhanaṃ tasya nirdiśet//
S01divav33u:2989: u4.47cd/.yasya chidyeran svapna^ante bandhanāt sa vimucyate//
S01divav33u:2990: u4.48ab/.viṣamāṇi ca nimnāni parvatān nagarāṇi ca/
S01divav33u:2991: u4.48cd/.yas tu paśyati svapna^ante kṣipraṃ kleśād vimucyate//
S01divav33u:2992: u4.49ab/.pūtanā vā piśācā vā duścalā malinā^atha vā/
S01divav33u:2993: u4.49cd/.evaṃrūpāṇi rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā svapne dhruvaṃ kaliḥ//
S01divav33u:2994: u4.50ab/.susnātaṃ ca suveśaṃ ca sugandhaṃ śukla^vāsasaṃ/
S01divav33u:2995: u4.50cd/.puruṣaṃ vā^atha nārīṃ vā dṛṣṭvā svapne mahat^sukhaṃ//
S01divav33u:2996: u4.51ab/.tṛṇaṃ vṛkṣama atho kāṣṭhaṃ virūḍhaṃ yatra dṛśyate/
S01divav33u:2997: u4.51cd/.gṛhe vā yadi vā kṣetre kṣipraṃ dravya^kṣayo bhavet//
S01divav33u:2999: u4.52cd/.naro vā labhate nārīṃ nārī vā labhate naraṃ//
S01divav33u:3001: u4.53cd/.svapna^ante yas tu paśyeta strī^lābhaṃ tasya nirdiśet//
S01divav33u:3002: u4.54ab/.yas tu hy annāni paśyeta bhūṣaṇaṃ nigaḍais tathā/
S01divav33u:3003: u4.54cd/.naras tu labhate bhāryāṃ nārī vā labhate patiṃ//
S01divav33u:3004: u4.55ab/.mekhalāṃ karṇikāṃ mālāṃ strīṇām ābharaṇāni ca/
S01divav33u:3005: u4.55cd/.labdhvā naro labhed bhāryāṃ nārī ca labhate patiṃ//
S01divav33u:3007: u4.56cd/.abhivadeta yā nārī patiṃ sā labhate +acirāt//
S01divav33u:3008: u4.57ab/.eṣām anyatamaḥ kuṣau praviśec ca yadi striyāḥ/
S01divav33u:3010: u4.58ab/.phalāni ca samagrāṇi vanāni haritāni ca//
S01divav33u:3013: u4.59cd/.labdhā nārī tu svapna^ante śrīmat^putraṃ prasūyate//
S01divav33u:3014: u4.60ab/.upāyana^sūtrayor antaḥ sajjaṃ tatra tu piṇḍakaṃ/
S01divav33u:3015: u4.60cd/.svapne yā labhate nārī sā^api putraṃ prasūyate/
S01divav33u:3016: u4.60ef/.yamaṃ tu bhājanaṃ ca^api yamaṃ tu sā prasūyate//
S01divav33u:3017: u4.61ab/.mlāyantīm atha grīṣmān te taruṇīm ātmikām api/
S01divav33u:3018: u4.61cd/.śuṣkāṃ dṛṣṭvā tathā svapne svapakṣa^maraṇaṃ bhavet//
S01divav33u:3019: u4.62ab/.bāhavo yasya vardhante cakṣur aṅgulayo +api vā/
S01divav33u:3020: u4.62cd/.jñātayo tasya vardhante śatruṇāṃ maraṇaṃ bhavet//
S01divav33u:3021: u4.63ab/.badhyante bāhavo yasya cakṣuś ca vyākulaṃ bhavet/
S01divav33u:3022: u4.63cd/.bāhur vā prapated yasya sva^pakṣa^maranaṃ bhavet//
S01divav33u:3023: u4.64ab/.devo vā yadi vā preto nāryā vastraṃ phalāni vā/
S01divav33u:3024: u4.64cd/.svapne prayacchate yasyāḥ putras tasyāḥ prajāyate//
S01divav33u:3025: u4.65ab/.apakṛṣṭo rudanyo vā nagno +atha malinaḥ kṛśaḥ/
S01divav33u:3027: u4.66ab/.carma yantraṃ gaṇitaṃ vā kīlaṃ vā^atha kilāṭakaṃ/
S01divav33u:3028: u4.66cd/.svapne labdhvā ca prāpnu[jānī]yād dhruvaṃ vastra^āgamo bhavet//
S01divav33u:3029: u4.67ab/.amānuṣo +atha rājā vā devaḥ preto +atha brāhmaṇaḥ/
S01divav33u:3030: u4.67cd/.svapne yathā te jalpa^nti sa tathā^artho bhaviṣyati//
S01divav33u:3032: u4.68cd/.yac ca^anusmarate dṛṣṭvā yac ca^api bahu paśyati//
S01divav33u:3034: u4.69cd/.viṣamaṃ vā tathā^adhvānaṃ chidraṃ vā pratipadyate//
S01divav33u:3035: u4.70ab/.agniṃ prajvalitaṃ taptaṃ śamitvā tu praśasyate/(p.160)
S01divav33u:3036: u4.70cd/.gṛhāṇāṃ karaṇaṃ śastaṃ bhedanaṃ na praśasyate//
S01divav33u:3037: u4.71ab/.nirmalaṃ gaganaṃ śastaṃ sameghaṃ na praśasyate//
S01divav33u:3038: u4.71cd/.prasannam udakaṃ śastaṃ kaluṣaṃ na praśasyate/
S01divav33u:3039: u4.72ab/.adhvānaṃ gamanaṃ śastaṃ na kvacit saṃnivartanaṃ/
S01divav33u:3041: u4.73ab/.māṃsasya darśanaṃ sādhu bhakṣaṇaṃ na praśasyate/
S01divav33u:3042: u4.73cd/.madyasya darśanaṃ śastaṃ pānaṃ tu na praśasyate//
S01divav33u:3043: u4.74ab/.pṛthivī haritā śastā vivarṇā na praśasyate/
S01divav33u:3045: u4.75ab/.svapneṣu ruditaṃ śastaṃ hasitaṃ na praśasyate/
S01divav33u:3047: u4.76ab/.mālyasya darśanaṃ śastaṃ dhāraṇaṃ na praśasyate/
S01divav33u:3048: u4.76cd/.gātraṃ vikartitaṃ sādhu prokṣitaṃ na praśasyate//
S01divav33u:3050: u4.77cd/.vyādhito malinaḥ śasto bhūṣito na praśasyate/
S01divav33u:3052: u4.78ab/.dhūmrā ghanā dundubhi^śaṅkha^śabdo vāto +abhra^vṛṣṭiś ca tathā samantāt/
S01divav33u:3053: u4.78cd/.sarva^sthirāṇāṃ ca calaś ca yaḥ syād ye ca^antare doṣa^kṛtā vikārāḥ//
S01divav33u:3054: u4.79ab/.pūrveṣu rūpeṣu yathāvad iṣṭā rāja^rṣayo deva^gaṇāś ca sarve/
S01divav33u:3055: u4.79cd/.yad brāhmaṇa^gātra^vikartanaṃ ca; etāni sarvāṇy api śobhanāni//
S01divav33u:3056: u4.80ab/.yat pūrva^rūpeṣu bhavet praśastaṃ duḥsvapnam etāni śamaṃ nayanti/
S01divav33u:3057: u4.80cd/.gāvaḥ pradānaṃ dvija^pūjanaṃ ca duḥsvapnam etena parijitaṃ syāt//
S01divav33u:3058: u4.81ab/.devaṃ ca yaṃ bhaktigato manuṣyas taṃ tu parāṃś ca^arcayituṃ yateta/(p.161)
S01divav33u:3059: u4.81cd/.svapnaṃ tu dṛṣṭvā prathame pradoṣe saṃvatsara^ante +asya vipākam āhuḥ//
S01divav33u:3060: u4.82ab/.ṣaṇ^māsikaṃ yac ca bhaved dvitīye ṣaṭpākṣikaṃ yat tu bhavet tṛtīye/
S01divav33u:3061: u4.82cd/.adhyardha^māse taram eva yat syāt phalec caturthe rajanī^prabhāte//
S01divav33u:3063: u4.83cd/.pūjā gurūṇāṃ parimiṣṭam annaṃ duḥsvapnam etāni vināśayanti//
S01divav33u:3066: atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārinn aparam api svapna^adhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi/
S01divav33u:3072: u5.1cd/.nimittaṃ yādṛśaṃ yasya śṛṇu vakṣyāmi tatvataḥ//
S01divav33u:3073: u5.2ab/.jāgrato yadi vā trasto divā svapnāni paśyati/
S01divav33u:3074: u5.2cd/.na tu bhayaṃ bhavet tasya jānīyād eva buddhimān//
S01divav33u:3075: u5.3ab/.yasya tu yo bhavec chatrur yasya vidheyam icchati/
S01divav33u:3076: u5.3cd/.svapne tu kalahaṃ dṛṣṭvā kṣipraṃ prītir bhaviṣyati//
S01divav33u:3078: u5.4cd/.adhvānaṃ cira^kālena tathā hy eṣa nivartate//
S01divav33u:3079: u5.5ab/.madhyame bhavate naiva kṣipraṃ bhavati paścime/
S01divav33u:3081: u5.6ab/.dṛṣṭvā jalacarān matsyān evaṃ jānīta buddhimān/
S01divav33u:3082: u5.6cd/.yat kiñcid ārabhiṣyāmi kṣipram eva bhaviṣyati//
S01divav33u:3083: u5.7ab/.campāyāṃ dhṛṣaṇaṃ haste dhṛṣet svapna^antareṣu vā/
S01divav33u:3085: u5.8ab/.sarvāṇi khalu pānāni madhurāṇi sukhāni ca/
S01divav33u:3086: u5.8cd/.yas tu pibati svapna^ante sa ca lābhaiḥ prayujyate//
S01divav33u:3088: u5.9cd/.pratibuddhas tu jānīyāt śatrur eva pramūrcchati//
S01divav33u:3089: u5.10ab/.upari kākā gṛdhrāś ca dhāvanty upari yānti ca/
S01divav33u:3092: u5.11cd/.pratibuddho vijānīyād bhāryā me jāram icchati//
S01divav33u:3093: u5.12ab/.ekaś ca dharaṇau pādo dvitīyaḥ śirasi sthitaḥ/
S01divav33u:3095: u5.13ab/.samudraṃ yadi paśyed vā pātum icchati tajjalaṃ/
S01divav33u:3097: u5.14ab/.vṛkṣaṃ parvatam āruhya nāgaṃ ca turagaṃ tathā/
S01divav33u:3099: u5.15ab/.yas tu svapna^antare paśyet pitṝn yān iha ca^anyathā/
S01divav33u:3100: u5.15cd/.tathā mātā pitā ca^eva tasya jīvanti te ciraṃ//
S01divav33u:3103: u5.17ab/.ānanaṃ ca^udake dṛṣṭvā madhye +agnau ca vidhāvitaṃ/
S01divav33u:3107: u5.19ab/.caurāṇām api sāmagrīṃ svapna^ante yas tu paśyati/
S01divav33u:3109: u5.20ab/.kṛṣṇa^sarpa^gṛhītaṃ tu svapna^ante yas tu paśyati/
S01divav33u:3112: u5.21cd/.yas tu ca^ābharaṇaṃ paśyed bandhu^vargo bhaviṣyati//
S01divav33u:3115: u5.23ab/.yas tu svapna^antare paśyec ca^ātmānam agnitāpitaṃ/
S01divav33u:3121: u5.26ab/.yastu bānara^yuktena gacchate pur imāṃ diśaṃ/
S01divav33u:3122: u5.26cd/.pratibuddho vijānīyād rātrir eṣā hy apaścimā//
S01divav33u:3125: u5.28ab/.sumanāṃ vārṣikaṃ [kīṃ] ca^eva kumudāny utpalāni ca/
S01divav33u:3128: u5.29cd/.pratibuddho vijānīyād yakṣā me hy anukampakāḥ//
S01divav33u:3132: u5.31cd/.yas tu svapna^antare paśyet subhikṣaṃ tatra nirdiśet//
S01divav33u:3133: u5.32ab/.suvarṇaṃ ca tathā rūpyaṃ muktāhāraṃ tathāiva ca/
S01divav33u:3134: u5.32cd/.yas tu svapna^antare paśyan nidhiṃ tatra vinirdiśet//
S01divav33u:3135: u5.33ab/.bandhanaṃ bahu dṛṣṭvā tu chedanaṃ kuṭṭanaṃ tathā/
S01divav33u:3144: .yadi phālgune māse nirghoṣa upari bhavet manuṣyāṇāṃ maraṇaṃ codayati/
S01divav33u:3147: yadi devo garjati prathamaṃ mahā^sasyāni bhavanti/
S01divav33u:3150: .yadi caitre māse devo garjati tadā sarva^sasya^samutpattiṃ codayati/
S01divav33u:3151: yadi candra^graho bhavati mahān sannipāto bhavati/
S01divav33u:3153: yadi nīhāraṃ bhūmiṃ chādayati subhikṣaṃ codayati/
S01divav33u:3155: .yadi vaiśākhe māse devo garjati subhikṣaṃ codayati/
S01divav33u:3156: yadi pūrve paścime śaṅkhe candra^graho bhavati kṣemaṃ codayati/
S01divav33u:3157: yadi ca^ulkā^pāto bhavati yasmiṃś ca janapade nipatati tatra deśe pradhāna^puruṣasya vināśo bhavati/
S01divav33u:3160: .yadi jeyṣṭhe māse devo garjati rogaṃ codayati/
S01divav33u:3161: yadi sūrya^graho bhavati manuṣyāṇāṃ vināśaṃ codayati/
S01divav33u:3162: pūrve paścime vā śaṅkhe yadi candrasya sūryasya kiñcin nimittaṃ lakṣyate tadā kṣemaṃ codayati/
S01divav33u:3163: yadi madhya^rātrau candra^graho bhavati manuṣyāṇām anyonya^ghātaṃ codayati/
S01divav33u:3164: yadi ca^upari nirghoṣo bhavati adhyakṣa^puruṣasya pīḍāṃ codayati/ para^cakrāgamaṃ
S01divav33u:3167: .āṣāḍhe māse yadi sūrya^graho rucira^ābhāso bhavati subhikṣaṃ codayati/
S01divav33u:3173: yadi candra^graho bhavati prathame māse durbhikṣaṃ codayati/
S01divav33u:3175: yadi (p.165) tārakā yatra deśe patanti tatra yuddhaṃ codayati/
S01divav33u:3176: yadi ca^atiśayaṃ bhūmi^cālo bhavati rogaṃ codayati/
S01divav33u:3177: yadi nirghoṣo bhavati tatra gṛhe yo gṛha^svāmī bhavati tasya vināśaṃ codayati/
S01divav33u:3178: atra ca māse +abhinavaṃ prāvaraṇaṃ na prāvaritavyaṃ/ āvāho vivāho na kartavyaḥ/ paribhūto bhavati/
S01divav33u:3180: .yady aśvayuje māse devo garjati manuṣyāṇāṃ vināśanaṃ codayati/
S01divav33u:3182: yadi pūrve yāme candrasya nimittaṃ dṛśyate subhikṣaṃ codayati/
S01divav33u:3185: tatra ca manuṣyā anyonyaṃ vadhayiṣyanti^iti codayati/
S01divav33u:3187: .yadi kārttike māse devo varṣati mahad^ākulaṃ codayati/
S01divav33u:3189: yady eka^antarūpaṃ vāto vāti tatra ca manuṣyā jalena vibhramiṣyanti/
S01divav33u:3191: yadi pūrve yāme utpāto bhavati mahā^varṣaṃ bhavati/
S01divav33u:3195: .yadi mārgaśīrṣe māsi devo garjati śasya^vināśo bhavati/
S01divav33u:3197: yadi ca^ākāśe nirghoṣo bhavati yat pūrva^bhāgīyā manuṣyās teṣām āmayaṃ codayati/
S01divav33u:3198: yadi bhūmi^cālo bhavati yas tatra janapade pradhāna^puruṣo sa vadhān mokṣyati/
S01divav33u:3200: .yadi pauṣe māse devo garjati prathame yāme janapada^nāśo bhavati/
S01divav33u:3202: prathame yāme ca yadi candra^uparāgo bhavati lohita^varṇaś ca dṛśyate udaka^āgamaṃ codayati/
S01divav33u:3205: yadi tārakāḥ patantyo vidṛśyante tatra janapade ākulaṃ codayati/
S01divav33u:3206: yaty ākāśe nirghoṣo bhavati manuṣyāṇāṃ maraṇaṃ codayati/
S01divav33u:3207: yadi dvitīye nirghoṣo bhavati amnuṣyāś caurair hanyante/
S01divav33u:3208: yady atraiva māse tārakā utsṛṣṭā na candro dṛsyate sasyaṃ saṃcodayati/
S01divav33u:3209: yadi bhūmi^cālo bhavati mahāmanuṣyasya maraṇaṃ bhavati/
S01divav33u:3224: u7.3ab/.tatra sarve pravarteyur yatra yeṣu bhaved bhavet/
S01divav33u:3227: u7.4cd/.kṛkare svalpa^celatvaṃ purīṣe tu dṛśaṃ śravaḥ//
S01divav33u:3228: u7.5ab/.bhasme vivādam aphalaṃ vālukāyāṃ tu saṃbhramaḥ/
S01divav33u:3232: u7.6cd/.pakṣayā carate vyādhiḥ patito mṛtyum ādiśet//
S01divav33u:3234: u7.7cd/.vṛkṣa^agre vidyate pānaṃ gṛheṣv atha ... lasaḥ//
S01divav33u:3236: u7.8cd/.amṛtaṃ ca sthitaṃ dṛṣṭvā; odanaṃ na^atra saṃśayaḥ//
S01divav33u:3237: u7.9ab/.gavāṃ pṛṣṭhe dhruvaṃ siddhir aśvapṛṣṭhe dhruvaṃ jayaḥ/
S01divav33u:3238: u7.9cd/.avikānām ajānāṃ ca pṛṣṭhe sarvatra śasyate//
S01divav33u:3239: u7.10ab/.uṣṭrapṛṣṭhe ghruvaṃ kleśaḥ śvānapṛṣṭhe ca vidravaḥ/(p.167)
S01divav33u:3240: u7.10cd/.pṛṣṭhe ca gardabhasya^iha maraṇaṃ na^atra saṃśayaḥ//
S01divav33u:3241: u7.11ab/.kīle tu maraṇaṃ vidyād yūpa^agre ca na saṃśayaḥ/
S01divav33u:3242: u7.11cd/.kumbha^sthāne śmaśāne vā mṛto vā yatra dṛśyate//
S01divav33u:3243: u7.12ab/.antarīkṣe praḍīnaṃ tu; aphalaṃ tu vinirdiśet/
S01divav33u:3247: u7.13cd/.sameṣu samake kṣetre samān varṇān vinirdiśet/
S01divav33u:3251: u7.14ef/.tāṃ diśaṃ gamanaṃ vidyād yathā tasya tathā punaḥ//
S01divav33u:3252: u7.15ab/.kīṭā vā^atha pataṅgā vā bhayaṃ yad iha dṛśyate/
S01divav33u:3254: u7.16ab/.apāṃ samīpe gajamastake vā sūrya^udaye brāhmaṇa^sannidhau vā/
S01divav33u:3255: u7.16cd/.mukhya prakāśe +apy ahimastake vā yaḥ paśyate khañjanakaṃ sa dhanyaḥ//
S01divav33u:3256: u7.17ab/.mātaṅga^rājo matimāṃs triśaṅkuḥ provāca tattvaṃ kañjanaṃ ca śāstraṃ/
S01divav33u:3257: u7.17cd/.snigdhe sarukṣe viṣame same ca ādeśa yad doṣa^guṇair yathoktaiḥ/
S01divav33u:3258: u7.17ef/.tamādiśet tatra samīkṣya vidvān śubha^aśubhaṃ tatphalam ādiśec ca//
S01divav33u:3269: teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ tapasā vīryeṇa ca imaṃ śivā^rutaṃ nāma^adhyāyaṃ vyākhāmi/
S01divav33u:3273: yādṛśaṃ ca yathā vāśet teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ vāśān śṛṇotha me/
S01divav33u:3274: pūrvasyāṃ diśi yadi vāśet śivā pūrva^mukhaṃ sthitvā trīn vārān vāśed vṛddhiṃ nivedayati/
S01divav33u:3275: caturo vārān yadi vāśed atra maṅgalaṃ nivedayati/
S01divav33u:3284: .dakṣiṇāyāṃ dakṣiṇa^mukhaṃ sthitvā trivārān vāśed `atṛ atṛ' kurute maraṇaṃ tatra nivedayati/
S01divav33u:3285: caturo vārān vāśati dakṣiṇa^mukhaṃ sthitvā dakṣiṇāyā eva diśāyāḥ priya^samāgamaṃ nivedayati/
S01divav33u:3291: nivedayati/ abhīkṣṇaṃ vāśed ākulaṃ nivedayati/ ety āha bhagavāṃs triśaṅkuḥ/
S01divav33u:3293: .paścimāyāṃ paścima^abhimukhaṃ sthitvā śivā trivārān vāśati maraṇaṃ nivedayati/
S01divav33u:3302: .uttarasyāṃ diśi uttara^abhimukhaṃ sthitvā trivārān vāśati puruṣasya prasthitasya nirarthakaṃ gamanaṃ bhavati/
S01divav33u:3309: yakṣa^rākṣasa^piśāca^kumbhāṇḍa^bhayaṃ nivedayati/ ity āha bhagavāṃs triśaṅkuḥ/
S01divav33u:3311: .diśi vidiśi ca^eva giri^prāgbhāreṣu śikhareṣu nirdeśaṃ taṃ ca śṛṇotha me/
S01divav33u:3317: na ca śṛgāla^bhaye śivā (vā) me sameti apramattena smṛtimatā pūjayitavyā śivā nityaṃ/
S01divav33u:3320: evaṃ ``sarve +arthās tasya sidhyanti triśaṅkor vacanaṃ yathā'' /
S01divav33u:3324: ūrdhva^mukho yadi vāśati varṣāṃ tatra nivedayati/
S01divav33u:3325: dvipathe yadi vāśati pūrva^mukhaṃ sthitvā artha^lābhaṃ nivedayati/
S01divav33u:3326: dakṣiṇa^abhimukho yadi vāśati yathā priya^samāgamanaṃ nivedayati/
S01divav33u:3327: dvipathe paścima^abhimukho yadi vāśati kalahaṃ vivādaṃ vigrahaṃ maraṇaṃ ca nivedayati/
S01divav33u:3328: kūpakaṇṭhake yadi vāśati arthaṃ tatra nivedayati/
S01divav33u:3331: atimṛdukaṃ yadi vāśati vyādhikaṃ tatra nivedayati/
S01divav33u:3332: gītahāreṇa yadi vāśati artham anarthaṃ ca nivedayati/
S01divav33u:3333: tribhir vārair arthaṃ caturbhir anarthaṃ pañcabhiḥ priya^samāgamaṃ ṣaḍbhir bhojanaṃ saptabhir bhayam aṣṭabhir vigrahaṃ vivādaṃ ca/
S01divav33u:3337: nānā^āhāre yadi vāśati mārge saṃsthitasya^api sarvaṃ vakṣyāmi taṃ śṛṇotha me/
S01divav33u:3338: saṃprasthitasya puruṣasya śivā vāśati vā yā pūrva^mukhaṃ sthitvā kṣipra^gamanam artha^siddhiṃ nivedayati/
S01divav33u:3339: atha dakṣiṇa^mukhaṃ vāśati yā artha^siddhiṃ nivedayati/
S01divav33u:3340: pañcān mukhaṃ vāśati bhayaṃ nivedayati/ atha^uttaramukhaṃ
S01divav33u:3342: atha saṃprasthitasya vāśati yā purataḥ sthitvā upakleśaṃ nivedayati/
S01divav33u:3343: atha dakṣiṇe vāśati yadi dakṣiṇa^mukhā eva diśaḥ (p.170) karma^siddhiṃ ca nivedayati/
S01divav33u:3344: paścimato yadi vāśati caurato +ahitam asya duḥkha^daurmanasyaṃ nivedayati/
S01divav33u:3345: atha mārge vrajato dakṣiṇato vāśati mahā^vyādhim anarthaṃ caurā muṣanti tan nivedayati/ glānasya
S01divav33u:3346: yadi vāśati dakṣiṇa^mukhaṃ, ``na sa cikitsituṃ śakyo mṛtyu^dūtena coditaḥ''/
S01divav33u:3347: glānasya yadi vāśati uttara^mukhaṃ sthitvā ārogyadhana^lābhaṃ ca nivedayati/
S01divav33u:3348: atha mūrdhnā vāśati yā upakreśaṃ nivedayati/
S01divav33u:3349: atha paścimamukhaṃ sthitvā yā anyonyaṃ vyāharate yama^śāsanaṃ [nivedayati]/
S01divav33u:3350: nānā^āhāre yadi vāśati, yā saṃkṣobhaṃ nivedayati/
S01divav33u:3353: .śivā purataḥ puruṣasya mārga^prayātasya yadi vāśati, yā agrataḥ kṣema^mārgaṃ vijñāpayati/
S01divav33u:3355: mārgaṃ vrajato +asya śivā vāmena^āgatya gacchate dakṣiṇa^mukhaṃ kṣema^mārgaṃ vijānīyād artha^siddhiṃ ca nivedayati/
S01divav33u:3356: mārge vrajataḥ puruṣasya śivā vāmena^āgatya puratā vāśati yā tathā sabhayaṃ mārgaṃ vijñāpayati/
S01divav33u:3358: dakṣiṇāṃ diśaṃ vāmaṃ gatvā vāmataḥ parivarteta ``na tan mārgeṇa gantavyaṃ triśaṅku^vacanaṃ yathā'' /
S01divav33u:3359: purataḥ śivā gatvā agrataś ca niṣīdati sabhayaṃ mārgaṃ vijānīyāt/
S01divav33u:3361: śivā purata āgatya vāmena parivartate bhayam etīha+a tena^api bhayaṃ jānīyād vicakṣaṇaḥ/
S01divav33u:3362: senāyām āvāhitāyāṃ śivā vaśati paścimaṃ nivartanaṃ nivedayati/
S01divav33u:3365: senāyāṃ vraja^mānāyāṃ śivā āgacched agrataḥ senājayaṃ nivedayati/
S01divav33u:3367: sārthasya vrajamānasya śivā gacchaty agrataḥ kṣemamārgaṃ nivedayati/
S01divav33u:3369: puruṣasya pathi vrajato vāmato vāśati mārgaṃ nivedayati/
S01divav33u:3373: pūrveṇa^uttareṇa^api śivā vāśati kṣemaṃ tatra nivedayati/
S01divav33u:3374: dakṣiṇe paścime yadi vāśati yā bhayaṃ tatra nivedayati/
S01divav33u:3375: u8.12ab/.vāmato na praśaṃsanti tathā^eva vidiśāsu ca/
S01divav33u:3377: u8.13ab/.adharāṃ tu bhayaṃ vakṣye triśaṅku^vacanaṃ yathā//
S01divav33u:3381: .vyādhir upadravāś ca, ``sava tu praśamaṃ yānti triśaṅku^vacanaṃ yathā'' /
S01divav33u:3383: yaḥ śivāyā divaso bhavati sa divaso jñātavyaḥ/
S01divav33u:3406: u9.2cd/.tatra jātaṃ sukhataraṃ dvitīyā jñānam antare//
S01divav33u:3407: u9.3ab/.tṛtīyā sā lekhā yatra pradeśinyā pravartate/
S01divav33u:3410: u9.4cd/.dviniḥsṛto viśuddha^ātmā jīved varṣaśataṃ hi saḥ//
S01divav33u:3411: u9.5ab/.triṃśat tribhāgena jāyīyād ardhe pañcāśad āyuṣaḥ/
S01divav33u:3417: u9.8ab/.dīrghāyuṣaṃ vijānīyād dīrghalekhā tu yā bhavet/
S01divav33u:3418: u9.8cd/.hrasvāyuṣaṃ vijānīyād dhrasvalekhā tu yā bhavet//
S01divav33u:3420: u9.9cd/.divā tu janma nirdiṣṭam aṅguṣṭha^yavake dhravaṃ//
S01divav33u:3421: u9.10ab/.avyakto yavako yatra tatra lagnaṃ vinirdiśet/
S01divav33u:3423: u9.11ab/.divasaṃ janma nirdiśed rātrau strī^saṃjñako bhavet/(p.173)
S01divav33u:3424: u9.11cd/.rātriḥ sandhyā samākhyātā bhāgair anyair na saṃśayaḥ/
S01divav33u:3428: u9.13ab/.yavamālā ca matsyaḥ syād aṅguṣṭha^yavako ratau/
S01divav33u:3430: u9.14ab/.yasya syād yavakaś ca^api ca^apo vā svastikas tathā/
S01divav33u:3431: u9.14cd/.taleṣu yeṣu dṛśyante dhanyās te puruṣā hy amī//
S01divav33u:3432: u9.15ab/.matsyo dhānyaṃ bhaved bhogāyāmiṣādau yave dhanaṃ/
S01divav33u:3434: u9.16ab/.patākābhir dhvajair vā^api śaktibhis tomarais tathā/
S01divav33u:3437: u9.17ab/.prekṣyante śākhyā pañca haste catvāra eva ca/
S01divav33u:3438: u9.17cd/.kṣatriyo vā bhaved bhogī rājabhiś ca^api satkṛtaḥ//
S01divav33u:3439: u9.18ab/.vaiśyo +atha kṣatriyo vāgmī dhana^dhānyaṃ na saṃśayaḥ/
S01divav33u:3441: u9.19ab/.satatam abhipūjyaḥ syāt sarveṣāṃ ca priyaṃvadaḥ/
S01divav33u:3442: u9.19cd/.viśīlaḥ śīlakuñco vā bahubhir na bahus tathā//
S01divav33u:3443: u9.20ab/.śyāmavarṇā +atha bhinnā vā sā lekhā duḥkhabhāginī/
S01divav33u:3444: u9.20cd/.ktilekhā yasya dṛśyante yasya pūrṇāḥ karathitāḥ/
S01divav33u:3445: u9.20ef/.mahā^bhogo mahā^vidvān jīved varṣaśataṃ ca saḥ//
S01divav33u:3447: u9.21cd/.taleṣu yasya dṛśyante taṃ vidyāt pṛthivīpatiṃ//
S01divav33u:3448: u9.22ab/.bhagas tu bhāgyāya dhvajaiḥ patākair hastyaśvamālāṅkuśataś ca rājā/
S01divav33u:3449: u9.22cd/.matsyo nu pānāya yavo dhanāya vedis tu yajñāya gavāṃ ca goṣṭhaḥ//
S01divav33u:3450: u9.23ab/.anāmikāparva atikramed yadi kaniṣṭhikā varṣaśataṃ sa jīvati/
S01divav33u:3451: u9.23cd/.sametvaśītir varṣāṇi saptabhir yathā nadīnāṃ bharitāya nirdiśed//
S01divav33u:3452: u9.24ab/.śarīravarṇa^prabhavāṃ tu lekhāṃ savaiśikhāṃ varṇa^vihīnakāṃ ca/
S01divav33u:3454: u9.25ab/.abhyañjanodvartana satkarī[ṣaira]dhyakṣa cūrṇaiś ca vimṛjya pāṇiṃ/
S01divav33u:3455: u9.25cd/.prakṣālya caika^antaraghṛṣṭa^lekhām ekāgracittas tu karaṃ parīkṣet//
S01divav33u:3456: u9.26ab/.valayasamanarādhipaṃ bhajantyaḥ samanugatā maṇibandhane tu tisraḥ/
S01divav33u:3457: u9.26cd/.dvir api ca [sa] bhava^antare mahā^ātmā vippuladhana^śriya āha vastra^lābhaḥ//
S01divav33u:3458: u9.27ab/.dadati satatam unnatas tu pāṇir bhavati cirāya tu dīrghapīnapāṇiḥ/
S01divav33u:3460: u9.28ab/.sudṛśa[kara^talaiś ca]sādhavaste kuṭilakṛtair vinimīlitaiś ca dhūrtāḥ/
S01divav33u:3461: u9.28cd/.bhavati rudhirasannibhaḥ suraktaś ciram iha piṇḍitapāṇirīśvaraḥ syāt//
S01divav33u:3463: u9.29cd/.bhavati bahu^dhano nigūḍhapāṇiś ciram iha jīvati pāna^bhoga^bhogī//
S01divav33u:3464: u9.30ab/.subhaga iha tathoṣṇadīrghapāṇir dhruvam iha śītalapāṇikas tu śaṇṭhaḥ/
S01divav33u:3465: u9.30cd/.iha hi bahu^dhano balena yuktaḥ sutanu susañcitapāṇirekhako yaḥ//
S01divav33u:3466: u9.31ab/.dhanam upanayatīha pāṇilekhā kṛta^janitā jalavac ca yā sudīrghā/(p.175)
S01divav33u:3467: u9.31cd/.jalavadanugatā suvarṇa^varṇā dhanam adhigacchati nimnaśonnatā yā//
S01divav33u:3468: u9.32ab/.dhanam upalabhate surakta^pāṇir vipulamatho ca nirantarāṅguliḥ syāt/
S01divav33u:3469: u9.32cd/.bali^puruṣam api tyajeddhi vittaṃ ditavivaśā ca viśīrṇavarṇa^lekhā//
S01divav33u:3470: u9.33ab/.apagataghṛta^varṇa^pāṇilekho bhavati naro dhanavān balena yuktaḥ/
S01divav33u:3471: u9.33cd/.asubhṛti sadṛśā bhavet tathā bhūṣaṇa^vṛta[rūpavatī śubhā]eka^bhāryā//
S01divav33u:3472: u9.34ab/.bhavati bahu^dhano dhanair vihīnaḥ śrutam adhigamya viśālapāṇilekhaḥ/
S01divav33u:3476: .atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin vāyasa^rutaṃ nāma^adhyāyaṃ vyākhāsyāmi tac chrūyatāṃ/
S01divav33u:3482: u10.1cd/.jayam parājayaṃ ca^eva lābha^alābhaṃ tathā^eva ca//
S01divav33u:3485: u10.3ab/.devāḥ pravadanti śreṣṭhā vāyasānāṃ namā namaḥ/
S01divav33u:3492: u10.6cd/.asūpaṃ nirdiśed bhojyaṃ guḍamiśraṃ tu gorasaṃ//
S01divav33u:3495: u10.8ab/.rūkṣaṃ nirgharṣate tuṇḍaṃ śiraś ca parimārjati/
S01divav33u:3496: u10.8cd/.saphalaṃ vṛkṣam āsthāya dhruvaṃ māṃsena bhojanaṃ//
S01divav33u:3498: u10.9cd/.vyādhena ca hataṃ māṃsaṃ nivedayati bhojanaṃ//
S01divav33u:3501: u10.11ab/.śuṣkavṛkṣe niṣīditvā kṣāmaṃ dīnaṃ ca vyāharet/
S01divav33u:3502: u10.11cd/.kalahaṃ sumahat kṛtvā na ca^arthaṃ tatra sidhyati//
S01divav33u:3503: u10.12ab/.kṣīravṛkṣe niṣīditvā kṣāmaṃ dīnaṃ ca vyāharet/
S01divav33u:3504: u10.12cd/.krameṇa yugamātreṇa na ccārthaṃ tatra sidhyati//
S01divav33u:3508: u10.14cd/.pṛṣṭhena darśayed bhāraṃ kṣudhāpīḍāṃ ca nirdiśet//
S01divav33u:3509: u10.15ab/.pakṣaṃ vidhūyamāno yaḥ paśyan pathasya vāśati/
S01divav33u:3510: u10.15cd/.na tatra gamanaṃ kuryāc cauraiḥ patham upadrutaṃ//
S01divav33u:3511: u10.16ab/.rajjuṃ vā phalakaṃ vā^api yadi karṣati vāyasaḥ/
S01divav33u:3512: u10.16cd/.na tatra gamanaṃ śreyaś cauraiḥ patham upadrutaṃ//
S01divav33u:3513: u10.17ab/.gomaye śuṣkakāṣṭhe vā yadi vāśati vāyasaḥ/
S01divav33u:3514: u10.17cd/.kalahaḥ kuvaco vyādhir na ca^arthaṃ tatra sidhyati//
S01divav33u:3515: u10.18ab/.tṛṇaṃ vā yadi vā kāṣṭhaṃ darśayec ca yadā khagaḥ/(p.177)
S01divav33u:3516: u10.18cd/.purataḥ śuṣkapāṇis tu tatra caura^bhayaṃ bhavet//
S01divav33u:3517: u10.19ab/.sārthopari niṣīditvā kṣāmaṃ dīnaṃ ca vyāharet/
S01divav33u:3519: u10.20ab/.yadā pradakṣiṇaṃ trastaṃ vāśanti vividhaṃ khagāḥ/
S01divav33u:3521: u10.21ab/.bhītas trastaḥ parītaś ca yas tu vyāharate khagaḥ/
S01divav33u:3522: u10.21cd/.paribādhan diśaḥ sarvās tatra bhayam upasthitaṃ//
S01divav33u:3523: u10.22ab/.gacchantaṃ samanugacchet puraḥ sthitvā tu vyāharet/
S01divav33u:3524: u10.22cd/.na tatra gamanaṃ kkuryān mārgam atra praśātanaṃ//
S01divav33u:3525: u10.23ab/.vāstumadhye pratisthāne kṣāmaṃ dīnaṃ ca vyāharet/
S01divav33u:3526: u10.23cd/.vyādhiṃ tatra vijānīyād vāse vā gṛha^svāmināṃ//
S01divav33u:3527: u10.24ab/.śakaṭasya yathā śabdaṃ viśrabdhaṃ vāśati vāyasaḥ/
S01divav33u:3530: u10.25cd/.niṣaṇṇo vāśate kākaḥ prasiddhaṃ gamanaṃ dhruvaṃ//
S01divav33u:3531: u10.26ab/.āsane śayane vā^api sthito vāśati vāyasaḥ/
S01divav33u:3535: u10.28ab/.brahma^sthāne niṣīditvā kṣāmaṃ dīnaṃ ca vāśati/
S01divav33u:3536: u10.28cd/.sandhisthāne harec cauras tatra vai nāsti saṃśayaḥ//
S01divav33u:3542: u10.31cd/.yasya yasya haret tasya dravya^lābhaṃ vinirdiśet//
S01divav33u:3544: u10.32cd/.kāṣṭhaṃ vā vāyasā yatra gṛham āropayanti ca/
S01divav33u:3545: u10.32ef/.nigadanty atra vijānīyād yācakāt tu mahā^bhayaṃ//
S01divav33u:3546: u10.33ab/.nīlaṃ pītaṃ lohitaṃ ca pratisaṃharaṇāni ca/
S01divav33u:3547: u10.33cd/.nigṛhṇanti yatra kākā vyādhiṃ tatra vinirdiśet//
S01divav33u:3548: u10.34ab/.grāmante bhayam ākhyāti kāko vā vāśati dhruvaṃ/
S01divav33u:3549: u10.34cd/.pratyekato vā vāśanti vidyāt tatra mahā^bhayaṃ//
S01divav33u:3551: u10.35cd/.niṣīdan saphale vṛkṣe sa vaden māṃsa^bhojanaṃ//
S01divav33u:3552: u10.36ab/.yasya śīrṣe niṣīditvā karṇaṃ karṣati vāyasaḥ/
S01divav33u:3562: u10.41ab/.prakāre toraṇa^agre vā yadi vāśati vāyasaḥ/
S01divav33u:3563: u10.41cd/.abhīkṣṇaṃ gharṣate tuṇḍaṃ saṃgrāmaṃ tatra nirdiśet//
S01divav33u:3564: u10.42ab/.maṇḍalāni vāvartāni bahir vā nagarasya ca/
S01divav33u:3565: u10.42cd/.vairaṃ ca vigrahaṃ ghoraṃ tatra ca^eva vinirdiśet//
S01divav33u:3566: u10.43ab/.grāme vā nagare vā^api kurvate yatra maṇḍalaṃ/(p.179)
S01divav33u:3568: u10.44ab/.pūrveṇa ca^eva grāmasya yadā sūyati vāyasī/
S01divav33u:3570: u10.45ab/.purastād dakṣiṇe pārśve yadi sūyati vāyasī/
S01divav33u:3571: u10.45cd/.varṣati prathame māse paścād devo na varṣati/
S01divav33u:3576: u10.47cd/.madhyamaṃ ca bhaved varṣaṃ madhya^śasyaṃ ca jāyate//
S01divav33u:3578: u10.48cd/.aśanir nipatet tatra bhayaṃ ca mṛgapakṣīṇāṃ//
S01divav33u:3583: u10.51ab/.yadā tu madhye vṛkṣasya nilayaṃ karoti vāyasī/
S01divav33u:3585: u10.52ab/.skandha^mūle tu vṛkṣasya yadā sūyati vāyasī/
S01divav33u:3586: u10.52cd/.anāvṛṣṭir bhaved ghorā durbhikṣaṃ tatra nirdiśet//
S01divav33u:3587: u10.53ab/.caturaḥ pañca vā potān yadā sūyati vāyasī/
S01divav33u:3588: u10.53cd/.subhikṣaṃ ca bhavet tatra phalānām uditaṃ bhavet//
S01divav33u:3591: .atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin dvāra^lakṣaṇaṃ nāma^adhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi tac chrūyatāṃ/
S01divav33u:3595: u11.1ab/.māhendram atha divyaṃ ca māṅgalyaṃ pūrvataḥ smṛtaḥ/
S01divav33u:3596: u11.1cd/.dakṣiṇe tu diśo bhāge pūṣā ca pitryam eva ca//
S01divav33u:3600: u11.3cd/.atha vai dhanmitraṃ ca paramaṃ maitram eva ca//
S01divav33u:3603: u11.5ab/.samaṃ syāc caturasraṃ ca vistīrṇā ca^eva mṛttikā/
S01divav33u:3606: u11.6cd/.rakta^pāṃśur bhaved yatra rājñāṃ tat tu praśasyate//
S01divav33u:3607: u11.7ab/.trikoṇaṃ kuśasaṃstīrṇam uttānaṃ madhuraṃ ca yat/
S01divav33u:3608: u11.7cd/.vyāyām ato jalaṃ ca^eva vāstu tasya dhanauṣadhī//
S01divav33u:3610: u11.8cd/.anāvāsyaṃ ca tat proktaṃ yac ca putrakṣayāvahaṃ//
S01divav33u:3611: u11.9ab/.yat tu kañjalakakṣais tat tyaktaṃ varṣodakena ca/(p.181)
S01divav33u:3614: u11.10cd/.daśa dvādaśakaṃ vaiśye śūdrasya tatra lekhanaṃ//
S01divav33u:3619: u11.13ab/.uttarāyāṃ tu kartavyaṃ varcaḥ sthānām anuttaraṃ/
S01divav33u:3620: u11.13cd/.aiśānyām eva sarvāṇi prāsādaś ca puromukhaḥ//
S01divav33u:3625: u11.16ab/.vidviṣasya salokasya dvāre syān nu karagrahaḥ/
S01divav33u:3626: u11.16cd/.mahendre pure vā rājyaṃ sūrye sūraprabhāvatā//
S01divav33u:3629: u11.18ab/.puṣpe tu subhago nityaṃ vitathe +apy aśubho bhavet/
S01divav33u:3630: u11.18cd/.śoke bhūta^vikāraḥ syāt soṣe tasya viṣaṇṇatā//
S01divav33u:3632: u11.19cd/.hrade reṇu pariśrāva āditye tu kalir dhruvaṃ//
S01divav33u:3634: u11.20cd/.bhaved asya ca yad dvāraṃ tatra^agni^bhayam ādiśet//
S01divav33u:3635: u11.21ab/.kṣayaṃ vidyāt tasya tasya dhanasya ca kulasya ca/
S01divav33u:3636: u11.21cd/.yame mṛtyuṃ vijānīyāt kule śreṣṭha^uttamasya ca/
S01divav33u:3638: u11.22ab/.bhṛṅge krodhaḥ kaliś ca^eva pitari bhoga^sampadaḥ/
S01divav33u:3641: u11.23cd/.asurare maraṇaṃ ghoraṃ roge tu bahu^doṣatā//
S01divav33u:3642: u11.24ab/.balīṃś ca upahārāṃś ca pravakṣyāṃi yathāgṛhaṃ/
S01divav33u:3643: u11.24cd/.cicitrair vidiśair gandhaiḥ praipūjya baliṃ haret//
S01divav33u:3645: u11.25cd/.mahendre mukta^puṣpāṇi pāvake ca payo dadhi//
S01divav33u:3646: u11.26ab/.āditye parideyaṃ tu bhaktaṃ ca^eva priyaṅgavaḥ/
S01divav33u:3647: u11.26cd/.antarīkṣe jalaṃ divyaṃ puṣpāṇi jalajāni ca//
S01divav33u:3648: u11.27ab/.nandā pratipādā jñeyā ṣaṣṭhī trayodaśī jayā/
S01divav33u:3649: u11.27cd/.tāsu tāsu dhruvaṃ kuryāt prājño hy evaṃ vicakṣaṇaḥ//
S01divav33u:3652: .atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin dvādaśa^rāśikaṃ nāma^adhyāyaṃ vyākhāsyāmi/
S01divav33u:3660: u12.2cd/.dvādaśaiva tu cittās te ye loke pracaranti vai//
S01divav33u:3661: u12.3ab/.tān ahaṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi śṛṇu tattvena me tataḥ/
S01divav33u:3662: u12.3cd/.dvādaśa^eva tu kuryāc ca maṇḍalāni vicakṣaṇaḥ/.
S01divav33u:3663: u12.4ab/.prathamaṃ meṣo nāma syād dvitīyaṃ tu vṛṣaḥ smṛtaḥ/
S01divav33u:3664: u12.4cd/.tṛtīyaṃ mithunaṃ nāma caturthaṃ ca^api karkaṭaḥ//
S01divav33u:3665: u12.5ab/.pañcamaṃ ca^api siṃhas tu ṣaṣṭhaṃ kanyā iti smṛtaṃ/
S01divav33u:3666: u12.5cd/.tulā tu saptamaṃ jñeyā vṛścikas tu tahtāṣṭamaṃ//
S01divav33u:3667: u12.6ab/.dnavī tu navamaṃ jñeyā daśamaṃ makaraḥ smṛtaḥ/
S01divav33u:3668: u12.6cd/.kumbhaś caikādaśaṃ jñeyo dvādaśaṃ mīna ucyate//
S01divav33u:3669: u12.7ab/.horā śarīraṃ jātasya dvitīye cintitaṃ dhanaṃ/
S01divav33u:3670: u12.7cd/.tṛtīye bhrātura ca^eva caturthe svajanas tathā//
S01divav33u:3671: u12.8ab/.cintyate pañcame putraḥ ṣaṣṭhe maṇḍale śatrutā/
S01divav33u:3672: u12.8cd/.saptame dārasaṃyogo hy aṣṭame naidhanaṃ smṛtaṃ//
S01divav33u:3673: u12.9ab/.navame cintyate dharmo daśame darmajaṃ phalaṃ/
S01divav33u:3675: u12.10ab/.ete dvādaśa^cittās tu yathā dṛṣṭā maharṣibhiḥ/
S01divav33u:3677: u12.11ab/.āgastya pṛcchate kaścit prathamaṃ maṇḍalaṃ spṛśet/(p.184)
S01divav33u:3678: u12.11cd/.śiras tu spṛśate yaś ca śabdaś ca upalakṣyate//
S01divav33u:3679: u12.12ab/.vyādhitaṃ ca^eva hy ātmānam āgneyāś ca vinaṣṭayaḥ/
S01divav33u:3680: u12.12cd/.yadi brūyāt tadā tasya ātmārthaṃ cintitaṃ bhavet//
S01divav33u:3681: u12.13ab/.kāñcanaṃ rajataṃ tāmraṃ lauhaṃ ca^eva bhṛśaṃ havet/
S01divav33u:3682: u12.13cd/.sa ca sarva^gataś ca^eva agnir aśnāti niścitaṃ//
S01divav33u:3684: u12.14cd/.yādṛśaś ca bhavec chabdas tādṛśaṃ tena cintitaṃ//
S01divav33u:3685: u12.15ab/.puruṣaḥ kaścid āgatya dvitīyaṃ maṇḍalaṃ spṛśet/
S01divav33u:3686: u12.15cd/.grīvāṃ vā parimārjayed galaṃ ca cibukaṃ punaḥ//
S01divav33u:3687: u12.16ab/.yadi śabdaś ca śrūyeta dṛṣṭā gāvas tathā^eva ca/
S01divav33u:3688: u12.16cd/.īdṛśaṃ ca dṛXṭvotpātaṃ gośabdaṃ tatra nirdiśet/
S01divav33u:3689: u12.16ef/.atha vā yādṛśaḥ śabdas tādṛśaṃ tena cintitam//
S01divav33u:3690: u12.17ab/.puruṣaḥ kaścid āgatya tṛtīyaṃ maṇḍalaṃ spṛśet/
S01divav33u:3691: u12.17cd/.mārjayen mukhadeśaṃ tu strī^cittaṃ tasya nirdiśet//
S01divav33u:3692: u12.18ab/.atha śabdo bhavet tatra śrūyantāṃ tādṛśās tu te/
S01divav33u:3693: u12.18cd/.jātaṃ prajātam upajātaṃ tathā jāto bhaviṣyati//
S01divav33u:3695: u12.19cd/.atha vā yādṛśaḥ śabdas tādṛśaṃ tena cintitaṃ//
S01divav33u:3696: u12.20ab/.puruṣaḥ kaścid āgatya caturthaṃ maṇḍalaṃ spṛśet/
S01divav33u:3697: u12.20cd/.kacchapaṃ spṛśate yas tu kalahaṃ tatra nirdiśet/
S01divav33u:3698: u12.20ef/.svajanaṃ vyavahāras tu sati kalahe na saṃśayaḥ//
S01divav33u:3699: u12.21ab/.ākaṭṭā kaṭṭeti śabdā bhavanti ca nirantaraṃ/(p.185)
S01divav33u:3701: u12.22ab/.puruṣaḥ kaścid āgatya pañcamaṃ maṇḍalaṃ spṛśet/
S01divav33u:3702: u12.22cd/.hṛdayaṃ spṛśate yas tu apatyaṃ tatra cintitaṃ//
S01divav33u:3704: u12.23cd/.śastra^dravyaṃ ca yat tasya brāhmaṇānaṃ kule sthitaṃ//
S01divav33u:3705: u12.24ab/.atha śabdo bhavet tatra yaṃ dṛṣṭvā tu maharṣibhiḥ/
S01divav33u:3706: u12.24cd/.putraputreti yacchabdo yad gataṃ gatam eva ca/
S01divav33u:3708: u12.25ab/.puruṣaḥ kaś cid āgatya ṣaṣṭhaṃ tu maṇḍalaṃ spṛśet/
S01divav33u:3709: u12.25cd/.spṛśate ca^api pārśvāni gātracintā tu cintitā//
S01divav33u:3710: u12.26ab/.vigrahas tu mahā^ghoraḥ śatruś ca^api pravadhyate/
S01divav33u:3711: u12.26cd/.atha vā tatra ye śabdāḥ śrotavyās te na saṃśayaḥ//
S01divav33u:3712: u12.27ab/.ayaṃ tu prakṣaraś ca^eva hataś ca vihatas tathā/
S01divav33u:3714: u12.27ef/.atha vā yādṛśaḥ śabdas tādṛśaṃ tena cintitaṃ//
S01divav33u:3715: u12.28ab/.puruṣaḥ kaścid āgatāy saptamaṃ maṇḍalaṃ spṛśet/
S01divav33u:3716: u12.28cd/.hastena mardayed hastaṃ tathā nāḍīṃ ca mardayed//
S01divav33u:3718: u12.29cd/.tatreme bhavanti śabdāḥ śrotavyā bhūmim icchatā//
S01divav33u:3719: u12.30ab/.sthitaṃ niviṣṭaṃ vartañ ca kṛtaṃ hasta^gataṃ tathā/
S01divav33u:3721: u12.30ef/.yādṛśo vā śrutaḥ śabdas tādṛśaṃ tena cintitaṃ//
S01divav33u:3722: u12.31ab/.puruṣaḥ kaścid āgatya aṣṭamaṃ maṇḍalaṃ spṛśet/(p.186)
S01divav33u:3723: u12.31cd/.udaraṃ ca^eva phicakaṃ dve ime parimārjayet//
S01divav33u:3724: u12.32ab/.nidhanaṃ dṛśyate tasya maraṇaṃ ca^api dṛśyate/
S01divav33u:3725: u12.32cd/.yadi bhaved bhaven mṛtyur yaś ca^anya^priya^saṅgamaḥ//
S01divav33u:3726: u12.33ab/.tatreme śabdāḥ śrotavyā mṛta eva bhaviṣyati/
S01divav33u:3728: u12.34ab/.puruṣaḥ kaś cid āgatya navamaṃ maṇḍalaṃ spṛśet/
S01divav33u:3729: u12.34cd/.ūruṃ ca spṛśate bhūyā dharma^cintā ca cintitā//
S01divav33u:3730: u12.35ab/.tatra śabdāś ca śrotavyā bhavanti hi na saṃśayaḥ//
S01divav33u:3731: u12.35cd/.yaja hi yājakaś ca^eva yajamānas tathāiva ca/
S01divav33u:3733: u12.36ab/.puruṣaḥ kaścid āgatya daśamaṃ maṇḍalaṃ spṛśet/
S01divav33u:3735: u12.37ab/.spṛśate jānunī ca^eva karma^cintāṃ tu nirdiśet/
S01divav33u:3736: u12.37cd/.tatra śabdā ahbvantīme śrotavyāś ca na saṃśayaḥ//
S01divav33u:3737: u12.38ab/.bhūmikarma ca kṣetraṃ ca kṣetrakarma tathāiva ca/
S01divav33u:3739: u12.39ab/.puruṣaḥ kaścid āgatya ekādaśaṃ tu saṃspṛśet/
S01divav33u:3740: u12.39cd/.jaṅghe tu spṛśate bhūyo hy artha^lābhaṃ vinirdiśet//
S01divav33u:3741: u12.40ab/.tatreme śabdāḥ śrotavyā bhavantīha na saṃśayaḥ/
S01divav33u:3743: u12.41ab/.etādṛśaṃ ravaṃ śrūtvā hiraṇyaṃ tasya nirdiśet/
S01divav33u:3744: u12.41cd/.atha vā yādṛśaḥ śabdas tādṛśaṃ phalam ādiśet//
S01divav33u:3745: u12.42ab/.puruṣaḥ kaścid āgatya dvādaśaṃ maṇḍalaṃ spṛśet/(p.187)
S01divav33u:3746: u12.42cd/.pādau ca spṛśate pṛcchan cittaṃ vā^apy anarthikaṃ//
S01divav33u:3747: u12.43ab/.yas tu tac cintito hy artha^āśā āgantukā ca yā/
S01divav33u:3749: u12.44ab/.nirāśaś ca^eva ghoṣaś ca nirāśaṃ tasya nirdiśet/
S01divav33u:3750: u12.44cd/.atha vā yādṛśaḥ śabdas tādṛśaṃ tena cintitaṃ//
S01divav33u:3753: .atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin kanyā^lakṣaṇaṃ nāma^adhyāyaṃ vyākhāsyāmi/
S01divav33u:3758: u13.1ab/.tatvaṃ vijñāyate yena yena śubham upasthitaṃ/
S01divav33u:3759: u13.1cd/.ninditaṃ ca praśastaṃ ca strīṇāṃ vakṣyāmi lakṣaṇaṃ//
S01divav33u:3760: u13.2ab/.pitaraṃ mātaram ca^eva mātulaṃ bhrātaraṃ tathā/
S01divav33u:3763: u13.3cd/.tad vijñaiḥ saha saṅgamya kanyāṃ paśyeta śāstra^vit//
S01divav33u:3764: u13.4ab/.hastau pādau nirīkṣeta nakhāni hy aṅgulīs tathā/
S01divav33u:3765: u13.4cd/.pāṇilekhāś ca jañghae ca kaṭinābhyūrum eva ca//
S01divav33u:3766: u13.5ab/.oṣṭhau jihvāṃ ca dantāṃś ca kapolau nāsikāṃ tathā/
S01divav33u:3767: u13.5cd/.akṣibhravau lalāṭaṃ ca karṇau keśāṃs tathā^eva ca//
S01divav33u:3768: u13.6ab/.romarājīṃ savaraṃ varṇaṃ mantritaṃ gatim eva ca/(p.188)
S01divav33u:3770: u13.6ef/.tatra pūrvaṃ parīkṣeta svayam eva vicakṣaṇaḥ//
S01divav33u:3773: u13.8ab/.avyāvartāś catvāro yasyāḥ sarve ca^eva pradakṣiṇāḥ/
S01divav33u:3776: u13.9cd/.dhanyān sā janayet putrāṃs teṣāṃ prītiṃ ca bhuñjate//
S01divav33u:3777: u13.10ab/.yasyāḥ pāṇitale vyaktaḥ kacchapaḥ svastiko dhavajaḥ/
S01divav33u:3779: u13.10ef/.ekaṃ sā janayet putraṃ taṃ ca rājānam ādiśet//
S01divav33u:3786: u13.14ab/.sūkṣmā ca tuṅganāsā ca muktam āraktimodarī/
S01divav33u:3787: u13.14cd/.subhrūḥ suvarakeśāntā sā tu kanyā bahu^prajā//
S01divav33u:3790: u13.16ab/.yasyāvartau samau snighdau ubhau pārśvau susaṃsthitau/
S01divav33u:3794: u13.18ab/.ūrū jaṅghe ca pārśve ca tathā vikramaḥ saṃsthitaḥ/
S01divav33u:3795: u13.18cd/.rakta^ante vipule netre sā kanyā sukhamedhate//
S01divav33u:3797: u13.19cd/.yukta^nāmā tu yā nārī rājānam upatiṣṭhite//
S01divav33u:3802: u13.22ab/.kānta^jihvā tu yā nārī rakta^uṣṭhī priya^bhāṣiṇī/
S01divav33u:3805: u13.23cd/.sahasrāṇāṃ bahūnāṃ tu svāminī sā bhaviṣyati//
S01divav33u:3808: u13.25ab/.kīrtitās tu mayā dhanyā maṅgalya^lakṣaṇāḥ striyaḥ/
S01divav33u:3810: u13.26ab/.ūrdhva^prekṣī adhaḥprekṣī yā ca tiryak ca prekṣiṇī/
S01divav33u:3817: u13.29cd/.trīṃś ca sā puruṣān hanti devaraṃ śvaśuraṃ patiṃ//
S01divav33u:3818: u13.30ab/.pārśvato roma^rājī tu vinatā ca kaṭir bhavet/
S01divav33u:3819: u13.30cd/.dīrgham āyur avāpnoti dīrgha^kālaṃ ca duḥkhitā//
S01divav33u:3820: u13.31ab/.kāka^jaṅghā ca yā nārī rakta^akṣī vardhasvarā/
S01divav33u:3821: u13.31cd/.niḥsukhā ca nirāśā ca varjitā naṣṭa^bāndhavā//
S01divav33u:3824: u13.33ab/.yā tu sarva^samācārā mṛd^vaṅgī samatāṃ gatā/
S01divav33u:3825: u13.33cd/.sarvaiḥ samair guṇair yuktā vijñeyā kāma^cāriṇī//
S01divav33u:3826: u13.34ab/.yasyā roma^cite jaṅghe mukhaṃ ca parimaṇḍalaṃ/
S01divav33u:3827: u13.34cd/.putraṃ vā bhrātaraṃ vā^api jāram icchati tādṛśī//
S01divav33u:3829: u13.35cd/.uttaroṣṭhe ca romāṇi sā tu bhakṣayate patiṃ//
S01divav33u:3830: u13.36ab/.yasya hastau ca pādāu ca chidrau danta^antarāṇi ca/
S01divav33u:3831: u13.36cd/.patinā^upārjitaṃ dravyaṃ na tasyā ramate gṛhe//
S01divav33u:3834: u13.38ab/.yasyāḥ kaniṣṭhikā pāde bhūmiṃ na spṛśate +aṅguliḥ/
S01divav33u:3835: u13.38cd/.kaumāraṃ sā patiṃ syaktvā ātmanaḥ kurute priyaṃ//
S01divav33u:3837: u13.39cd/.na sā ramati kaumāraṃ bandhakītvena jīvati//
S01divav33u:3840: u13.41ab/.āvartaḥ pṛṣṭhato yasyā nābhī sā ca^anubandhati/(p.191)
S01divav33u:3841: u13.41cd/.na sā ramati kaumāraṃ dvitīyaṃ labhate patiṃ//
S01divav33u:3844: u13.43ab/.yasyās tu hasamānāyā gaṇḍe jāyati kūpakaṃ/
S01divav33u:3845: u13.43cd/.agnikārye +api sā gatvā kṣipraṃ doṣaṃ kariṣyati//
S01divav33u:3846: u13.44ab/.sama^asama^gatā subhrūr gaṇḍa^āvartā ca ya bhavet/
S01divav33u:3847: u13.44cd/.pralambhoṣṭhī tu yā nārī naikatra ramate ciraṃ//
S01divav33u:3849: u13.45cd/.aṣṭau bhakṣayate vīrān navame tiṣṭhate ciraṃ//
S01divav33u:3850: u13.46ab/.na devikā na nadikā na ca daivata^nāmikā/
S01divav33u:3852: u13.47ab/.nakṣatra^nāmā yā nārī yā ca gotra^sanāmikā/
S01divav33u:3853: u13.47cd/.suguptā rakṣitā vā^api manasā pāpām ācaret//
S01divav33u:3854: u13.48ab/.dārān vivarjayed etān yā mayā parikīrtitāḥ/
S01divav33u:3855: u13.48cd/.praśastā yās tu pūrvoktās tādṛśīyān naraḥ sadā//
S01divav33u:3867: u14.2ab/.punarvasuś ca dhanyā syāt puṣye vai vastravān bhavet/
S01divav33u:3868: u14.2cd/.aśleṣāsu bhaven moṣaḥ śmaśānaṃ maghayā vrajet//
S01divav33u:3869: u14.3ab/.phālgunīsu bhaved vidyā uttarāsu ca vastravān/
S01divav33u:3871: u14.4ab/.svātyāṃ ca śobhanaṃ vastraṃ viśākhā priya^darśanaṃ/
S01divav33u:3874: u14.5cd/.uttarā mṛṣṭa^bhojī syāc chravaṇe cakṣuṣo rujaṃ//
S01divav33u:3878: u14.7cd/.bharaṇī ca bhaya^ākīrṇā caura^gamyā ca sā bhavet//
S01divav33u:3886: u15.1ab/.kutra^utpannā ime bījāḥ (?) śasyānāṃ ca yavādayaḥ/
S01divav33u:3887: u15.1cd/.yair idaṃ dhriyate viśvaṃ kṛtsnaṃ sthāvara^jaṅgamaṃ//
S01divav33u:3888: u15.2ab/.vāpayet tu kathaṃ bījaṃ lāṅgalaṃ yojayet kathaṃ/
S01divav33u:3890: u15.3ab/.śāradaṃ vā^atha graiṣmaṃ tu kasmin māse tu vāpayet/
S01divav33u:3891: u15.3cd/.nimittaṃ kati śasyante kāni vā parivarjayet/
S01divav33u:3892: u15.3ef/.kasya vā dāpayed dhūpaṃ kena mantreṇa dāpayet//
S01divav33u:3894: u15.4cd/.tadā nāga^mukhī luṅgā dahati citra^mukhy api//
S01divav33u:3895: u15.5ab/.darbha^sūcī^mukhī vā^api kāraṇaṃ tatra ko bhavet/
S01divav33u:3896: u15.5cd/.kati saubhikṣikā luṅgaḥ kati daurbhikṣikāḥ smṛtāḥ/
S01divav33u:3897: u15.5ef/.kati varṇāḥ samākhyātāḥ kati varṇā nidarśitāḥ//
S01divav33u:3899: u15.6cd/.nirghāto vā bhavet tīvro +athavā^api medinī calet//
S01divav33u:3900: u15.7ab/.śasyaṃ phalasya kiṃ tatra nimittam upalakṣayet/
S01divav33u:3901: u15.7cd/.sarvam etat samāsena śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥ//
S01divav33u:3902: u15.8ab/.puṣkarasāriṇo brāhmaṇasya vacanaṃ śrūtvā triśaṅku^mātaṅga^adhipatir idaṃ vacanam abravīt/
S01divav33u:3904: u15.9cd/.sāgarād amṛtaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ manthite tu samudbhavaṃ//
S01divav33u:3905: u15.10ab/.amṛte bhakṣyamāṇe tu bhāgaṃ prārthitavān dvijaḥ/(p.194)
S01divav33u:3906: u15.10cd/.tato dattāḥ surair bhāgā amṛtād daśavindavaḥ//
S01divav33u:3907: u15.11ab/.tata utpannā ime bījā bhuvi loka^sukha^āvahāḥ/
S01divav33u:3909: u15.12ab/.śyāmakaṃ saptamaṃ vidyād ikṣuś ca^aṣṭamakaḥ smṛtaḥ/
S01divav33u:3910: u15.12cd/.śeṣās tu saṅgatā jātā bahavaḥ śasya^jātayaḥ//
S01divav33u:3913: u15.13ef/.mūleṣu ca^eva sarveṣu vindur ekaḥ prapātitaḥ//
S01divav33u:3916: u15.15ab/.kārttike mārgaśīrṣe vā grīāma dhānyāni vāpayet/
S01divav33u:3918: u15.16ab/.trayodaśyāṃ dvitīyāyāṃ tathā hi navamīṣu ca/
S01divav33u:3919: u15.16cd/.viśeṣatas tu nimneṣu sarva^bījāni hy utsṛjet//
S01divav33u:3925: u15.19ab/.grāma^kṣetre ca yad bījaṃ gṛhe ca gṛha^devatā/
S01divav33u:3927: u15.20ab/.brāhmaṇaṃ kṣatriyaṃ kanyām arciṣmantaṃ ca pāvakaṃ/(p.195)
S01divav33u:3928: u15.20cd/.vāraṇa^indraṃ vṛṣaṃ ca^eva hayaṃ vā svabhyalaṃkṛtaṃ//
S01divav33u:3929: u15.21ab/.pūrṇa^kumbhaṃ dhvajaṃ chatram āmāmāṃsaṃ surāṃ tathā/
S01divav33u:3930: u15.21cd/.uddhṛtāṃ dhāraṇīṃ ca^eva baddham eka^paśuṃ dadhi//
S01divav33u:3931: u15.22ab/.cakra^ārūḍhaṃ ca śakaṭaṃ kāka^ārūḍhāṃ ca sūkarīṃ/
S01divav33u:3933: u15.23ab/.sarve dakṣiṇato dhanyāḥ puraś ca mṛga^pakṣiṇaḥ/
S01divav33u:3935: u15.24ab/.ajo vā vāmataḥ śasyo jambukaś ca praśasyate/
S01divav33u:3936: u15.24cd/.vikṛtaṃ kubja^kuṣṭhiṃ ca mukhaṃ śmaśrudharaṃ tathā//
S01divav33u:3939: u15.25ef/.dṛṣṭvā nivartayed bījaṃ punar grāmaṃ praveśayet//
S01divav33u:3940: u15.26ab/.tilasya bahu(?) pūrṇasya bhāṇḍe syād vapanam tathā/
S01divav33u:3941: u15.26cd/.śrūtvā hy etāni vrajatāṃ sasya^sampattim ādiśet//
S01divav33u:3942: u15.27ab/.rāśisthaṃ grathitaṃ dhautaṃ svasthamaṃ kuritaṃ tathā/
S01divav33u:3943: u15.27cd/.śrūtvā saṃmārjitaṃ ca^eva ity āśukṛtinaṃ viduḥ//
S01divav33u:3944: u15.28ab/.śrūtvā mlānaṃ ca śuṣkaṃ ca manda^vṛṣṭiṃ ca nirdiśet/
S01divav33u:3945: u15.28cd/.śrūtvā nivartayed bījaṃ punar grāmaṃ praveśayet//
S01divav33u:3946: u15.29ab/.nīyamānaṃ ca yad bījaṃ varṣate yadi vāsavaḥ/
S01divav33u:3947: u15.29cd/.svayam eva tu tac chasyaṃ kāmaṃ kālena bhujyate//
S01divav33u:3948: u15.30ab/.nīyamānaṃ ca yad bījaṃ kampate yadi medinī/
S01divav33u:3949: u15.30cd/.bhramyate karṣakaḥ sthānān na tac chakyaṃ tu vāpituṃ//
S01divav33u:3953: u15.32cd/.dṛṣṭvā nivartayed bījaṃ punar grāmaṃ niveśayet//
S01divav33u:3955: u15.33cd/.kṛtvā suvipulāṃ vedīṃ darbhān āstīrya sarvataḥ/
S01divav33u:3957: u15.34cd/.veda^śāntiṃ japet pūrvaṃ śasyāśāntim ataḥ praṃ/
S01divav33u:3958: u15.35ab/.jayet pārāśaraṃ pūrvaṃ priyataṃ vācayed dvijaiḥ/
S01divav33u:3959: u15.35cd/.prathamaṃ prāṅmukhaṃ bījaṃ prakṣiped uttare +atha vā//
S01divav33u:3960: u15.36ab/.pipīlikā yadā kṣetre bījaṃ kurvanti saṅcayaṃ/
S01divav33u:3961: u15.36cd/.suvṛṣṭiṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca sarva^sasyeṣu sampadā/
S01divav33u:3962: u15.37ab/.haranti cet tṛṇād bījaṃ tṛṇe śasya^apahā api/
S01divav33u:3963: u15.37cd/.prasparaṃ ca hiṃsanti dhānyaṃ ca nidhanaṃ vrajet//
S01divav33u:3965: u15.38cd/.dṛṣṭvā tu sañcayaṃ nimne +anāvṛṣṭiṃ ca nirdiśet//
S01divav33u:3966: u15.39ab/.yadā tu proṣitaṃ bījaṃ sapta^rātreṇa jāyate/
S01divav33u:3967: u15.39cd/.suvṛṣṭiṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca sarva^śasyeṣu sampadā//
S01divav33u:3968: u15.40ab/.yadā tu proṣitaṃ bījam ardha^māsena jāyate/
S01divav33u:3969: u15.40cd/.alpaṃ niṣpadyate śasyaṃ durbhikṣaṃ ca^atra jāyate//
S01divav33u:3970: u15.41ab/.tri^rātrāc catūrātrād vā yadi luṅgaḥ prajāyate/
S01divav33u:3972: u15.42ab/.luṅgasya tu ye pādāḥ pañca sapta navā tathā/
S01divav33u:3973: u15.42cd/.suvṛṣṭiṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca sarva^sasyeṣu sampadā//
S01divav33u:3974: u15.43ab/.syāl luṅgasya tu ye pādāś catvāroṣṭapadā^atha vā/(p.197)
S01divav33u:3975: u15.43cd/.alpaṃ niṣpadyate śasyaṃ durbhikṣaṃ ca^atra nirdiśet//
S01divav33u:3976: u15.44ab/.luṅgasya yadi pādās tu dṛśyante dvādaśa kvacit/
S01divav33u:3977: u15.44cd/.kvacin niṣpadyate śasyaṃ drubhikṣaṃ kvacid ādiśet/
S01divav33u:3979: u15.45ab/.yadā pūrva^mūkhī luṅgā kṣemaṃ vṛṣṭiṃ ca nirdiśet/
S01divav33u:3980: u15.45cd/.yadā paścān mukhī luṅgā ativṛṣṭiṃ ca nirdeśet//
S01divav33u:3984: u15.47cd/.kvacin niṣpadyate śasyaṃ durbhikṣaṃ tatra nirdiśet//
S01divav33u:3985: u15.48ab/.yadā nāga^mukhī luṅgā dṛśyate yatra vā kavcit/
S01divav33u:3986: u15.48cd/.kvacin niśyadyate śasyaṃ durbhikṣaṃ ca^atra nirdiśet/
S01divav33u:3987: u15.48ef/.tatra^aśani^bhayaṃ ca^api bhayaṃ meghān na saṃśayaḥ//
S01divav33u:3990: u15.50ab/.nākṛṣer dharmam āpnoti nākṛṣeḥ sukham āpnuyāt/
S01divav33u:3991: u15.50cd/.dharmam arthaṃ tathā kāmaṃ sarvaṃ prāpnoti karṣakaḥ//
S01divav33u:3993: u15.52ab/.punar api puṣkarasārī brāhmaṇas triśaṅkuṃ mātaṅga^adhipatim etad avocat/
S01divav33u:3994: u15.53ab/.kathaṃ pṛthivyāṃ nāgāś ca kena vā vinivāritāḥ/(p.198)
S01divav33u:3996: u15.54ab/.kutaś ca^abhrāṇi jāyante nānā^varṇā diśo daśa/
S01divav33u:3997: u15.54cd/.kasya^eṣa mahataḥ śabdaḥ śrūyate dundubhis varaḥ//
S01divav33u:3998: u15.55ab/.ko hi sṛjati durbhikṣaṃ subhikṣaṃ ca^eva prāṇināṃ/
S01divav33u:3999: u15.55cd/.kas tatra sa muni^śreṣṭho nāma gotraṃ bravīhi me//
S01divav33u:4000: u15.56ab/.daivatāni ca me brūhi vidhānāni svayambhuvaḥ/
S01divav33u:4001: u15.56cd/.yajñaṃ ca yajña^bhāgaṃ ca hotavyaś ca yathā baliḥ//
S01divav33u:4002: u15.57ab/.pṛthivyāṃ daivataṃ brūhi āśrame daivataṃ brūhi/
S01divav33u:4003: u15.57cd/.deve tu daivataṃ brūhi kena devo sā kalpitā//
S01divav33u:4005: u15.58cd/.karake daivataṃ brūhi tathā sthālyāṃ ca daivataṃ//
S01divav33u:4007: u15.59cd/.vāyu^skandhaiś ca katibhiḥ śukro vegaṃ pramuñcati//
S01divav33u:4008: u15.60ab/.atha triśaṅkur mātaṅga^adhipatir brāhmaṇaṃ puṣkarasāriṇam etad avocat/
S01divav33u:4009: u15.61ab/.pṛthivī vā vāyur ākāśam apo jyotiś ca pañcamaṃ/
S01divav33u:4010: u15.61cd/.tatra saṃvartate piṇḍaṃ tato meghaḥ pravartate//
S01divav33u:4011: u15.62ab/.eṣa vyāpnoti ca^ākāśaṃ vāyunā janyate ghanaḥ/
S01divav33u:4014: u15.63cd/.vāyur nabho garjayate agnir vidyotate diśaḥ//
S01divav33u:4015: u15.64ab/.marutā kṣipyate piṇḍaṃ sannipātaś ca garjate/(p.199)
S01divav33u:4016: u15.64cd/.virodhanaṃ tu vāyoś ca agnaś ca anilasya ca//
S01divav33u:4017: u15.65ab/.ākāśe vartate piṇḍaṃ paścāt patati medinīṃ/
S01divav33u:4021: u15.66cd/.yatra satyaṃ ca dharmaś ca havirmeghaś ca vartate//
S01divav33u:4024: u15.67ef/.dantāśanī tṛtīyā tu aśanis tu caturthikā//
S01divav33u:4025: u15.68ab/.pañcamī krimayaḥ proktāḥ ṣaṣṭhī tu śalabhās tathā/
S01divav33u:4027: u15.69/.navamī sambaraḥ proktā ity āha bhagavāms triśaṅkuḥ/
S01divav33u:4028: u15.70ab/.etāstv aśanyo vyākhyātās tāsāṃ vai devatāḥ śṛṇu/
S01divav33u:4030: u15.71ab/.dantāśanī tu sainyānāṃ grahā vātāśanī smṛtā/
S01divav33u:4034: u15.73ab/.[samba]rasya tu parjanyam ākhyātāḥ nava devatāḥ/
S01divav33u:4037: u15.74cd/.varuṇaṃ paścime vidyād uttare dhanadaḥ smṛtaḥ/(p.200)
S01divav33u:4038: u15.74ef/..... tyā daivataṃ viZṇur āśramaṃ viśva^daivataṃ//
S01divav33u:4045: u15.77ef/.vāyu^skandhaiś caturbhis tu śukro vegaṃ pramuñcati//
S01divav33u:4048: u15.79ab/.aty āha bhagavāṃs triśaṅkuḥ/ punar api puṣkarasārī brāhmaṇas triśaṅkum evam āha/
S01divav33u:4049: u15.80ab/.kim artham āśrame nityaṃ hūyate havya^vāhanaḥ/
S01divav33u:4053: u15.81ef/.praśamec ca samāsena tad bhava^arthaṃ tu ..... //
S01divav33u:4054: u15.82/.evam ukte triśaṅkur mātaṅga^adhipatir brāhmaṇaṃ puṣkarasāriṇam etad avocat/
S01divav33u:4059: u16.2cd/.tatra dagdhā anekā hi nāgāḥ koṭī^sahasraśaḥ//
S01divav33u:4063: u16.4cd/.tadā^prabhṛti bhūtānāṃ dṛṣṭaṃ vai trāsitaṃ manaḥ//
S01divav33u:4064: u16.5ab/.agninā tāpitāḥ kecid vāṇair anye ca sūditāḥ/
S01divav33u:4068: u16.7ab/.sahāmpatis tu nāmnā sa śasya^kāle tadāśrame/
S01divav33u:4071: u16.8cd/.dig^bhāgeṣu ca bhūtānāṃ teṣām arthaṃ dine dine//
S01divav33u:4074: u16.10ab/.sadhūmlaṃ jvalitaṃ dṛṣṭvā dīpyamānaṃ tu pāvakaṃ/
S01divav33u:4080: .atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin tithi^karma^nirdeśaṃ nāma^adhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi/
S01divav33u:4095: u17.6ab/.bhadrā ca saptamī khyātā śreṣṭhā sā saukṛte +adhvani/
S01divav33u:4096: u17.6cd/.nṛpāṇāṃ śāsane chatre śayyānāṃ karaṇeṣu ca//
S01divav33u:4099: u17.8ab/.agrasenā tu navamī tasyāṃ kuryād ripu^kṣayaṃ/
S01divav33u:4104: u17.10cd/.kārayen nagaraṃ guptaṃ vivāhaṃ śāstra^karma ca//
S01divav33u:4105: u17.11ab/.yaśeti dvādaśīmm āhur vaire +adhvani ca garhitā/
S01divav33u:4106: u17.11cd/.vivāhe ca girau kṣetre gṛha^kramasu pūjitā//
S01divav33u:4107: u17.12ab/.jayā trayodaśī sādhvī maṇḍaleṣu ca yoṣitāṃ/(p.203)
S01divav33u:4109: u17.13ab/.ugrā caturdaśī tu syāt kārayed abhicārakaṃ/
S01divav33u:4110: u17.13cd/.vadha^bandha^prayogāṃś ca pūrvaṃ ca prahared api//
S01divav33u:4113: u17.15ab/.nanda^ādīnāṃ kriyā pūrve ṣaṣṭhy^ādīnāṃ tu madhyame/
S01divav33u:4117: .api ca mahā^brāhmaṇa idaṃ pūrva^nivāsa^anusmṛti^jñāna^sākṣāt kriyāyāṃ vidyāyāṃ cittam abhinirṇayāmi nivartayāmi/
S01divav33u:4120: .syāt te brāhmaṇa kākṣā vā vimatir vā anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena brahmā devānāṃ pravaro +abhūt/
S01divav33u:4122: aham eva sa tena kālena tena samayena brahmā devānāṃ pravaro +abhūvaṃ/
S01divav33u:4123: so +ahaṃ tataś cyutaḥ samāna indraḥ kauśiko +abhūvaṃ/
S01divav33u:4125: tataś cyutaḥ samānaḥ śvetaketur nāma maharṣir abhūvaṃ/
S01divav33u:4126: tataś cyutaḥ samānaḥ śuka^paṇḍito +abhūvaṃ/ mayā te tadā brāhmaṇa catvāro vedā vibhaktāḥ/
S01divav33u:4131: syāt tava brāhmaṇa kāṅkṣā vā vimatir vā anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena vasur nāma maharṣir abhūt/
S01divav33u:4133: aham eva sa tena kālena tena samayena vasur nāma maharṣir abhūvaṃ/
S01divav33u:4134: mayā sā takṣakavadhūkāyāḥ kapilā nāma māṇivikā
S01divav33u:4136: so +ahaṃ tatra saṃrakta^citta ṛddhyā bhraṣṭo dhyānebhyo vañcitaḥ parihīnaḥ/
S01divav33u:4137: so +aham ātmānaṃ jugupsamānas tasyāṃ velāyām imāṃ gāthāṃ babhāṣe/
S01divav33u:4142: .so +ahaṃ brāhmaṇa tvāṃ bravīmi sāmānya^saṃjñā mātrakam idaṃ lokasya brāhmaṇa iti vā kṣatriya iti vā vaiśya iti vā śūdra iti vā/
S01divav33u:4143: ekam eva^idaṃ sarvaṃ sarvam idam ekaṃ/
S01divav33u:4144: putrāya me śārdūlakarṇāya prakṛtiṃ duhitaram anuprayaccha bhāryā^arthāya/
S01divav33u:4146: idaṃ ca vacanaṃ punaḥ śrūtvā triśaṅkor mātaṅga^rājasya
S01divav33u:4148: u17.21ab/.bhagavān śrotriyaḥ śreṣṭhas tvatto bhūyān na vidyate/
S01divav33u:4150: u17.22ab/.putrāya te bhoḥ prakṛtiṃ dadāmi (p.205) śīlena rūpeṇa guṇair upetaḥ/
S01divav33u:4151: u17.22cd/.śārdūlakarṇaḥ prakṛtis tu bhadrā ubhau rametāṃ rucitaṃ mama^idaṃ/
S01divav33u:4153: .tatra tāni pañca^mātrāṇi māṇavaka^śatāni uccaiḥ śabdāni procur mahā^śabdāni/
S01divav33u:4154: mā tvaṃ bho upādhyāya vidyamāneṣu brāhmaṇeṣu cāṇḍālena sārdhaṃ sambandhaṃ rocaya/
S01divav33u:4155: na^arhasi bho upādhyāya vidyamāneṣu brāhmaṇeṣu cāṇḍālena sārdhaṃ sambandhaṃ kartum/
S01divav33u:4157: .atha brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārī teṣāṃ nidānaṃ nidāya śabdaṃ saṃsthāpya nipatya ślokena^etān arthān abhāṣata/
S01divav33u:4158: u17.25ab/.evam etad yathā hy eṣa triśaṅkur bhāṣate giraṃ/
S01divav33u:4159: u17.25cd/.tatvaṃ hy avitathaṃ bhūtaṃ satyam nityaṃ tathā dhruvaṃ//
S01divav33u:4161: .atha brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārī teṣāṃ māṇavakānāṃ taṃ mahāntaṃ śabdaṃ saṃsthāpya (p.206)
S01divav33u:4163: ayaṃ bhos triśaṅko brahmaṇā sahāpatinā cāturmahā^bhautiko mahā^puruṣaḥ prajñaptaḥ/ yasya/
S01divav33u:4164: u17.27ab/.śiraḥ satāraṃ gaganam ākāśam udaraṃ tathā/
S01divav33u:4165: u17.27cd/.parvatāś ca^apy ubhāv ūrū pādau ca dharaṇī^talaṃ//
S01divav33u:4167: u17.28cd/.sāgarāś ca^apy amedhyaṃ vai nadyo sūtra^sravo +asya tu//
S01divav33u:4168: u17.29ab/.aśrūṇi varṣaṇaṃ cārasya eṣa brahmā sahāpatiḥ/
S01divav33u:4169: u17.29cd/.bhavāṃs tu parama^jño +asi tan me brūhi yathā tathā//
S01divav33u:4171: .iha bhos triśaṅko kim āha svalakṣaṇaṃ brahmaṇaḥ pratyavekṣasva/
S01divav33u:4172: pitrā ca mātrā ca kṛtāni karmāṇi bhavanti/
S01divav33u:4174: u17.31ab/.gacchanti sattvā bahu^garbha^yoniṃ na ca^eva kaścin manujo hy ayoniḥ/
S01divav33u:4175: u17.31cd/.samasta jātau pracaranti sattvā na mārutāj jāyate kaścid eva//
S01divav33u:4176: u17.32ab/.svabhāva^bhāvyaṃ hy avagaccha loke ke brāhmaṇa^kṣatriya^vaiśya^śūdrāḥ/
S01divav33u:4177: u17.32cd/.sarvatra kāṇāḥ kuṇinaś ca khañjāḥ kuṣṭhī kilāsī hy apasmāriṇo 'pi//
S01divav33u:4178: u17.33ab/.kṛṣṇāś ca gaurāś ca tathā^eva śyāmāḥ sattvāḥ prajā hy anyatame viśiṣṭāḥ/(p.207)
S01divav33u:4179: u17.33cd/.saha^asthi^carmāḥ sanakhāḥ samāṃsā duḥkhī sukhī mūtra^purīṣa^yuktāḥ/
S01divav33u:4180: u17.33ef/.na ca^indriyāṇāṃ praviviktir asti tasmān na varṇāś caturo bhavanti//
S01divav33u:4181: u17.34ab/.mantrair hi yadi labhyeta svargaṃ tu gamanaṃ dvijaḥ/
S01divav33u:4183: u17.34ef/.yasmāt kṛṣṇāni śuklāni karmāṇi saphalāni hi/
S01divav33u:4186: .mānavaka^śateṣu sa tatra vinihato mahā^yaśasā triśaṅkunā puṣkarasārī brāhmaṇo +abravīt/
S01divav33u:4188: bhavān hi brahmā indraś ca kauśikaḥ/
S01divav33u:4193: u17.36ab/.jñānena hi tvaṃ parameṇa yuktaḥ svaṣu śāstreṣu bhavān kṛtārthaḥ/
S01divav33u:4194: u17.36cd/.śreṣṭho viśiṣṭo paramo +asi loke bhavān hi vidyā^caraṇena yuktaḥ//
S01divav33u:4195: u17.37ab/.dadāmi te +ahaṃ prakṛtiṃ mamāmalāṃ śīlena rūpeṇa guṇair upetaḥ/
S01divav33u:4196: u17.37cd/.śārdūlakarṇaḥ prakṛtiś ca bhadrā ubhau rametaṃ rucitaṃ mama^idaṃ//
S01divav33u:4197: u17.38ab/.pragṛhya bhṛṅgāram udaka^prapūrṇam āvarjito brāhmaṇo hṛṣṭa^cittaḥ/(p.208)
S01divav33u:4198: u17.38cd/.anupradāsīd udakena kanyakāṃ śārdūlakarṇasya iyam astu bhāryā//
S01divav33u:4200: u17.40ab/.kṛtvā niveśaṃ sa tadātmajasya gatvā^āśrame +asau nagaraṃ yaśasvī/
S01divav33u:4201: u17.40cd/.dharmeṇa vai kārayati svarājyaṃ kṣemaṃ subhikṣaṃ ca sadā^utsava^ādyaṃ // iti/
S01divav33u:4203: .syād bhikṣavo yuṣmākaṃ kāṅkṣā vā vimatir vā vicikitsā vā/
S01divav33u:4204: anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena triśaṅkur nāma mātaṅga^rājo +abhūvaṃ/
S01divav33u:4205: syād evaṃ ca bhikṣavo yusmākam anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena śārdūlakarṇā nāma mātaṅga^rāja^kumāro +abhūt/
S01divav33u:4207: eṣa sa ānando bhikṣuḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena śārdūlakarṇā nāma mātaṅga^rāja^kumāro
S01divav33u:4209: syād evaṃ yuṣmākam anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena puṣkarasārī nāma brāhmaṇo +abhūt/
S01divav33u:4211: eṣa śāradvatīputro bhikṣuḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena puṣkarasārī nāma brāhmaṇo +abhūt/
S01divav33u:4212: na^anyā sā tena kālena tena samayena puṣkarasāriṇo brāhmaṇasya prakṛtir nāma māṇavikā duhitā^abhūt/
S01divav33u:4214: eṣā sā prakṛtir bhikṣuṇī tena kālena
S01divav33u:4215: tena samayena puṣkarasāriṇo brāhmaṇasya prakṛtir nāma māṇavikā duhitā^abhūt/
S01divav33u:4217: tena^eva snehena tena^eva premṇā +anandaṃ bhikṣuṃ gacchantam anugacchati tiṣṭhantam anutiṣṭhati/
S01divav33u:4218: yad yad eva kulaṃ piṇḍāya praviśati tatra tatra^eva dvāre tūṣṇīṃ bhūtā +asthāt/
S01divav33u:4219: u17.42/.atha khalu bhagavān etasmin nidāne etasmin prakaraṇe tasyāṃ velāyām imāṃ gāthām abhāṣata/
S01divav33u:4221: u17.43cd/.etena jāyate prema candrasya kumude yathā//
S01divav33u:4225: utsāha unnatir aprativāṇiḥ smṛtyā saṃprajanyena apramādato yogaḥ caraṇīyaḥ/
S01divav33u:4226: drutam eṣāṃ caturṇā duḥkhasya^ārya^satyasya duḥkha^samudayanya nirodhasya nirodha^gāminyāḥ pratipada ārya^satyasya amīṣāṃ caturṇām ārya^satyānām
S01divav33u:4227: anabhisamitānām abhisamayāya^adhimātraṃ tīvra^cchando vīryaṃ vyāyāma utsāha unnatir aprativāṇiḥ smṛtyā saṃprajanyena^apramādato yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ/
S01divav33u:4230: asmiṃś ca khalu punar dharma^paryāye bhāṣyamāṇe bhikṣūṇāṃ ṣaṣṭi^mātrāṇām anupādāyāsravebhyaś cittāni vimuktāni/
S01divav33u:4231: saṃbahulānāṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ brahmaṇāṃ gṛhapatīnaṃ ca virajaskaṃ vigata^malaṃ dharma^cakṣur udapādi viśuddhaṃ/
S01divav33u:4234: ātta^manasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan/
